  244: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  245: %% Common Test interface functions -----------------------------------
  246: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  247: 
  248: all() ->
  249:     [
  250:      {group, 'tlsv1.3'},
  251:      {group, 'tlsv1.2'},
  252:      {group, 'tlsv1.1'},
  253:      {group, 'tlsv1'},
  254:      {group, 'dtlsv1.2'},
  255:      {group, 'dtlsv1'},
  256:      {group, transport_socket}
  257:     ] ++ simple_api_tests().
  258: 
  259: groups() ->
  260:     [
  261:      {'tlsv1.3', [parallel], ((gen_api_tests() ++ tls13_group() ++
  262:                            handshake_paus_tests()) --
  263:                           [dh_params,
  264:                            new_options_in_handshake,
  265:                            handshake_continue_tls13_client])
  266:       ++ (since_1_2() -- [conf_signature_algs])},
  267:      {'tlsv1.2', [parallel],  gen_api_tests() ++ since_1_2() ++ handshake_paus_tests() ++ pre_1_3() ++
  268:           [honor_client_cipher_order_tls12,honor_server_cipher_order_tls12]},
  269:      {'tlsv1.1', [parallel],  gen_api_tests() ++ handshake_paus_tests() ++ pre_1_3() ++ pre_1_2()},
  270:      {'tlsv1', [parallel],  gen_api_tests() ++ handshake_paus_tests() ++ pre_1_3() ++ pre_1_2() ++
  271:           beast_mitigation_test()},
  272:      {'dtlsv1.2', [parallel], gen_api_tests() -- [new_options_in_handshake, hibernate_server] ++
  273:           handshake_paus_tests() -- [handshake_continue_tls13_client] ++ pre_1_3()},
  274:      {'dtlsv1', [parallel],  gen_api_tests() -- [new_options_in_handshake, hibernate_server] ++
  275:           handshake_paus_tests() -- [handshake_continue_tls13_client] ++ pre_1_3() ++ pre_1_2()},
  276:      {transport_socket,  [parallel], gen_api_tests() -- [ssl_not_started, dh_params]}
  277:     ].
  278: 
  279: since_1_2() ->
  280:     [
  281:      conf_signature_algs,
  282:      no_common_signature_algs,
  283:      versions_option_based_on_sni,
  284:      ciphers_option_based_on_sni,
  285:      root_any_sign
  286:     ].
  287: 
  288: pre_1_3() ->
  289:     [
  290:      default_reject_anonymous,
  291:      connection_information_with_srp
  292:     ].
  293: 
  294: pre_1_2() ->
  295:     [honor_server_cipher_order,
  296:      honor_client_cipher_order].
  297: 
  298: simple_api_tests() ->
  299:     [
  300:      invalid_keyfile,
  301:      invalid_certfile,
  302:      invalid_cacertfile,
  303:      invalid_dhfile,
  304:      options_not_proplist,
  305:      options_whitebox,
  306:      format_error,
  307:      ssl_not_started
  308:     ].
  309: 
  310: gen_api_tests() ->
  311:     [
  312:      peercert,
  313:      peercert_with_client_cert,
  314:      select_best_cert,
  315:      select_sha1_cert,
  316:      connection_information,
  317:      secret_connection_info,
  318:      keylog_connection_info,
  319:      versions,
  320:      new_options_in_handshake,
  321:      active_n,
  322:      dh_params,
  323:      hibernate_client,
  324:      hibernate_server,
  325:      listen_socket,
  326:      peername,
  327:      recv_active,
  328:      recv_active_once,
  329:      recv_active_n,
  330:      recv_no_active_msg,
  331:      recv_timeout,
  332:      recv_close,
  333:      controlling_process,
  334:      controller_dies,
  335:      controlling_process_transport_accept_socket,
  336:      close_with_timeout,
  337:      close_in_error_state,
  338:      call_in_error_state,
  339:      close_transport_accept,
  340:      ipv6,
  341:      der_input,
  342:      max_handshake_size,
  343:      cb_info,
  344:      log_alert,
  345:      getstat,
  346:      check_random_nonce,
  347:      cipher_listing,
  348:      export_key_materials,
  349:      legacy_prf
  350:     ].
  351: 
  352: handshake_paus_tests() ->
  353:     [
  354:      handshake_continue, 
  355:      handshake_continue_timeout,
  356:      handshake_continue_change_verify,
  357:      handshake_hello_postpone_opts_verify,
  358:      hello_client_cancel,
  359:      hello_server_cancel,
  360:      handshake_continue_tls13_client
  361:     ].
  362: 
  363: %% Only relevant for SSL 3.0 and TLS 1.0
  364: beast_mitigation_test() ->
  365:     [%% Original option
  366:      rizzo_disabled,
  367:      %% Same effect as disable
  368:      rizzo_zero_n, 
  369:      %% Same as default
  370:      rizzo_one_n_minus_one 
  371:     ].
  372: 
  373: tls13_group() ->
  374:     [
  375:      supported_groups,
  376:      honor_server_cipher_order_tls13,
  377:      honor_client_cipher_order_tls13,
  378:      client_options_negative_version_gap,
  379:      client_options_negative_dependency_version,
  380:      client_options_negative_dependency_stateless,
  381:      client_options_negative_dependency_role,
  382:      client_options_negative_early_data,
  383:      server_options_negative_early_data,
  384:      server_options_negative_version_gap,
  385:      server_options_negative_dependency_role,
  386:      server_options_negative_stateless_tickets_seed,
  387:      invalid_options_tls13,
  388:      cookie,
  389:      exporter_master_secret_consumed
  390:     ].
  391: 
  392: init_per_suite(Config0) ->
  393:     catch application:stop(crypto),
  394:     try application:start(crypto) of
  395: 	ok ->
  396: 	    ssl_test_lib:clean_start(),
  397: 	    ssl_test_lib:make_rsa_cert(Config0)
  398:     catch _:_ ->
  399: 	    {skip, "Crypto did not start"}
  400:     end.
  401: 
  402: end_per_suite(_Config) ->
  403:     ssl:stop(),
  404:     application:unload(ssl),
  405:     application:stop(crypto).
  406: 
  407: init_per_group(transport_socket, Config) ->
  408:     ssl_test_lib:init_per_group(transport_socket,
  409:                                 [{client_type, erlang},
  410:                                  {server_type, erlang}
  411:                                 | Config]);
  412: init_per_group(GroupName, Config) ->
  413:     case ssl_test_lib:is_protocol_version(GroupName) of
  414:         true  ->
  415:             ssl_test_lib:init_per_group(GroupName, 
  416:                                         [{client_type, erlang},
  417:                                          {server_type, erlang},
  418:                                          {version, GroupName}
  419:                                         | Config]);
  420:         false ->
  421:             Config
  422:     end.
  423: 
  424: end_per_group(GroupName, Config) ->
  425:     ssl_test_lib:end_per_group(GroupName, Config).
  426: 
  427: init_per_testcase(handshake_continue_tls13_client, Config) ->
  428:     case ssl_test_lib:sufficient_crypto_support('tlsv1.3') of
  429:         true ->
  430:             ssl_test_lib:ct_log_supported_protocol_versions(Config),
  431:             ct:timetrap({seconds, 10}),
  432:             Config;
  433:         false ->
  434:             {skip, "Missing crypto support: TLS 1.3 not supported"}
  435:     end;
  436: init_per_testcase(connection_information_with_srp, Config) ->
  437:     PKAlg = proplists:get_value(public_keys, crypto:supports()),
  438:     case lists:member(srp, PKAlg) of
  439:         true ->
  440:             Config;
  441:         false ->
  442:             {skip, "Missing SRP crypto support"}
  443:     end;
  444: init_per_testcase(conf_signature_algs, Config) ->
  445:     case ssl_test_lib:appropriate_sha(crypto:supports()) of
  446:         sha256 ->
  447:             ssl_test_lib:ct_log_supported_protocol_versions(Config),
  448:             ct:timetrap({seconds, 10}),
  449:             Config;
  450:         sha ->
  451:             {skip, "Tests needs certs with sha256"}
  452:     end;
  453: init_per_testcase(check_random_nonce, Config) ->
  454:     ssl_test_lib:ct_log_supported_protocol_versions(Config),
  455:     ct:timetrap({seconds, 20}),
  456:     Config;
  457: init_per_testcase(select_best_cert, Config) ->
  458:     ct:timetrap({seconds, 10}),
  459:     Version = ssl_test_lib:protocol_version(Config),
  460:     %% We need to make sure TLS-1.3 can be supported as
  461:     %% want to generate a TLS-1.3 specific certificate that will not
  462:     %% be chosen
  463:     case Version of
  464:         'tlsv1.2' ->
  465:               case ssl_test_lib:sufficient_crypto_support('tlsv1.3') of
  466:                   true ->
  467:                       Config;
  468:                   false ->
  469:                       {skip, "Crypto does not support EDDSA"}
  470:               end;
  471:         _ ->
  472:             Config
  473:     end;
  474: init_per_testcase(_TestCase, Config) ->
  475:     ssl_test_lib:ct_log_supported_protocol_versions(Config),
  476:     ct:timetrap({seconds, 10}),
  477:     Config.
  478: 
  479: end_per_testcase(_TestCase, Config) ->     
  480:     Config.
  481: 
  482: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  483: %% Test Cases --------------------------------------------------------
  484: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  485: peercert() ->
  486:     [{doc,"Test API function peercert/1"}].
  487: peercert(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  488:     ClientOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_rsa_verify_opts, Config),
  489:     ServerOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_rsa_opts, Config),
  490:     {ClientNode, ServerNode, Hostname} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
  491: 
  492:     Server = ssl_test_lib:start_server([{node, ClientNode}, {port, 0},
  493: 					{from, self()},
  494: 			   {mfa, {ssl, peercert, []}},
  495: 			   {options, ServerOpts}]),
  496:     Port = ssl_test_lib:inet_port(Server),
  497:     Client = ssl_test_lib:start_client([{node, ServerNode}, {port, Port},
  498: 					{host, Hostname},
  499: 			   {from, self()},
  500: 			   {mfa, {ssl, peercert, []}},
  501: 			   {options, ClientOpts}]),
  502: 
  503:     CertFile = proplists:get_value(certfile, ServerOpts),
  504:     [{'Certificate', BinCert, _}]= ssl_test_lib:pem_to_der(CertFile),
  505: 
  506:     ServerMsg = {error, no_peercert},
  507:     ClientMsg = {ok, BinCert},
  508: 
  509:     ?CT_LOG("Client ~p  Server ~p ~n", [Client, Server]),
  510: 
  511:     ssl_test_lib:check_result(Server, ServerMsg, Client, ClientMsg),
  512: 
  513:     ssl_test_lib:close(Server),
  514:     ssl_test_lib:close(Client).
  515: 
  516: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  517: 
  518: peercert_with_client_cert() ->
  519:     [{doc,"Test API function peercert/1"}].
  520: peercert_with_client_cert(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  521:     ClientOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_rsa_verify_opts, Config),
  522:     ServerOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_rsa_verify_opts, Config),
  523:     {ClientNode, ServerNode, Hostname} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
  524: 
  525:     Server = ssl_test_lib:start_server([{node, ClientNode}, {port, 0},
  526: 					{from, self()},
  527: 			   {mfa, {ssl, peercert, []}},
  528: 			   {options, [{verify, verify_peer} | ServerOpts]}]),
  529:     Port = ssl_test_lib:inet_port(Server),
  530:     Client = ssl_test_lib:start_client([{node, ServerNode}, {port, Port},
  531: 					{host, Hostname},
  532: 			   {from, self()},
  533: 			   {mfa, {ssl, peercert, []}},
  534: 			   {options, ClientOpts}]),
  535: 
  536:     ServerCertFile = proplists:get_value(certfile, ServerOpts),
  537:     [{'Certificate', ServerBinCert, _}]= ssl_test_lib:pem_to_der(ServerCertFile),
  538:      ClientCertFile = proplists:get_value(certfile, ClientOpts),
  539:     [{'Certificate', ClientBinCert, _}]= ssl_test_lib:pem_to_der(ClientCertFile),
  540: 
  541:     ServerMsg = {ok, ClientBinCert},
  542:     ClientMsg = {ok, ServerBinCert},
  543: 
  544:     ?CT_LOG("Client ~p  Server ~p ~n", [Client, Server]),
  545: 
  546:     ssl_test_lib:check_result(Server, ServerMsg, Client, ClientMsg),
  547: 
  548:     ssl_test_lib:close(Server),
  549:     ssl_test_lib:close(Client).
  550: 
  551: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  552: select_best_cert() ->
  553:     [{doc,"Basic test of the certs_keys option."}].
  554: 
  555: select_best_cert(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  556:     Version = ssl_test_lib:protocol_version(Config),
  557:     Conf = test_config(Version, Config),
  558:     lists:foreach(
  559:       fun({#{server_config := SConfig,
  560:              client_config := CConfig},
  561:            {client_peer, CExpected},
  562:            {server_peer, SExpected}}) ->
  563:               selected_peer(CExpected, SExpected,
  564:                             ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(CConfig, Config),
  565:                             ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(SConfig, Config),
  566:                             Conf)
  567:       end, Conf).
  568: 
  569: 
  570: 
  571: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  572: select_sha1_cert() ->
  573:     [{doc,"Use cert signed with rsa and sha1"}].
  574: 
  575: select_sha1_cert(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  576:     Version = ssl_test_lib:protocol_version(Config),
  577:     TestConfRSA =
  578:         public_key:pkix_test_data(#{server_chain =>
  579:                                         #{root => [{digest, sha},
  580:                                                    {key, ssl_test_lib:hardcode_rsa_key(1)}],
  581:                                           intermediates => [[{digest, sha},
  582:                                                              {key, ssl_test_lib:hardcode_rsa_key(2)}]],
  583:                                           peer =>  [{digest, sha}, {key, ssl_test_lib:hardcode_rsa_key(3)}]
  584:                                          },
  585:                                     client_chain =>
  586:                                         #{root => [{digest, sha},
  587:                                                    {key, ssl_test_lib:hardcode_rsa_key(3)}],
  588:                                           intermediates => [[{digest, sha},
  589:                                                              {key, ssl_test_lib:hardcode_rsa_key(2)}]],
  590:                                           peer => [{digest, sha},
  591:                                                    {key, ssl_test_lib:hardcode_rsa_key(1)}]}}),
  592: 
  593:     TestConfECDSA =
  594:         public_key:pkix_test_data(#{server_chain =>
  595:                                         #{root => [{digest, sha},
  596:                                                    {key, {namedCurve, secp256r1}}],
  597:                                           intermediates =>
  598:                                               [[{digest, sha},
  599:                                                 {key,{namedCurve, secp256r1}}]],
  600:                                           peer =>  [{digest, sha},
  601:                                                     {key,{namedCurve, secp256r1}}]
  602:                                          },
  603:                                     client_chain =>
  604:                                         #{root => [{digest, sha},
  605:                                                    {key, {namedCurve, secp256r1}}],
  606:                                           intermediates => [[{digest, sha},
  607:                                                              {key, {namedCurve, secp256r1}}]],
  608:                                           peer => [{digest, sha},
  609:                                                    {key, {namedCurve, secp256r1}}]}}),
  610:     test_sha1_cert_conf(Version, TestConfRSA, TestConfECDSA, Config).
  611: 
  612: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  613: root_any_sign() ->
  614:     [{doc,"Use cert signed with unsupported signature for the root will succeed, "
  615:       "as it is not verified"}].
  616: 
  617: root_any_sign(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  618:     Version = ssl_test_lib:protocol_version(Config),
  619:     #{client_config := CSucess, server_config := SSucess} =
  620:         public_key:pkix_test_data(#{server_chain =>
  621:                                          #{root => [{digest, sha},
  622:                                                     {key, ssl_test_lib:hardcode_rsa_key(1)}],
  623:                                            intermediates => [[{digest, sha256},
  624:                                                               {key, ssl_test_lib:hardcode_rsa_key(2)}]],
  625:                                            peer =>  [{digest, sha256}, {key, ssl_test_lib:hardcode_rsa_key(3)}]
  626:                                           },
  627:                                      client_chain =>
  628:                                          #{root => [{digest, sha},
  629:                                                    {key, ssl_test_lib:hardcode_rsa_key(3)}],
  630:                                            intermediates => [[{digest, sha256},
  631:                                                               {key, ssl_test_lib:hardcode_rsa_key(2)}]],
  632:                                            peer => [{digest, sha256},
  633:                                                     {key, ssl_test_lib:hardcode_rsa_key(1)}]}}),
  634: 
  635:     #{client_config := CFail, server_config := SFail} =
  636:         public_key:pkix_test_data(#{server_chain =>
  637:                                         #{root => [{digest, sha256},
  638:                                                    {key, ssl_test_lib:hardcode_rsa_key(1)}],
  639:                                           intermediates => [[{digest, sha},
  640:                                                              {key, ssl_test_lib:hardcode_rsa_key(2)}]],
  641:                                           peer =>  [{digest, sha256}, {key, ssl_test_lib:hardcode_rsa_key(3)}]
  642:                                          },
  643:                                     client_chain =>
  644:                                         #{root => [{digest, sha256},
  645:                                                    {key, ssl_test_lib:hardcode_rsa_key(3)}],
  646:                                           intermediates => [[{digest, sha},
  647:                                                              {key, ssl_test_lib:hardcode_rsa_key(2)}]],
  648:                                           peer => [{digest, sha256},
  649:                                                    {key, ssl_test_lib:hardcode_rsa_key(1)}]}}),
  650: 
  651:     %% Makes sha1 disallowed for certificate signatures when set explicitly 
  652:     %% (default for signature_algs_cert was changed to allow them if signatures_algs is not set explicitly)
  653:     SigAlgs = ssl:signature_algs(default, Version), 
  654:     %% Root signatures are not validated, so its signature will not fail the connection                             
  655:     ssl_test_lib:basic_test(CSucess, [{verify, verify_peer}, {signature_algs, SigAlgs} | SSucess], Config),
  656:     %% Intermediate cert signatures are validated, so sha1 signatures will fail connection                             
  657:     ssl_test_lib:basic_alert(CFail, [{verify, verify_peer}, {signature_algs, SigAlgs} | SFail],
  658:                              Config, unsupported_certificate).
  659: 
  660: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  661: connection_information() ->
  662:     [{doc,"Test the API function ssl:connection_information/1"}].
  663: connection_information(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  664:     ClientOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_rsa_verify_opts, Config),
  665:     ServerOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_rsa_opts, Config),
  666:     {ClientNode, ServerNode, Hostname} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
  667:     Server = ssl_test_lib:start_server([{node, ServerNode}, {port, 0},
  668: 					{from, self()},
  669: 					{mfa, {?MODULE, connection_information_result, []}},
  670: 					{options, ServerOpts}]),
  671: 
  672:     Port = ssl_test_lib:inet_port(Server),
  673:     Client = ssl_test_lib:start_client([{node, ClientNode}, {port, Port},
  674: 					{host, Hostname},
  675: 			   {from, self()},
  676: 			   {mfa, {?MODULE, connection_information_result, []}},
  677: 			   {options, ClientOpts}]),
  678: 
  679:     ?CT_LOG("Client ~p  Server ~p ~n", [Client, Server]),
  680: 
  681:     ssl_test_lib:check_result(Server, ok, Client, ok),
  682: 
  683:     ssl_test_lib:close(Server),
  684:     ssl_test_lib:close(Client).
  685: 
  686: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  687: connection_information_with_srp() ->
  688:     [{doc,"Test the result of API function ssl:connection_information/1"
  689:           "includes srp_username."}].
  690: connection_information_with_srp(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  691:     run_conn_info_srp_test(srp_anon, 'aes_128_cbc', Config).
  692: 
  693: run_conn_info_srp_test(Kex, Cipher, Config) ->
  694:     Version = ssl_test_lib:protocol_version(Config),
  695:     TestCiphers = ssl_test_lib:test_ciphers(Kex, Cipher, Version),
  696: 
  697:     case TestCiphers of
  698:         [] ->
  699:             {skip, {not_sup, Kex, Cipher, Version}};
  700:         [TestCipher | _T] ->
  701:             do_run_conn_info_srp_test(TestCipher, Version, Config)
  702:     end.
  703: 
  704: do_run_conn_info_srp_test(ErlangCipherSuite, Version, Config) ->
  705:     {ClientNode, ServerNode, Hostname} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
  706: 
  707:     SOpts = [{user_lookup_fun, {fun ssl_test_lib:user_lookup/3, undefined}}],
  708:     COpts = [{verify, verify_none}, {srp_identity, {"Test-User", "secret"}}],
  709: 
  710:     ServerOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(SOpts, Config),
  711:     ClientOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(COpts, Config),
  712: 
  713:     ?CT_LOG("Erlang Cipher Suite is: ~p~n", [ErlangCipherSuite]),
  714: 
  715:     Server =
  716:         ssl_test_lib:start_server([{node, ServerNode}, {port, 0},
  717:                                    {from, self()},
  718:                                    {mfa, {?MODULE, check_srp_in_connection_information, [<<"Test-User">>, server]}},
  719:                                    {options, [{versions, [Version]}, {ciphers, [ErlangCipherSuite]} |
  720:                                               ServerOpts]}]),
  721:     Port = ssl_test_lib:inet_port(Server),
  722:     Client =
  723:         ssl_test_lib:start_client(
  724:           [{node, ClientNode}, {port, Port},
  725:            {host, Hostname},
  726:            {from, self()},
  727:            {mfa, {?MODULE, check_srp_in_connection_information, [<<"Test-User">>, client]}},
  728:            {options, [{versions, [Version]}, {ciphers, [ErlangCipherSuite]} |
  729:                       ClientOpts]}]),
  730: 
  731:     ssl_test_lib:check_result(Server, ok, Client, ok),
  732: 
  733:     ssl_test_lib:close(Server),
  734:     ssl_test_lib:close(Client).
  735: 
  736: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  737: 
  738: secret_connection_info() ->
  739:     [{doc,"Test the API function ssl:connection_information/2"}].
  740: secret_connection_info(Config) when is_list(Config) -> 
  741:     ClientOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_rsa_verify_opts, Config),
  742:     ServerOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_rsa_opts, Config),
  743:     {ClientNode, ServerNode, Hostname} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
  744: 
  745:     Server =
  746:         ssl_test_lib:start_server([{node, ServerNode}, {port, 0},
  747:                                    {from, self()},
  748:                                    {mfa, {?MODULE, secret_connection_info_result, []}},
  749:                                    {options, [{verify, verify_peer} | ServerOpts]}]),
  750:     
  751:     Port = ssl_test_lib:inet_port(Server),
  752:     Client =
  753:         ssl_test_lib:start_client([{node, ClientNode}, {port, Port},
  754:                                    {host, Hostname},
  755:                                    {from, self()},
  756:                                    {mfa, {?MODULE, secret_connection_info_result, []}},
  757:                                    {options,  [{verify, verify_peer} |ClientOpts]}]),
  758:     
  759:     ?CT_LOG("Client ~p  Server ~p ~n", [Client, Server]),
  760: 			   
  761:     ssl_test_lib:check_result(Server, true, Client, true),
  762:     
  763:     ssl_test_lib:close(Server),
  764:     ssl_test_lib:close(Client).
  765: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  766: keylog_connection_info() ->
  767:     [{doc,"Test the API function ssl:connection_information/2"}].
  768: keylog_connection_info(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  769:     keylog_connection_info(Config, true),
  770:     keylog_connection_info(Config, false).
  771: keylog_connection_info(Config, KeepSecrets) ->
  772:     ClientOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_rsa_verify_opts, Config),
  773:     ServerOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_rsa_opts, Config),
  774:     {ClientNode, ServerNode, Hostname} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
  775: 
  776:     Server =
  777:         ssl_test_lib:start_server([{node, ServerNode}, {port, 0},
  778:                                    {from, self()},
  779:                                    {mfa, {?MODULE, keylog_connection_info_result, [KeepSecrets]}},
  780:                                    {options, [{verify, verify_peer}, {keep_secrets, KeepSecrets} | ServerOpts]}]),
  781: 
  782:     Port = ssl_test_lib:inet_port(Server),
  783:     Client =
  784:         ssl_test_lib:start_client([{node, ClientNode}, {port, Port},
  785:                                    {host, Hostname},
  786:                                    {from, self()},
  787:                                    {mfa, {?MODULE, keylog_connection_info_result, [KeepSecrets]}},
  788:                                    {options,  [{verify, verify_peer}, {keep_secrets, KeepSecrets} |ClientOpts]}]),
  789: 
  790:     ?CT_LOG("KeepSecrets ~p Client ~p  Server ~p ~n", [KeepSecrets, Client, Server]),
  791: 
  792:     ServerKeylog = receive
  793:                        {Server, {ok, Keylog}} ->
  794:                            Keylog;
  795:                        {Server, ServerError} ->
  796:                            ct:fail({server, ServerError})
  797:                    after 5000 ->
  798:                            ct:fail({server, timeout})
  799:                    end,
  800: 
  801:     receive
  802:         {Client, {ok, ServerKeylog}} ->
  803:             ok;
  804:         {Client, {ok, ClientKeylog}} ->
  805:             ct:fail({mismatch, {ServerKeylog, ClientKeylog}});
  806:         {Client, ClientError} ->
  807:             ct:fail({client, ClientError})
  808:     after 5000 ->
  809:             ct:fail({client, timeout})
  810:     end,
  811: 
  812:     ssl_test_lib:close(Server),
  813:     ssl_test_lib:close(Client).
  814: 
  815: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  816: dh_params() ->
  817:     [{doc,"Test to specify DH-params file in server."}].
  818: 
  819: dh_params(Config) when is_list(Config) -> 
  820:     ClientOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_rsa_verify_opts, Config),
  821:     ServerOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_rsa_opts, Config),
  822:     DataDir = proplists:get_value(data_dir, Config),
  823:     DHParamFile = filename:join(DataDir, "dHParam.pem"),
  824:     Ciphers = ssl:filter_cipher_suites(ssl:cipher_suites(all, 'tlsv1.2'),
  825:                                        [{key_exchange, fun(srp_rsa)  -> false;
  826:                                                           (srp_anon) -> false;
  827:                                                           (srp_dss) -> false;
  828:                                                           (_) -> true end}]),
  829: 
  830:     {ClientNode, ServerNode, Hostname} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
  831:     
  832:     Server = ssl_test_lib:start_server([{node, ServerNode}, {port, 0}, 
  833: 					{from, self()}, 
  834: 			   {mfa, {ssl_test_lib, send_recv_result_active, []}},
  835: 			   {options, [{dhfile, DHParamFile}, {ciphers, Ciphers} | ServerOpts]}]),
  836:     Port = ssl_test_lib:inet_port(Server),
  837:     Client = ssl_test_lib:start_client([{node, ClientNode}, {port, Port}, 
  838: 					{host, Hostname},
  839: 			   {from, self()}, 
  840: 			   {mfa, {ssl_test_lib, send_recv_result_active, []}},
  841: 			   {options,
  842: 			    [{ciphers,[{dhe_rsa,aes_256_cbc,sha}]} | 
  843: 				       ClientOpts]}]),
  844:     
  845:     ssl_test_lib:check_result(Server, ok, Client, ok),
  846:     
  847:     ssl_test_lib:close(Server),
  848:     ssl_test_lib:close(Client).
  849: 
  850: 
  851: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  852: invalid_dhfile() ->
  853:     [{doc,"Test to check invalid DH-params file in server."}].
  854: invalid_dhfile(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  855:     ClientOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_rsa_verify_opts, Config),
  856:     ServerOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_rsa_opts, Config),
  857:     DataDir = proplists:get_value(data_dir, Config),
  858:     DHParamFile = filename:join(DataDir, "dHParam-invalid.pem"),
  859: 
  860:     {ClientNode, ServerNode, Hostname} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
  861: 
  862:     Server = ssl_test_lib:start_server_error([{node, ServerNode}, {port, 0},
  863:                                               {from, self()},
  864:                                               {mfa, {ssl_test_lib,
  865:                                                      send_recv_result_active,
  866:                                                      []}},
  867:                                                {options, [{dhfile, DHParamFile}
  868:                                                           | ServerOpts]}]),
  869:     Port = ssl_test_lib:inet_port(Server),
  870:     Client = ssl_test_lib:start_client_error([{node, ClientNode}, {port, Port},
  871:                                               {host, Hostname}, {from, self()},
  872:                                               {mfa, {ssl_test_lib,
  873:                                                      send_recv_result_active,
  874:                                                      []}},
  875:                                               {options, [{ciphers,
  876:                                                           [{dhe_rsa,
  877:                                                             aes_256_cbc, sha}]}
  878:                                                          | ClientOpts]}]),
  879: 
  880:     %% assert server error
  881:     [{Server, {error, {options, {dhfile, DHParamFile,
  882:                                  {error, {asn1,
  883:                                           {{invalid_value, 0}, _Stack}}}}}}}] =
  884:         ssl_test_lib:get_result([Server]),
  885: 
  886:     %% assert client error
  887:     ssl_test_lib:check_result(Client, {error, closed}),
  888: 
  889:     ssl_test_lib:close(Server),
  890:     ssl_test_lib:close(Client).
  891: 
  892: 
  893: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  894: conf_signature_algs() ->
  895:     [{doc,"Test to set the signature_algs option on both client and server"}].
  896: conf_signature_algs(Config) when is_list(Config) -> 
  897:     ClientOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_rsa_verify_opts, Config),
  898:     ServerOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_rsa_opts, Config),
  899:     {ClientNode, ServerNode, Hostname} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
  900:     Server = 
  901: 	ssl_test_lib:start_server([{node, ServerNode}, {port, 0}, 
  902: 				   {from, self()}, 
  903: 				   {mfa, {ssl_test_lib, send_recv_result, []}},
  904: 				   {options,  [{active, false}, {signature_algs, [{sha256, rsa}]}, 
  905:                                                {versions, ['tlsv1.2']} | ServerOpts]}]),
  906:     Port = ssl_test_lib:inet_port(Server),
  907:     Client = 
  908: 	ssl_test_lib:start_client([{node, ClientNode}, {port, Port}, 
  909: 				   {host, Hostname},
  910: 				   {from, self()}, 
  911: 				   {mfa, {ssl_test_lib, send_recv_result, []}},
  912: 				   {options, [{active, false}, {signature_algs, [{sha256, rsa}]},
  913:                                               {versions, ['tlsv1.2']} | ClientOpts]}]),
  914:     
  915:     ?CT_LOG("Client ~p  Server ~p ~n", [Client, Server]),
  916:     
  917:     ssl_test_lib:check_result(Server, ok, Client, ok),
  918:     
  919:     ssl_test_lib:close(Server),
  920:     ssl_test_lib:close(Client).
  921:

  923: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  924: no_common_signature_algs()  ->
  925:     [{doc,"Set the signature_algs option so that there client and server does not share any hash sign algorithms"}].
  926: no_common_signature_algs(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  927:     
  928:     ClientOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_rsa_verify_opts, Config),
  929:     ServerOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_rsa_opts, Config),
  930: 
  931:     {ClientNode, ServerNode, Hostname} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
  932: 
  933: 
  934:     Server = ssl_test_lib:start_server_error([{node, ServerNode}, {port, 0},
  935: 					      {from, self()},
  936: 					      {options, [{signature_algs, [{sha256, rsa}]}
  937: 							 | ServerOpts]}]),
  938:     Port = ssl_test_lib:inet_port(Server),
  939:     Client = ssl_test_lib:start_client_error([{node, ClientNode}, {port, Port},
  940:                                               {host, Hostname},
  941:                                               {from, self()},
  942:                                               {options, [{signature_algs, [{sha384, rsa}]}
  943:                                                          | ClientOpts]}]),
  944:     
  945:     ssl_test_lib:check_server_alert(Server, Client, insufficient_security).
  946: 
  947: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  948: handshake_continue() ->
  949:     [{doc, "Test API function ssl:handshake_continue/3"}].
  950: handshake_continue(Config) when is_list(Config) -> 
  951:     ClientOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_rsa_verify_opts, Config),
  952:     ServerOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_rsa_verify_opts, Config),
  953:     {ClientNode, ServerNode, Hostname} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
  954: 
  955:     Server =
  956:         ssl_test_lib:start_server([{node, ServerNode}, {port, 0},
  957:                                    {host, Hostname},
  958:                                    {from, self()},
  959:                                    {mfa, {ssl_test_lib, send_recv_result_active, []}},
  960:                                    {options, ssl_test_lib:ssl_options([{reuseaddr, true},
  961:                                                                             {verify, verify_peer},
  962:                                                                        {handshake, hello} | ServerOpts
  963:                                                                       ],
  964:                                                                       Config)},
  965:                                    {continue_options, proplists:delete(reuseaddr, ServerOpts)}
  966:                                   ]),
  967:     
  968:     Port = ssl_test_lib:inet_port(Server),
  969: 
  970:     Client =
  971:         ssl_test_lib:start_client([{node, ClientNode}, {port, Port},
  972:                                    {host, Hostname},
  973:                                    {from, self()},
  974:                                    {mfa, {ssl_test_lib, send_recv_result_active, []}},
  975:                                    {options, ssl_test_lib:ssl_options([{handshake, hello},
  976:                                                                        {verify, verify_none} | ClientOpts
  977:                                                                       ],
  978:                                                                       Config)},
  979:                                    {continue_options,  [{verify, verify_peer} | ClientOpts]}]),
  980:      
  981:     ssl_test_lib:check_result(Server, ok, Client, ok),
  982:     
  983:     ssl_test_lib:close(Server),
  984:     ssl_test_lib:close(Client).
  985: 
  986: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  987: handshake_continue_tls13_client() ->
  988:     [{doc, "Test API function ssl:handshake_continue/3 with fixed TLS 1.3 client"}].
  989: handshake_continue_tls13_client(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  990:     ClientOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_rsa_verify_opts, Config),
  991:     ServerOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_rsa_opts, Config),
  992:     {ClientNode, ServerNode, Hostname} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
  993:     SCiphers = ssl:filter_cipher_suites(ssl:cipher_suites(all, 'tlsv1.3'),
  994:                                         [{key_exchange, fun(srp_rsa)  -> false;
  995:                                                            (srp_anon) -> false;
  996:                                                            (srp_dss) -> false;
  997:                                                            (_) -> true end}]),
  998:     Server =
  999:         ssl_test_lib:start_server([{node, ServerNode}, {port, 0},
 1000:                                    {from, self()},
 1001:                                    {mfa, {ssl_test_lib, send_recv_result_active, []}},
 1002:                                    {options, ssl_test_lib:ssl_options([{reuseaddr, true},
 1003:                                                                        {verify, verify_peer},
 1004:                                                                        {ciphers, SCiphers},
 1005:                                                                        {handshake, hello} | ServerOpts
 1006:                                                                       ],
 1007:                                                                       Config)},
 1008:                                    {continue_options, proplists:delete(reuseaddr, ServerOpts)}
 1009:                                   ]),
 1010: 
 1011:     Port = ssl_test_lib:inet_port(Server),
 1012: 
 1013:     DummyTicket =
 1014:         <<131,116,0,0,0,5,100,0,4,104,107,100,102,100,0,6,115,104,97,51,
 1015:           56,52,100,0,3,112,115,107,109,0,0,0,48,150,90,38,127,26,12,5,
 1016:           228,180,235,229,214,215,27,236,149,182,82,14,140,50,81,0,150,
 1017:           248,152,180,193,207,80,52,107,196,200,2,77,4,96,140,65,239,205,
 1018:           224,125,129,179,147,103,100,0,3,115,110,105,107,0,25,112,114,
 1019:           111,117,100,102,111,111,116,46,111,116,112,46,101,114,105,99,
 1020:           115,115,111,110,46,115,101,100,0,6,116,105,99,107,101,116,104,6,
 1021:           100,0,18,110,101,119,95,115,101,115,115,105,111,110,95,116,105,

 1023:           0,0,0,0,5,109,0,0,0,113,112,154,74,26,27,0,111,147,51,110,216,
 1024:           43,45,4,100,215,152,195,118,96,22,34,1,184,170,42,166,238,109,
 1025:           187,138,196,147,102,205,116,83,241,174,227,232,156,148,60,153,3,

 1030:           100,0,9,116,105,109,101,115,116,97,109,112,98,93,205,0,44>>,
 1031: 
 1032:     %% Send dummy session ticket to trigger sending of pre_shared_key and
 1033:     %% psk_key_exchange_modes extensions.
 1034:     Client =
 1035:         ssl_test_lib:start_client(
 1036:           [{node, ClientNode}, {port, Port},
 1037:            {host, Hostname},
 1038:            {from, self()},
 1039:            {mfa, {ssl_test_lib, send_recv_result_active, []}},

 1041:                                                {session_tickets, manual},

 1044:                                                            'tlsv1.2',

 1047:                                                           ]},

 1049:                                                {verify, verify_peer} |
 1050:                                                proplists:delete(versions, ClientOpts)
 1051:                                               ],
 1052:                                               Config)},
 1053:            {continue_options, proplists:delete(versions, proplists:delete(reuseaddr, ClientOpts))}]),
 1054: 
 1055:     ssl_test_lib:check_result(Server, ok, Client, ok),
 1056: 
 1057:     ssl_test_lib:close(Server),
 1058:     ssl_test_lib:close(Client).

 1061: handshake_continue_timeout() ->
 1062:     [{doc, "Test API function ssl:handshake_continue/3 with short timeout"}].
 1063: handshake_continue_timeout(Config) when is_list(Config) -> 
 1064:     ClientOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_rsa_verify_opts, Config),
 1065:     ServerOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_rsa_opts, Config),
 1066:     {ClientNode, ServerNode, Hostname} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
 1067: 
 1068:     Server = ssl_test_lib:start_server([{node, ServerNode}, {port, 0},
 1069:                                         {from, self()},
 1070:                                         {timeout, 1},
 1071:                                         {options, ssl_test_lib:ssl_options([{reuseaddr, true}, {handshake, hello},
 1072:                                                                             {verify, verify_none} | ServerOpts],
 1073:                                                                            Config)},
 1074:                                         {continue_options, [{verify, verify_peer} | ServerOpts]}
 1075:                                        ]),
 1076: 
 1077:     Port = ssl_test_lib:inet_port(Server),
 1078: 
 1079: 
 1080:     ssl_test_lib:start_client_error([{node, ClientNode}, {port, Port},
 1081:                                      {host, Hostname},
 1082:                                      {from, self()},
 1083:                                      {options, [{verify, verify_peer} | ClientOpts]}]),
 1084:     
 1085:     ssl_test_lib:check_result(Server, {error,timeout}),
 1086:     ssl_test_lib:close(Server).
 1087: %%------------------------------------------------------------------
 1088: handshake_continue_change_verify() ->
 1089:     [{doc, "Test API function ssl:handshake_continue with updated verify option. "
 1090:       "Use a verification that will fail to make sure verification is run"}].
 1091: handshake_continue_change_verify(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1092:     ClientOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_rsa_verify_opts, Config),
 1093:     ServerOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_rsa_opts, Config),
 1094:     {ClientNode, ServerNode, Hostname} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
 1095: 
 1096:     Server = ssl_test_lib:start_server(
 1097:                [{node, ServerNode}, {port, 0},
 1098:                 {from, self()},
 1099:                 {options, ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(
 1100:                             [{handshake, hello},
 1101:                              {verify, verify_peer} | ServerOpts], Config)},
 1102:                 {continue_options, proplists:delete(reuseaddr, ServerOpts)}]),
 1103: 
 1104:     Port = ssl_test_lib:inet_port(Server),
 1105: 
 1106:     Client = ssl_test_lib:start_client_error(
 1107:                [{node, ClientNode}, {port, Port},
 1108:                 {host, Hostname},
 1109:                 {from, self()},
 1110:                 {options, ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(
 1111:                             [{handshake, hello},
 1112:                              {server_name_indication, "foobar"},
 1113:                              {verify, verify_none}
 1114:                             | ClientOpts], Config)},
 1115:                 {continue_options, [{verify, verify_peer} | ClientOpts]}]),
 1116:     ssl_test_lib:check_client_alert(Client,  handshake_failure).
 1117: 
 1118: %%------------------------------------------------------------------
 1119: handshake_hello_postpone_opts_verify() ->
 1120:    [{doc, "Test that cert key option validation is postponed until full handshake is performed"}].
 1121: handshake_hello_postpone_opts_verify(Config) ->
 1122:     ClientOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_rsa_verify_opts, Config),
 1123:     ServerOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_rsa_verify_opts, Config),
 1124:     TcpPort = ssl_test_lib:inet_port(node()),
 1125:     Host = net_adm:localhost(),
 1126:     Version = ssl_test_lib:protocol_version(Config),
 1127: 
 1128:     {ok,TcpListenSocket} = gen_tcp:listen(TcpPort, [binary, {active, false}, inet, {reuseaddr, true}]),
 1129:     spawn(fun() ->
 1130:                   {ok, TcpSocket} = gen_tcp:accept(TcpListenSocket),
 1131:                   {ok, ASocket, _Ext} = ssl:handshake(TcpSocket, [{handshake, hello}, {versions, [Version]}]),
 1132:                   ssl:handshake_continue(ASocket, ServerOpts, 5000)
 1133:           end),
 1134:     {ok, UpgradeClient} = ssl:connect(Host, TcpPort, ClientOpts),
 1135:     ssl:close(UpgradeClient),
 1136: 
 1137:     Port = ssl_test_lib:inet_port(node()),
 1138:     {ok,TlsListenSocket} = ssl:listen(Port, [binary, {active, false}, inet, {reuseaddr, true}]),
 1139:     spawn(fun() ->
 1140:                   {ok, ASocket} = ssl:transport_accept(TlsListenSocket),
 1141:                   {ok, _Ext} = ssl:handshake(ASocket, [{handshake, hello}, {versions, [Version]}]),
 1142:                   ssl:handshake_continue(ASocket, ServerOpts, 5000)
 1143:           end),
 1144:     {ok, Client} = ssl:connect(Host, Port, [{versions, [Version]} | ClientOpts]),
 1145:     ssl:close(Client).
 1146:

 1152:     ServerOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_rsa_verify_opts, Config),

 1158:                                    {from, self()},

 1160:                                                                        {verify, verify_none} | ServerOpts], Config)},
 1161:                                    {continue_options, [{verify, verify_peer} | ServerOpts]}]),
 1162:

 1164:

 1167:         ssl_test_lib:start_client([{node, ClientNode}, {port, Port},
 1168:                                    {host, Hostname},
 1169:                                    {from, self()},
 1170:                                    {options, ssl_test_lib:ssl_options([{handshake, hello}
 1171:                                                                       | ClientOpts], Config)},
 1172:                                    {continue_options, cancel}]),
 1173:     ssl_test_lib:check_server_alert(Server, user_canceled).

 1211: 
 1212: versions_option_based_on_sni() ->
 1213:     [{doc,"Test that SNI versions option is selected over default versions"}].
 1214: 
 1215: versions_option_based_on_sni(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1216:     ClientOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_rsa_verify_opts, Config),
 1217:     ServerOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_rsa_opts, Config),
 1218:     TestVersion = ssl_test_lib:protocol_version(Config),
 1219:     {Version, Versions} = test_versions_for_option_based_on_sni(TestVersion),
 1220:     {ClientNode, ServerNode, Hostname} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
 1221:     Ciphers = ssl:filter_cipher_suites(ssl:cipher_suites(all, TestVersion),
 1222:                                        [{key_exchange, fun(srp_rsa) -> false;
 1223:                                                           (srp_dss) -> false;
 1224:                                                           (_) -> true
 1225:                                                        end}]),
 1226: 
 1227:     SNI = net_adm:localhost(),
 1228:     Fun = fun(ServerName) ->
 1229:               case ServerName of
 1230:                   SNI ->
 1231:                       [{versions, [Version]}, {ciphers, Ciphers} |
 1232:                        proplists:delete(versions, ServerOpts)];
 1233:                   _ ->
 1234:                       ServerOpts
 1235:               end
 1236:           end,
 1237: 
 1238:     Server = ssl_test_lib:start_server([{node, ServerNode}, {port, 0},
 1239: 					{from, self()},
 1240: 					{mfa, {?MODULE, protocol_version_check, [Version]}},
 1241: 					{options, [{sni_fun, Fun},
 1242:                                                    {versions, Versions} |
 1243:                                                    proplists:delete(versions, ServerOpts)]}]),
 1244:     Port = ssl_test_lib:inet_port(Server),
 1245:     Client = ssl_test_lib:start_client([{node, ClientNode}, {port, Port},
 1246: 					{host, Hostname},
 1247: 					{from, self()},
 1248: 					{mfa, {ssl_test_lib, no_result, []}},
 1249: 					{options, [{server_name_indication, SNI}, {versions, Versions},
 1250:                                                    {ciphers, Ciphers}
 1251:                                                   | proplists:delete(versions, ClientOpts)]}]),
 1252: 
 1253:     ssl_test_lib:check_result(Server, ok),
 1254:     ssl_test_lib:close(Server),
 1255:     ssl_test_lib:close(Client).
 1256: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 1257: 
 1258: ciphers_option_based_on_sni() ->
 1259:     [{doc,"Test that SNI versions option is selected over default ciphers option"}].
 1260: 
 1261: ciphers_option_based_on_sni(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1262:     ClientOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_rsa_verify_opts, Config),
 1263:     ServerOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_rsa_opts, Config),
 1264:     TestVersion = ssl_test_lib:protocol_version(Config),
 1265:     Suites = rsa_cipher_suites_not_default(TestVersion),
 1266:     {ClientNode, ServerNode, Hostname} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
 1267: 
 1268:     SNI = net_adm:localhost(),
 1269:     Fun = fun(ServerName) ->
 1270:               case ServerName of
 1271:                   SNI ->
 1272:                       [{ciphers, Suites} | ServerOpts];
 1273:                   _ ->
 1274:                       ServerOpts
 1275:               end
 1276:           end,
 1277: 
 1278:     Server = ssl_test_lib:start_server([{node, ServerNode}, {port, 0},
 1279: 					{from, self()},
 1280: 					{mfa, {?MODULE, suite_check, [TestVersion]}},
 1281: 					{options, [{sni_fun, Fun} | ServerOpts]}]),
 1282:     Port = ssl_test_lib:inet_port(Server),
 1283:     Client = ssl_test_lib:start_client([{node, ClientNode}, {port, Port},
 1284: 					{host, Hostname},
 1285: 					{from, self()},
 1286: 					{mfa, {ssl_test_lib, no_result, []}},
 1287: 					{options, [{server_name_indication, SNI} | ClientOpts]}]),
 1288: 
 1289:     ssl_test_lib:check_result(Server, ok),
 1290:     ssl_test_lib:close(Server),
 1291:     ssl_test_lib:close(Client).
 1292: 
 1293: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 1294: %% Test case adapted from gen_tcp_misc_SUITE.
 1295: active_n() ->
 1296:     [{doc,"Test {active,N} option"}].
 1297: 
 1298: active_n(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1299:     ClientOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_rsa_verify_opts, Config),
 1300:     ServerOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_rsa_opts, Config),
 1301:     Port = ssl_test_lib:inet_port(node()),
 1302:     Host = net_adm:localhost(),
 1303:     N = 3,
 1304:     LS = ok(ssl:listen(Port, [{active,N}|ServerOpts])),
 1305:     [{active,N}] = ok(ssl:getopts(LS, [active])),
 1306:     active_n_common(LS, N),
 1307:     Self = self(),
 1308:     spawn_link(fun() ->
 1309:         S0 = ok(ssl:transport_accept(LS)),
 1310:         {ok, S} = ssl:handshake(S0),
 1311:         ok = ssl:setopts(S, [{active,N}]),
 1312:         [{active,N}] = ok(ssl:getopts(S, [active])),
 1313:         ssl:controlling_process(S, Self),
 1314:         Self ! {server, S}
 1315:     end),
 1316:     C = ok(ssl:connect(Host, Port, [{active,N}|ClientOpts])),
 1317:     [{active,N}] = ok(ssl:getopts(C, [active])),
 1318:     S = receive
 1319:         {server, S0} -> S0
 1320:     after
 1321:         1000 ->
 1322:             exit({error, connect})
 1323:     end,
 1324:     active_n_common(C, N),
 1325:     active_n_common(S, N),
 1326:     ok = ssl:setopts(C, [{active,N}]),
 1327:     ok = ssl:setopts(S, [{active,N}]),
 1328:     ReceiveMsg = fun(Socket, Msg) ->
 1329:         receive
 1330:             {ssl,Socket,Msg} ->
 1331:                 ok;
 1332:             {ssl,Socket,Begin} ->
 1333:                 receive
 1334:                     {ssl,Socket,End} ->
 1335:                         Msg = Begin ++ End,
 1336:                         ok
 1337:                 after 1000 ->
 1338:                     exit(timeout)
 1339:                 end
 1340:         after 1000 ->
 1341:             exit(timeout)
 1342:         end
 1343:     end,
 1344:     repeat(3, fun(I) ->
 1345:         Msg = "message "++integer_to_list(I),
 1346:         ok = ssl:send(C, Msg),
 1347:         ReceiveMsg(S, Msg),
 1348:         ok = ssl:send(S, Msg),
 1349:         ReceiveMsg(C, Msg)
 1350:     end),
 1351:     receive
 1352:         {ssl_passive,S} ->
 1353:             [{active,false}] = ok(ssl:getopts(S, [active]))
 1354:     after
 1355:         1000 ->
 1356:             exit({error,ssl_passive})
 1357:     end,
 1358:     receive
 1359:         {ssl_passive,C} ->
 1360:             [{active,false}] = ok(ssl:getopts(C, [active]))
 1361:     after
 1362:         1000 ->
 1363:             exit({error,ssl_passive})
 1364:     end,
 1365:     LS2 = ok(ssl:listen(0, [{active,0}])),
 1366:     receive
 1367:         {ssl_passive,LS2} ->
 1368:             [{active,false}] = ok(ssl:getopts(LS2, [active]))
 1369:     after
 1370:         1000 ->
 1371:             exit({error,ssl_passive})
 1372:     end,
 1373:     ok = ssl:close(LS2),
 1374:     ok = ssl:close(C),
 1375:     ok = ssl:close(S),
 1376:     ok = ssl:close(LS),
 1377:     ok.
 1378: 
 1379: hibernate_client() ->
 1380:     [{doc,"Check that an SSL connection on client side that is started with "
 1381:       "option hibernate_after indeed hibernates after inactivity"}].
 1382: 
 1383: hibernate_client(Config) ->
 1384:     ClientOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_rsa_verify_opts, Config),
 1385:     ServerOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_rsa_opts, Config),
 1386:     {ClientNode, ServerNode, Hostname} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
 1387:     StartServerOpts = [return_socket, {node, ServerNode},
 1388:                        {port, 0}, {from, self()},
 1389:                        {mfa, {ssl_test_lib, send_recv_result_active, []}},
 1390:                        {options, [{hibernate_after, infinity} | ServerOpts]}],
 1391:     StartClientOpts = [return_socket, {node, ClientNode}, {host, Hostname},
 1392:                        {from, self()},
 1393:                        {mfa, {ssl_test_lib, send_recv_result_active, []}}],
 1394:     [ok = hibernate_helper(?config(version, Config), false,
 1395:                            StartServerOpts, StartClientOpts,
 1396:                            ServerOpts, ClientOpts, T, infinity) ||
 1397:         T <- [1000, 0, 1]].
 1398: 
 1399: hibernate_server() ->
 1400:     [{doc,"Check that an SSL connection on server side that is started with "
 1401:       "option hibernate_after indeed hibernates after inactivity."
 1402:       "Note: for DTLS test will not be stable, because cookie secret refresh "
 1403:       "mechanism might disturb hibernation of a server process."}].
 1404: hibernate_server(Config) ->
 1405:     ClientOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_rsa_verify_opts, Config),
 1406:     ServerOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_rsa_opts, Config),
 1407:     {ClientNode, ServerNode, Hostname} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
 1408:     StartServerOpts = [return_socket, {node, ServerNode}, {port, 0},
 1409:                        {from, self()},
 1410:                        {mfa, {ssl_test_lib, send_recv_result_active, []}}],
 1411:     StartClientOpts = [return_socket, {node, ClientNode}, {host, Hostname},
 1412:                        {from, self()},
 1413:                        {mfa, {ssl_test_lib, send_recv_result_active, []}}],
 1414:     [ok = hibernate_helper(?config(version, Config), true,
 1415:                            StartServerOpts, StartClientOpts,
 1416:                            ServerOpts, ClientOpts, infinity, T) ||
 1417:         T <- [1000, 0, 1]].
 1418: 
 1419: hibernate_helper(Version, CheckServer, StartServerOpts, StartClientOpts,
 1420:                  ServerOpts0, ClientOpts0,
 1421:                  ClientHibernateAfter, ServerHibernateAfter) ->
 1422:     AllServerOpts = StartServerOpts ++
 1423:         [{options, [{hibernate_after, ServerHibernateAfter} | ServerOpts0]}],
 1424:     Server = ssl_test_lib:start_server(AllServerOpts),
 1425:     Port = ssl_test_lib:inet_port(Server),
 1426:     AllClientOpts = StartClientOpts ++
 1427:         [{port, Port},
 1428:          {options, [{hibernate_after, ClientHibernateAfter} | ClientOpts0]}],
 1429:     {Client, #sslsocket{connection_handler = ClientReceiverPid,
 1430:                         payload_sender = ClientPotentialSenderPid}} =
 1431:         ssl_test_lib:start_client(AllClientOpts),
 1432:     Results = ssl_test_lib:get_result([Client, Server]),
 1433:     {ok, ServerAcceptSocket} = proplists:get_value(Server, Results),
 1434:     ok = proplists:get_value(Client, Results),
 1435:     #sslsocket{connection_handler = ServerReceiverPid,
 1436:                payload_sender = ServerPotentialSenderPid} =
 1437:         ServerAcceptSocket,
 1438:     {ReceiverPid, PotentialSenderPid, HibernateAfter} =
 1439:         case CheckServer of
 1440:             true -> {ServerReceiverPid, ServerPotentialSenderPid,
 1441:                      ServerHibernateAfter};
 1442:             false -> {ClientReceiverPid, ClientPotentialSenderPid,
 1443:                       ClientHibernateAfter}
 1444:         end,
 1445:     SleepAmount = max(1.5*HibernateAfter, 500),
 1446:     ?CT_LOG("HibernateAfter = ~w SleepAmount = ~w", [HibernateAfter, SleepAmount]),
 1447:     ct:sleep(SleepAmount), %% Schedule out
 1448:     {current_function, {erlang, hibernate, 3}} =
 1449:         process_info(ReceiverPid, current_function),
 1450:     IsTls = ssl_test_lib:is_tls_version(Version),
 1451:     case IsTls of
 1452:         true ->
 1453:             SenderPid = PotentialSenderPid,
 1454:             {current_function, {erlang, hibernate, 3}} =
 1455:                 process_info(SenderPid, current_function);
 1456:         _ -> %% DTLS (no sender process)
 1457:             ok
 1458:     end,
 1459:     ssl_test_lib:close(Server),
 1460:     ssl_test_lib:close(Client),
 1461:     ok.
 1462: 
 1463: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 1464: listen_socket() ->
 1465:     [{doc,"Check error handling and inet compliance when calling API functions with listen sockets."}].
 1466: 
 1467: listen_socket(Config) ->
 1468:     ServerOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_rsa_opts, Config),
 1469:     {ok, ListenSocket} = ssl:listen(0, ServerOpts),
 1470:     Protocol = proplists:get_value(protocol, ServerOpts, tls),
 1471:     %% This can be a valid thing to do as
 1472:     %% options are inherited by the accept socket
 1473:     ok = ssl:controlling_process(ListenSocket, self()),
 1474: 
 1475:     {ok, _} = ssl:sockname(ListenSocket),
 1476: 
 1477:     {error, _enotconn} = ssl:send(ListenSocket, <<"data">>),
 1478:     {error, enotconn} = ssl:recv(ListenSocket, 0),
 1479:     {error, enotconn} = ssl:connection_information(ListenSocket),
 1480:     {error, enotconn} = ssl:peername(ListenSocket),
 1481:     {error, enotconn} = ssl:peercert(ListenSocket),
 1482:     {error, enotconn} = ssl:renegotiate(ListenSocket),
 1483:     {error, enotconn} = ssl:export_key_materials(ListenSocket, [<<"Label">>], [<<"Context">>], 256),
 1484:     %% Legacy test
 1485:     {error, enotconn} = ssl:prf(ListenSocket, master_secret,
 1486:                                 <<"Label">>, [client_random, server_random], 256),
 1487:     case Protocol of
 1488:         tls ->
 1489:             {error, enotconn} = ssl:shutdown(ListenSocket, read_write);
 1490:         dtls ->
 1491:             {error, notsup} = ssl:shutdown(ListenSocket, read_write)
 1492:     end,
 1493:     ok = ssl:close(ListenSocket).
 1494: 
 1495: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 1496: peername() ->
 1497:     [{doc,"Test API function peername/1"}].
 1498: 
 1499: peername(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1500:     ClientOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_rsa_verify_opts, Config),
 1501:     ServerOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_rsa_verify_opts, Config),
 1502:     {ClientNode, ServerNode, Hostname} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
 1503: 
 1504:     Server = ssl_test_lib:start_server(
 1505:                [
 1506:                 {node, ServerNode}, {port, 0},
 1507:                 {from, self()},
 1508:                 {options, ServerOpts}]),
 1509:     Port = ssl_test_lib:inet_port(Server),
 1510:     {Client, CSocket} = ssl_test_lib:start_client(
 1511:                           [return_socket,
 1512:                            {node, ClientNode}, {port, Port},
 1513:                            {host, Hostname},
 1514:                            {from, self()},
 1515:                            {options, ClientOpts}]),
 1516: 
 1517:     ?CT_LOG("Client ~p  Server ~p ~n", [Client, Server]),
 1518: 
 1519:     Server ! get_socket,
 1520:     SSocket =
 1521:         receive
 1522:             {Server, {socket, Socket}} ->
 1523:                 Socket
 1524:         end,
 1525: 
 1526:     {ok, ServerPeer} = ssl:peername(SSocket),
 1527:     ?CT_LOG("Server's peer: ~p~n", [ServerPeer]),
 1528:     {ok, ClientPeer} = ssl:peername(CSocket),
 1529:     ?CT_LOG("Client's peer: ~p~n", [ClientPeer]),
 1530: 
 1531:     ssl_test_lib:close(Server),
 1532:     ssl_test_lib:close(Client).
 1533: 
 1534: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 1535: 
 1536: recv_active() ->
 1537:     [{doc,"Test recv on active socket"}].
 1538: 
 1539: recv_active(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1540:     ClientOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_rsa_verify_opts, Config),
 1541:     ServerOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_rsa_opts, Config),
 1542:     {ClientNode, ServerNode, Hostname} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
 1543:     Server = 
 1544: 	ssl_test_lib:start_server([{node, ServerNode}, {port, 0}, 
 1545: 				   {from, self()}, 
 1546: 				   {mfa, {?MODULE, try_recv_active, []}},
 1547: 				   {options,  [{active, true} | ServerOpts]}]),
 1548:     Port = ssl_test_lib:inet_port(Server),
 1549:     Client = 
 1550: 	ssl_test_lib:start_client([{node, ClientNode}, {port, Port}, 
 1551: 				   {host, Hostname},
 1552: 				   {from, self()}, 
 1553: 				   {mfa, {?MODULE, try_recv_active, []}},
 1554: 				   {options, [{active, true} | ClientOpts]}]),
 1555:         
 1556:     ssl_test_lib:check_result(Server, ok, Client, ok),
 1557:     
 1558:     ssl_test_lib:close(Server),
 1559:     ssl_test_lib:close(Client).
 1560:

 1620:     {ClientNode, ServerNode, Hostname} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
 1621: 
 1622:     Server =
 1623: 	ssl_test_lib:start_server([{node, ServerNode}, {port, 0},
 1624: 				   {from, self()},
 1625: 				   {mfa, {?MODULE, send_recv_result_timeout_server, []}},
 1626: 				   {options, [{active, false} | ServerOpts]}]),
 1627:     Port = ssl_test_lib:inet_port(Server),
 1628: 
 1629:     Client = ssl_test_lib:start_client([{node, ClientNode}, {port, Port},
 1630: 					{host, Hostname},
 1631: 					{from, self()},

 1633: 					       send_recv_result_timeout_client, []}},
 1634: 					{options, [{active, false} | ClientOpts]}]),

 1637:     ssl_test_lib:close(Server),

 1641: recv_close() ->
 1642:     [{doc,"Special case of call error handling"}].
 1643: recv_close(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1644:     ClientOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_rsa_verify_opts, Config),
 1645:     ServerOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_rsa_opts, Config),
 1646: 
 1647:     {ClientNode, ServerNode, Hostname} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
 1648:     Server  = ssl_test_lib:start_server([{node, ServerNode}, {port, 0},
 1649: 					  {from, self()},
 1650: 					  {mfa, {?MODULE, do_recv_close, []}},
 1651: 					 {options, [{active, false} | ServerOpts]}]),
 1652:     Port = ssl_test_lib:inet_port(Server),
 1653:     {_Client, #sslsocket{} = SslSocket} = ssl_test_lib:start_client([return_socket,
 1654: 									   {node, ClientNode}, {port, Port},
 1655: 									   {host, Hostname},
 1656: 									   {from, self()},
 1657: 									   {mfa, {ssl_test_lib, no_result, []}},
 1658: 									   {options, ClientOpts}]),
 1659:     ssl:close(SslSocket),
 1660:     ssl_test_lib:check_result(Server, ok).

 1685: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 1686: controlling_process() ->
 1687:     [{doc,"Test API function controlling_process/2"}].
 1688: 
 1689: controlling_process(Config) when is_list(Config) -> 
 1690:     ClientOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_rsa_verify_opts, Config),
 1691:     ServerOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_rsa_opts, Config),
 1692:     {ClientNode, ServerNode, Hostname} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
 1693:     ClientMsg = "Server hello",
 1694:     ServerMsg = "Client hello",
 1695:    
 1696:     Server = ssl_test_lib:start_server([
 1697:                                         {node, ServerNode}, {port, 0}, 
 1698:                                         {from, self()}, 
 1699:                                         {mfa, {?MODULE, 
 1700:                                                controlling_process_result, [self(),
 1701:                                                                             ServerMsg]}},
 1702:                                         {options, ServerOpts}]),
 1703:     Port = ssl_test_lib:inet_port(Server),
 1704:     {Client, CSocket} = ssl_test_lib:start_client([return_socket,
 1705:                                                    {node, ClientNode}, {port, Port}, 
 1706:                                                    {host, Hostname},
 1707:                                         {from, self()}, 
 1708: 			   {mfa, {?MODULE, 
 1709: 				  controlling_process_result, [self(),
 1710: 							       ClientMsg]}},
 1711: 			   {options, ClientOpts}]),
 1712:     
 1713:     ?CT_LOG("Client ~p  Server ~p ~n", [Client, Server]),
 1714:     
 1715:     ServerMsg = ssl_test_lib:active_recv(CSocket, length(ServerMsg)),
 1716:     %% We do not have the TLS server socket but all messages form the client
 1717:     %% socket are now read, so ramining are form the server socket
 1718:     ClientMsg = ssl_active_recv(length(ClientMsg)),
 1719: 
 1720:     ssl_test_lib:close(Server),
 1721:     ssl_test_lib:close(Client).
 1722: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 1723: controller_dies() ->
 1724:     [{doc,"Test that the socket is closed after controlling process dies"}].
 1725: controller_dies(Config) when is_list(Config) -> 
 1726:     ClientOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_rsa_verify_opts, Config),
 1727:     ServerOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_rsa_opts, Config),
 1728:     {ClientNode, ServerNode, Hostname} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
 1729:     ClientMsg = "Hello server",
 1730:     ServerMsg = "Hello client",
 1731: 
 1732:     Server = ssl_test_lib:start_server([{node, ServerNode}, {port, 0}, 
 1733: 					{from, self()}, 
 1734: 					{mfa, {?MODULE, 
 1735: 					       controller_dies_result, [self(),
 1736: 									ServerMsg]}},
 1737: 					{options, ServerOpts}]),
 1738:     Port = ssl_test_lib:inet_port(Server),
 1739:     Client = ssl_test_lib:start_client([{node, ClientNode}, {port, Port}, 
 1740: 					{host, Hostname},
 1741: 					{from, self()}, 
 1742: 					{mfa, {?MODULE, 
 1743: 					       controller_dies_result, [self(),
 1744: 									    ClientMsg]}},
 1745: 					{options, ClientOpts}]),
 1746: 
 1747:     ?CT_LOG("Client ~p  Server ~p ~n", [Client, Server]),
 1748:     ct:sleep(?SLEEP), %% so that they are connected
 1749:     
 1750:     process_flag(trap_exit, true),
 1751: 
 1752:     %% Test that clients die
 1753:     exit(Client, killed),
 1754:     get_close(Client, ?LINE),
 1755: 
 1756:     %% Test that clients die when process disappear
 1757:     Server ! listen, 
 1758:     Tester = self(),
 1759:     Connect = fun(Pid) ->
 1760: 		      {ok, Socket} = ssl:connect(Hostname, Port, ClientOpts),
 1761: 		      %% Make sure server finishes and verification
 1762: 		      %% and is in coonection state before
 1763: 		      %% killing client
 1764: 		      ct:sleep(?SLEEP),
 1765: 		      Pid ! {self(), connected, Socket},
 1766: 		      receive die_nice -> normal end
 1767: 	      end,
 1768:     Client2 = spawn_link(fun() -> Connect(Tester) end),
 1769:     receive {Client2, connected, _Socket} ->  Client2 ! die_nice end,
 1770:     
 1771:     get_close(Client2, ?LINE),
 1772:     
 1773:     %% Test that clients die when the controlling process have changed 
 1774:     Server ! listen, 
 1775: 
 1776:     Client3 = spawn_link(fun() -> Connect(Tester) end),
 1777:     Controller = spawn_link(fun() -> receive die_nice -> normal end end),
 1778:     receive 
 1779: 	{Client3, connected, Socket} ->  
 1780: 	    ok = ssl:controlling_process(Socket, Controller),
 1781: 	    Client3 ! die_nice 
 1782:     end,
 1783: 
 1784:     ?CT_LOG("Waiting on exit ~p~n",[Client3]),
 1785:     receive {'EXIT', Client3, normal} -> ok end,
 1786:     
 1787:     receive   %% Client3 is dead but that doesn't matter, socket should not be closed.
 1788: 	Unexpected ->
 1789: 	    ?CT_LOG("Unexpected ~p~n",[Unexpected]),
 1790: 	    ct:fail({line, ?LINE-1})
 1791:     after 1000 ->
 1792: 	    ok
 1793:     end,
 1794:     Controller ! die_nice,
 1795:     get_close(Controller, ?LINE),
 1796:     
 1797:     %% Test that servers die
 1798:     Server ! listen, 
 1799:     LastClient = ssl_test_lib:start_client([{node, ClientNode}, {port, Port}, 
 1800: 					    {host, Hostname},
 1801: 					    {from, self()}, 
 1802: 					    {mfa, {?MODULE, 
 1803: 						   controller_dies_result, [self(),
 1804: 									    ClientMsg]}},
 1805: 					    {options, ClientOpts}]),
 1806:     ct:sleep(?SLEEP), %% so that they are connected
 1807:     
 1808:     exit(Server, killed),
 1809:     get_close(Server, ?LINE),
 1810:     process_flag(trap_exit, false),
 1811:     ssl_test_lib:close(LastClient).
 1812: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 1813: controlling_process_transport_accept_socket() ->
 1814:     [{doc,"Only ssl:handshake and ssl:controlling_process is allowed for transport_accept:sockets"}].
 1815: controlling_process_transport_accept_socket(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1816:     ServerOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_rsa_opts, Config),
 1817:     ClientOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_rsa_verify_opts, Config),
 1818:     {ClientNode, ServerNode, Hostname} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
 1819: 
 1820:     Server = ssl_test_lib:start_server_transport_control([{node, ServerNode}, 
 1821:                                                           {port, 0},
 1822:                                                           {from, self()},
 1823:                                                           {options, ServerOpts}]),
 1824:     Port = ssl_test_lib:inet_port(Server),
 1825:     
 1826:     _Client = ssl_test_lib:start_client_error([{node, ClientNode}, {port, Port},
 1827:                                               {host, Hostname},
 1828:                                               {from, self()},
 1829:                                               {options, ClientOpts}]),
 1830:     ssl_test_lib:check_result(Server, ok),
 1831:     ssl_test_lib:close(Server).
 1832: 
 1833: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 1834: close_with_timeout() ->
 1835:       [{doc,"Test normal (not downgrade) ssl:close/2"}].
 1836: close_with_timeout(Config) when is_list(Config) ->

 1838:     ServerOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_rsa_opts, Config),

 1840:     {ClientNode, ServerNode, Hostname} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
 1841: 
 1842:     Server = ssl_test_lib:start_server([{node, ServerNode}, {port, 0},
 1843: 					{from, self()},
 1844: 					{mfa, {?MODULE, tls_close, []}},
 1845: 					{options,[{active, false} | ServerOpts]}]),
 1846:     Port = ssl_test_lib:inet_port(Server),
 1847:     Client = ssl_test_lib:start_client([{node, ClientNode}, {port, Port},
 1848: 					{host, Hostname},

 1851: 					{options, [{active, false} |ClientOpts]}]),

 1855: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 1856: close_in_error_state() ->
 1857:     [{doc,"Special case of closing socket in error state"}].
 1858: close_in_error_state(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1859:     ServerOpts0 = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_rsa_opts, Config),
 1860:     ServerOpts = [{cacertfile, "foo.pem"} | proplists:delete(cacertfile, ServerOpts0)],
 1861:     ClientOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_opts, Config),
 1862: 
 1863:     _ = spawn(?MODULE, run_error_server_close, [[self() | ServerOpts]]),
 1864:     receive
 1865:         {_Pid, Port} ->
 1866:             spawn_link(?MODULE, run_client_error, [[Port, [{verify, verify_none} | ClientOpts]]])
 1867:     end,
 1868:     receive
 1869:         ok ->
 1870:             ok;
 1871:         Other ->
 1872:             ct:fail(Other)
 1873:     end.
 1874: 
 1875: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 1876: call_in_error_state() ->
 1877:     [{doc,"Special case of call error handling"}].
 1878: call_in_error_state(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1879:     ServerOpts0 = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_rsa_opts, Config),
 1880:     ClientOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_opts, Config),
 1881:     ServerOpts = [{cacertfile, "foo.pem"} | proplists:delete(cacertfile, ServerOpts0)],
 1882:     Pid = spawn(?MODULE, run_error_server, [[self() | ServerOpts]]),
 1883:     receive
 1884:         {Pid, Port} ->
 1885:             spawn_link(?MODULE, run_client_error, [[Port, [{verify, verify_none} | ClientOpts]]])
 1886:     end,
 1887:     receive
 1888:         {error, closed} ->
 1889:             ok;
 1890:         Other ->
 1891:             ct:fail(Other)
 1892:     end.
 1893: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 1894: close_transport_accept() ->
 1895:     [{doc,"Tests closing ssl socket when waiting on ssl:transport_accept/1"}].
 1896: 
 1897: close_transport_accept(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1898:     ServerOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_rsa_opts, Config),
 1899:     {_ClientNode, ServerNode, _Hostname} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
 1900: 
 1901:     Port = 0,
 1902:     Opts = [{active, false} | ServerOpts],
 1903:     {ok, ListenSocket} = rpc:call(ServerNode, ssl, listen, [Port, Opts]),
 1904:     spawn_link(fun() ->
 1905: 			ct:sleep(?SLEEP),
 1906: 			rpc:call(ServerNode, ssl, close, [ListenSocket])
 1907: 	       end),
 1908:     case rpc:call(ServerNode, ssl, transport_accept, [ListenSocket]) of
 1909: 	{error, closed} ->
 1910: 	    ok;
 1911: 	Other ->
 1912: 	    exit({?LINE, Other})
 1913:     end.
 1914: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 1915: abuse_transport_accept_socket() ->
 1916:     [{doc,"Only ssl:handshake and ssl:controlling_process is allowed for transport_accept:sockets"}].
 1917: abuse_transport_accept_socket(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1918:     ServerOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_rsa_opts, Config),
 1919:     ClientOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_rsa_verify_opts, Config),
 1920:     {ClientNode, ServerNode, Hostname} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
 1921: 
 1922:     Server = ssl_test_lib:start_server_transport_abuse_socket([{node, ServerNode}, 
 1923:                                                                {port, 0},
 1924:                                                                {from, self()},
 1925:                                                                {options, ServerOpts}]),
 1926:     Port = ssl_test_lib:inet_port(Server),
 1927:     Client = ssl_test_lib:start_client([{node, ClientNode}, {port, Port},
 1928:                                         {host, Hostname},
 1929:                                         {from, self()},
 1930:                                         {mfa, {ssl_test_lib, no_result, []}},
 1931:                                         {options, ClientOpts}]),
 1932:     ssl_test_lib:check_result(Server, ok),
 1933:     ssl_test_lib:close(Server),
 1934:     ssl_test_lib:close(Client).
 1935:
