 1937: 
 1938: invalid_keyfile() ->
 1939:     [{doc,"Test what happens with an invalid key file"}].
 1940: invalid_keyfile(Config) when is_list(Config) -> 
 1941:     ClientOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_rsa_verify_opts, Config),
 1942:     ServerOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_rsa_opts, Config),
 1943:     BadKeyFile = filename:join([proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config), 
 1944: 			      "badkey.pem"]),
 1945:     BadOpts = [{keyfile, BadKeyFile}| proplists:delete(keyfile, ServerOpts)],
 1946:     {ClientNode, ServerNode, Hostname} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
 1947: 
 1948:     Server = 
 1949: 	ssl_test_lib:start_server_error([{node, ServerNode}, {port, 0}, 
 1950: 					 {from, self()},
 1951: 			    {options, BadOpts}]),
 1952: 
 1953:     Port = ssl_test_lib:inet_port(Server),
 1954: 
 1955:     Client =
 1956: 	ssl_test_lib:start_client_error([{node, ClientNode}, 
 1957: 			    {port, Port}, {host, Hostname},
 1958: 			    {from, self()},  {options, ClientOpts}]),
 1959: 
 1960:     File = proplists:get_value(keyfile,BadOpts),    
 1961:     ssl_test_lib:check_result(Server,
 1962:                               {error,{options, {keyfile, File, {error,enoent}}}}, Client,
 1963:                               {error, closed}).
 1964: 
 1965: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 1966: honor_server_cipher_order_tls12() ->
 1967:     [{doc,"Test API honor server cipher order."}].
 1968: honor_server_cipher_order_tls12(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1969:     ClientCiphers = [#{key_exchange => ecdhe_rsa,
 1970:                        cipher => aes_128_gcm,
 1971:                        mac => aead,
 1972:                        prf => sha256},
 1973:                      #{key_exchange => ecdhe_rsa,
 1974:                        cipher => aes_256_gcm,
 1975:                        mac => aead,
 1976:                        prf => sha384}],
 1977:     ServerCiphers = [#{key_exchange => ecdhe_rsa,
 1978:                        cipher => aes_256_gcm,
 1979:                        mac => aead,
 1980:                        prf => sha384},
 1981:                      #{key_exchange => ecdhe_rsa,
 1982:                        cipher => aes_128_gcm,
 1983:                        mac => aead,
 1984:                        prf => sha256}],
 1985:     honor_cipher_order(Config, true, ServerCiphers,
 1986:                        ClientCiphers, #{key_exchange => ecdhe_rsa,
 1987:                                         cipher => aes_256_gcm,
 1988:                                         mac => aead,
 1989:                                         prf => sha384}).
 1990:

 1994:     [{doc,"Test API honor server cipher order."}].

 1996:      ClientCiphers = [#{key_exchange => ecdhe_rsa,
 1997:                        cipher => aes_128_gcm,

 1999:                        prf => sha256},
 2000:                      #{key_exchange => ecdhe_rsa,

 2002:                        mac => aead,
 2003:                        prf => sha384}],
 2004:     ServerCiphers = [#{key_exchange => ecdhe_rsa,
 2005:                        cipher => aes_256_gcm,
 2006:                        mac => aead,
 2007:                        prf => sha384},
 2008:                      #{key_exchange => ecdhe_rsa,
 2009:                        cipher => aes_128_gcm,
 2010:                        mac => aead,
 2011:                        prf => sha256}],
 2012:     honor_cipher_order(Config, false, ServerCiphers,
 2013:                        ClientCiphers, #{key_exchange => ecdhe_rsa,
 2014:                                         cipher => aes_128_gcm,
 2015:                                         mac => aead,
 2016:                                         prf => sha256}).

 2028:                        mac => sha,
 2029:                        prf => default_prf}],

 2031:                        cipher => aes_256_cbc,
 2032:                        mac => sha,

 2072: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 2073: ipv6() ->
 2074:     [{require, ipv6_hosts},
 2075:      {doc,"Test ipv6."}].
 2076: ipv6(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 2077:     {ok, Hostname0} = inet:gethostname(),
 2078:     
 2079:     case lists:member(list_to_atom(Hostname0), ct:get_config(ipv6_hosts)) of
 2080: 	true ->
 2081: 	    ClientOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_rsa_verify_opts, Config),
 2082: 	    ServerOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_rsa_opts, Config),
 2083: 	    {ClientNode, ServerNode, Hostname} = 
 2084: 		ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config, ipv6),
 2085: 	    Server = ssl_test_lib:start_server([{node, ServerNode}, 
 2086: 				   {port, 0}, {from, self()}, 
 2087: 				   {mfa, {ssl_test_lib, send_recv_result, []}},
 2088: 				   {options,  
 2089: 				    [inet6, {active, false} | ServerOpts]}]),
 2090: 	    Port = ssl_test_lib:inet_port(Server), 
 2091: 	    Client = ssl_test_lib:start_client([{node, ClientNode}, 
 2092: 				   {port, Port}, {host, Hostname},
 2093: 				   {from, self()}, 
 2094: 				   {mfa, {ssl_test_lib, send_recv_result, []}},
 2095: 				   {options, 
 2096: 				    [inet6, {active, false} | ClientOpts]}]),
 2097: 	    
 2098: 	    ?CT_LOG("Client ~p  Server ~p ~n", [Client, Server]),
 2099: 	    
 2100: 	    ssl_test_lib:check_result(Server, ok, Client, ok),
 2101: 	    
 2102: 	    ssl_test_lib:close(Server),
 2103: 	    ssl_test_lib:close(Client);
 2104: 	false ->
 2105: 	    {skip, "Host does not support IPv6"}
 2106:     end.
 2107: 
 2108: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 2109: der_input() ->
 2110:     [{doc,"Test to input certs and key as der"}].
 2111: 
 2112: der_input(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 2113:     DataDir = proplists:get_value(data_dir, Config),
 2114:     DHParamFile = filename:join(DataDir, "dHParam.pem"),
 2115: 
 2116:     {status, _, _, StatusInfo} = sys:get_status(whereis(ssl_manager)),
 2117:     [_, _,_, _, Prop] = StatusInfo,
 2118:     State = ssl_test_lib:state(Prop),
 2119:     [CADb | _] = element(5, State),
 2120:     ct:sleep(?SLEEP*2), %%Make sure there is no outstanding clean cert db msg in manager
 2121:     Size = ets:info(CADb, size),
 2122:     ?CT_LOG("Size ~p", [Size]),
 2123: 
 2124:     SeverVerifyOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_rsa_opts, Config),
 2125:     {ServerCert, ServerKey, ServerCaCerts, DHParams} = der_input_opts([{dhfile, DHParamFile} |
 2126: 								       SeverVerifyOpts]),
 2127:     ClientVerifyOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_rsa_verify_opts, Config),
 2128:     {ClientCert, ClientKey, ClientCaCerts, DHParams} = der_input_opts([{dhfile, DHParamFile} |
 2129: 								       ClientVerifyOpts]),
 2130:     ServerOpts = [{verify, verify_peer}, {fail_if_no_peer_cert, true},
 2131: 		  {dh, DHParams},
 2132: 		  {cert, ServerCert}, {key, ServerKey}, {cacerts, ServerCaCerts}],
 2133:     ClientOpts = [{verify, verify_peer},
 2134: 		  {cert, ClientCert}, {key, ClientKey}, {cacerts, ClientCaCerts}],
 2135:     {ClientNode, ServerNode, Hostname} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
 2136:     Server = ssl_test_lib:start_server([{node, ServerNode}, {port, 0},
 2137: 					{from, self()},
 2138: 					{mfa, {ssl_test_lib, send_recv_result, []}},
 2139: 					{options, [{active, false} | ServerOpts]}]),
 2140:     Port = ssl_test_lib:inet_port(Server),
 2141:     Client = ssl_test_lib:start_client([{node, ClientNode}, {port, Port},
 2142: 					{host, Hostname},
 2143: 					{from, self()},
 2144: 					{mfa, {ssl_test_lib, send_recv_result, []}},
 2145: 					{options, [{active, false} | ClientOpts]}]),
 2146: 
 2147:     ssl_test_lib:check_result(Server, ok, Client, ok),
 2148:     ssl_test_lib:close(Server),
 2149:     ssl_test_lib:close(Client),
 2150:     %% Using only DER input should not increase file indexed DB 
 2151:     Size = ets:info(CADb, size),
 2152: 
 2153:     ServerOpts1 = [{verify, verify_peer}, {fail_if_no_peer_cert, true},
 2154:                    {dh, DHParams},
 2155:                    {cert, ServerCert}, {key, ServerKey},
 2156:                    {cacerts, [ #cert{der=Der, otp=public_key:pkix_decode_cert(Der, otp)}
 2157:                                || Der <- ServerCaCerts]}],
 2158:     ClientOpts1 = [{verify, verify_peer},
 2159:                    {cert, ClientCert}, {key, ClientKey},
 2160:                    {cacerts, [ #cert{der=Der, otp=public_key:pkix_decode_cert(Der, otp)}
 2161:                                || Der <- ClientCaCerts]}],
 2162:     Server1 = ssl_test_lib:start_server([{node, ServerNode}, {port, 0},
 2163:                                          {from, self()},
 2164:                                          {mfa, {ssl_test_lib, send_recv_result, []}},
 2165:                                          {options, [{active, false} | ServerOpts1]}]),
 2166:     Port1 = ssl_test_lib:inet_port(Server1),
 2167:     Client1 = ssl_test_lib:start_client([{node, ClientNode}, {port, Port1},
 2168:                                          {host, Hostname},
 2169:                                          {from, self()},
 2170:                                          {mfa, {ssl_test_lib, send_recv_result, []}},
 2171:                                          {options, [{active, false} | ClientOpts1]}]),
 2172: 
 2173:     ssl_test_lib:check_result(Server1, ok, Client1, ok),
 2174:     ssl_test_lib:close(Server1),
 2175:     ssl_test_lib:close(Client1),
 2176:     %% Using only DER input should not increase file indexed DB 
 2177:     Size = ets:info(CADb, size),
 2178: 
 2179:     ok.
 2180:

 2182: invalid_certfile() ->
 2183:     [{doc,"Test what happens with an invalid cert file"}].
 2184: 
 2185: invalid_certfile(Config) when is_list(Config) -> 
 2186:     ClientOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_rsa_verify_opts, Config),
 2187:     ServerOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_rsa_opts, Config),
 2188:     BadCertFile = filename:join([proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config), 
 2189:                                  "badcert.pem"]),
 2190:     ServerBadOpts = [{certfile, BadCertFile}| proplists:delete(certfile, ServerOpts)],
 2191:     {ClientNode, ServerNode, Hostname} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
 2192: 
 2193: 
 2194:     {ClientNode, ServerNode, Hostname} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
 2195:     
 2196:     Server = 
 2197: 	ssl_test_lib:start_server_error([{node, ServerNode}, {port, 0}, 
 2198: 					 {from, self()},
 2199: 					 {options, ServerBadOpts}]),
 2200: 
 2201:     Port = ssl_test_lib:inet_port(Server),
 2202: 
 2203:     Client =
 2204: 	ssl_test_lib:start_client_error([{node, ClientNode}, 
 2205: 					 {port, Port}, {host, Hostname},
 2206: 					 {from, self()}, 
 2207: 					 {options, ClientOpts}]),
 2208:     File = proplists:get_value(certfile, ServerBadOpts),
 2209:     ssl_test_lib:check_result(Server, {error,{options, {certfile, File, {error,enoent}}}}, 
 2210: 			      Client, {error, closed}).
 2211:     
 2212: 
 2213: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 2214: invalid_cacertfile() ->
 2215:     [{doc,"Test what happens with an invalid cacert file"}].
 2216: 
 2217: invalid_cacertfile(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 2218:     ClientOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_rsa_verify_opts, Config),
 2219:     ServerOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_rsa_opts, Config),
 2220:     BadCACertFile = filename:join([proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config), 
 2221:                                  "badcacert.pem"]),
 2222:     ServerBadOpts = [{cacertfile, BadCACertFile}| proplists:delete(cacertfile, ServerOpts)],
 2223:     
 2224:     {ClientNode, ServerNode, Hostname} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
 2225: 
 2226:     Server0  = 
 2227: 	ssl_test_lib:start_server_error([{node, ServerNode}, 
 2228: 					 {port, 0}, {from, self()},
 2229: 					 {options, ServerBadOpts}]),
 2230: 
 2231:     Port0 = ssl_test_lib:inet_port(Server0),
 2232:     
 2233: 
 2234:     Client0 =
 2235: 	ssl_test_lib:start_client_error([{node, ClientNode}, 
 2236: 					 {port, Port0}, {host, Hostname},
 2237: 					 {from, self()}, 
 2238: 					 {options, ClientOpts}]),
 2239: 
 2240:     File0 = proplists:get_value(cacertfile, ServerBadOpts),
 2241:     
 2242:     ssl_test_lib:check_result(Server0, {error, {options, {cacertfile, File0,{error,enoent}}}},
 2243: 			      Client0, {error, closed}),
 2244:     
 2245:     File = File0 ++ "do_not_exit.pem",
 2246:     ServerBadOpts1 = [{cacertfile, File}|proplists:delete(cacertfile, ServerBadOpts)],
 2247:             
 2248:     Server1  = 
 2249: 	ssl_test_lib:start_server_error([{node, ServerNode}, 
 2250: 					 {port, 0}, {from, self()},
 2251: 					 {options, ServerBadOpts1}]),
 2252: 
 2253:     Port1 = ssl_test_lib:inet_port(Server1),
 2254:     
 2255:     Client1 =
 2256: 	ssl_test_lib:start_client_error([{node, ClientNode}, 
 2257: 					 {port, Port1}, {host, Hostname},
 2258: 					 {from, self()}, 
 2259: 					 {options, ClientOpts}]),
 2260: 
 2261: 
 2262:     ssl_test_lib:check_result(Server1, {error, {options, {cacertfile, File,{error,enoent}}}},
 2263: 			      Client1, {error, closed}),
 2264:     ok.
 2265: 
 2266: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 2267: new_options_in_handshake() ->
 2268:     [{doc,"Test that you can set ssl options in handshake/3 and not only in tcp upgrade"}].
 2269: new_options_in_handshake(Config) when is_list(Config) -> 
 2270:     ClientOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_rsa_verify_opts, Config),
 2271:     ServerOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_rsa_opts, Config),
 2272:     Version = ssl_test_lib:protocol_version(Config),
 2273:     {ClientNode, ServerNode, Hostname} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
 2274:     
 2275:     Filter = fun(any) when Version =:= 'tlsv1.3' ->
 2276:                      true;
 2277:                 (_) when Version =:= 'tlsv1.3' ->
 2278:                      false;
 2279:                 (dhe_rsa) ->
 2280:                      true;
 2281:                 (ecdhe_rsa) ->
 2282:                      true;
 2283:                 (rsa) ->
 2284:                      false;
 2285:                 (_) ->
 2286:                      false
 2287:              end,
 2288: 
 2289:     Ciphers = [_, Cipher | _] = ssl:filter_cipher_suites(ssl:cipher_suites(all, Version), 
 2290:                                                          [{key_exchange, Filter}]),
 2291:     
 2292:     Server = ssl_test_lib:start_server([{node, ServerNode}, {port, 0}, 
 2293: 					{from, self()}, 
 2294: 					{ssl_extra_opts, [{versions, [Version]},
 2295: 							  {ciphers,[Cipher]}]}, %% To be set in handshake/3
 2296: 					{mfa, {?MODULE, connection_info_result, []}},
 2297: 					{options, ServerOpts}]),
 2298:     
 2299:     Port = ssl_test_lib:inet_port(Server),
 2300:     Client = ssl_test_lib:start_client([{node, ClientNode}, {port, Port},
 2301: 					{host, Hostname},
 2302: 					{from, self()}, 
 2303: 					{mfa, {?MODULE, connection_info_result, []}},
 2304: 					{options, [{ciphers, Ciphers} | ClientOpts]}]),
 2305:     
 2306:     ?CT_LOG("Client ~p  Server ~p ~n", [Client, Server]),
 2307: 
 2308:     ServerMsg = ClientMsg = {ok, {Version, Cipher}},
 2309:    
 2310:     ssl_test_lib:check_result(Server, ServerMsg, Client, ClientMsg),
 2311:     
 2312:     ssl_test_lib:close(Server),
 2313:     ssl_test_lib:close(Client).
 2314: 
 2315: %%-------------------------------------------------------------------
 2316: max_handshake_size() ->
 2317:     [{doc,"Test that we can set max_handshake_size to max value."}].
 2318: 
 2319: max_handshake_size(Config) when is_list(Config) -> 
 2320:     ClientOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_rsa_verify_opts, Config),
 2321:     ServerOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_rsa_opts, Config),  
 2322: 
 2323:     {ClientNode, ServerNode, Hostname} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
 2324:     Server = ssl_test_lib:start_server([{node, ServerNode}, {port, 0}, 
 2325: 					{from, self()}, 
 2326: 					{mfa, {ssl_test_lib, send_recv_result_active, []}},
 2327: 					{options,  [{max_handshake_size, 8388607} |ServerOpts]}]),
 2328:     Port = ssl_test_lib:inet_port(Server),
 2329:     
 2330:     Client = ssl_test_lib:start_client([{node, ClientNode}, {port, Port}, 
 2331: 					{host, Hostname},
 2332: 					{from, self()}, 
 2333: 					{mfa, {ssl_test_lib, send_recv_result_active, []}},
 2334: 					{options, [{max_handshake_size, 8388607} | ClientOpts]}]),
 2335:  
 2336:     ssl_test_lib:check_result(Server, ok, Client, ok).
 2337:   
 2338: 
 2339: %%-------------------------------------------------------------------
 2340: 
 2341: -define(FUNC_CLAUSE(EXPR), try EXPR, error(should_fail) catch _:function_clause -> ok end).
 2342: 
 2343: options_not_proplist() ->
 2344:     [{doc,"Test what happens if an option is not a key value tuple"}].
 2345: 
 2346: options_not_proplist(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 2347:     BadOption =  {client_preferred_next_protocols, 
 2348: 		  client, [<<"spdy/3">>,<<"http/1.1">>], <<"http/1.1">>},
 2349:     {error, {options, {option_not_a_key_value_tuple, BadOption}}} =
 2350: 	ssl:connect("twitter.com", 443, [binary, {active, false}, 
 2351: 					 BadOption]),
 2352:     ?FUNC_CLAUSE(ssl:connect("twitter.com", 443)),
 2353:     ?FUNC_CLAUSE(ssl:connect("twitter.com", 443, infinity)),
 2354:     ?FUNC_CLAUSE(ssl:connect("twitter.com", [], infinity_misspelled)),
 2355:     ?FUNC_CLAUSE(ssl:connect("twitter.com", foo, [], infinity)),
 2356:     %% While at it test some other functions as well for regression testing
 2357:     ?FUNC_CLAUSE(ssl:listen([], 443)),
 2358:     ?FUNC_CLAUSE(ssl:transport_accept(#sslsocket{}, [])),
 2359:     ?FUNC_CLAUSE(ssl:handshake(#sslsocket{}, [])),
 2360:     ?FUNC_CLAUSE(ssl:handshake(foo, #sslsocket{})),
 2361:     ?FUNC_CLAUSE(ssl:handshake(foo, #sslsocket{}, 1000)),
 2362:     ?FUNC_CLAUSE(ssl:handshake(#sslsocket{}, 1000, 1000)),
 2363:     ?FUNC_CLAUSE(ssl:handshake(#sslsocket{}, [opt_list], [])),
 2364:     ?FUNC_CLAUSE(ssl:handshake_continue(socket, [opt_list], [])),
 2365:     ?FUNC_CLAUSE(ssl:handshake_continue(socket, 1000, 1000)),
 2366: 
 2367:     ok.
 2368: 
 2369: options_whitebox() ->
 2370:     [{doc,"Whitebox tests of option handling"}].
 2371: 
 2372: 
 2373: customize_defaults(Opts, Role, Host) ->
 2374:     %% In many options test scenarios we do not care about verifcation options
 2375:     %% but the client now requiers verification options by default.
 2376:     DefOpts = case Role of
 2377:                   client ->
 2378:                       case proplists:get_value(verify, Opts, undefined) of
 2379:                           undefined -> [{verify, verify_none}];
 2380:                           _ -> []
 2381:                       end;
 2382:                   server ->
 2383:                       Ciphers = proplists:get_value(ciphers, Opts, undefined),
 2384:                       Cert = proplists:get_value(cert, Opts, undefined),
 2385:                       Key = proplists:get_value(key, Opts, undefined),
 2386:                       CertsKeys = proplists:get_value(certs_keys, Opts, undefined),
 2387:                       NoCertOrKeys = Cert == undefined orelse Key == undefined andalso
 2388:                           CertsKeys == undefined,
 2389:                       if Ciphers == undefined andalso NoCertOrKeys ->
 2390:                               [{certs_keys, [#{cert => <<>>, key => {rsa, <<>>}}]}];
 2391:                          true ->
 2392:                               []
 2393:                       end
 2394:               end,
 2395:     NoVerify = case Role of
 2396:                    client -> [{verify, verify_none}|DefOpts];
 2397:                    server -> DefOpts
 2398:                end,
 2399:     case proplists:get_value(protocol, Opts, tls) of
 2400:         dtls ->
 2401:             {ok, #config{ssl=DOpts}} = ssl_config:handle_options([{protocol, dtls}|NoVerify], Role, Host),
 2402:             {DOpts, DefOpts ++ Opts};
 2403:         tls ->
 2404:             {ok, #config{ssl=DOpts}} = ssl_config:handle_options(NoVerify, Role, Host),
 2405:             case proplists:get_value(versions, Opts) of
 2406:                 undefined ->
 2407:                     {DOpts, DefOpts ++ [{versions, ['tlsv1.2','tlsv1.3']}|Opts]};
 2408:                 _ ->
 2409:                     {DOpts, DefOpts ++ Opts}
 2410:             end;
 2411:         _ ->
 2412:             {ok, #config{ssl=DOpts}} = ssl_config:handle_options(NoVerify, Role, Host),
 2413:             {DOpts, DefOpts ++ Opts}
 2414:     end.
 2415: 
 2416: -define(OK(EXP, Opts, Role), ?OK(EXP,Opts, Role, [])).
 2417: -define(OK(EXP, Opts, Role, ShouldBeMissing),
 2418:         fun() ->
 2419:                 Host = "dummy.host.org",
 2420:                 {__DefOpts, __Opts} = customize_defaults(Opts, Role, Host),
 2421:                 try ssl_config:handle_options(__Opts, Role, Host) of
 2422:                     {ok, #config{ssl=EXP = __ALL}} ->
 2423:                         check_expected(ShouldBeMissing, ShouldBeMissing -- maps:keys(__ALL)),
 2424:                         check_expected(__ALL, ssl_config:update_options([], Role, __ALL));
 2425:                     Other ->
 2426:                         ?CT_PAL("ssl_config:handle_options(~0p,~0p,~0p).",[__Opts,Role,Host]),
 2427:                         error({unexpected, Other})
 2428:                 catch
 2429:                     throw:{error,{options,{insufficient_crypto_support,{'tlsv1.3',_}}}} -> ignored;
 2430:                     C:Other:ST ->
 2431:                         ?CT_PAL("ssl_config:handle_options(~0p,~0p,~0p).",[__Opts,Role,Host]),
 2432:                         error({unexpected, C, Other,ST})
 2433:                 end,
 2434:                 try ssl_config:update_options(__Opts, Role, __DefOpts) of
 2435:                     EXP = __ALL2 ->
 2436:                         check_expected(ShouldBeMissing, ShouldBeMissing -- maps:keys(__ALL2));
 2437:                     Other2 ->
 2438:                         ?CT_PAL("{ok,Cfg} = ssl_config:handle_options([],~p,~p),"
 2439:                                "ssl_config:update_options(~w,~w, element(2,Cfg)).",
 2440:                                [Role,Host,__Opts,Role]),
 2441:                         error({unexpected2, Other2})
 2442:                 catch
 2443:                     throw:{error,{options,{insufficient_crypto_support,{'tlsv1.3',_}}}} -> ignored;
 2444:                     C2:Other2:ST2 ->
 2445:                         ?CT_PAL("{ok,Cfg} = ssl_config:handle_options([],~p,~p),"
 2446:                                "ssl_config:update_options(~p,~p, element(2,Cfg)).",
 2447:                                [Role,Host,__Opts,Role]),
 2448:                         error({unexpected, C2, Other2, ST2})
 2449:                 end
 2450:         end()).
 2451: 
 2452: -define(ERR(EXP, Opts, Role),
 2453:         fun() ->
 2454:                 Host = "dummy.host.org",
 2455:                 {__DefOpts, __Opts} = customize_defaults(Opts, Role, Host),
 2456:                 try ssl_config:handle_options(__Opts, Role, Host) of
 2457:                     Other ->
 2458:                         ?CT_PAL("ssl_config:handle_options(~0p,~0p,~0p).",[__Opts,Role,Host]),
 2459:                         error({unexpected, Other})
 2460:                 catch
 2461:                     throw:{error,{options,{insufficient_crypto_support,{'tlsv1.3',_}}}} -> ignored;
 2462:                     throw:{error, {options, EXP}} -> ok;
 2463:                     throw:{error, EXP} -> ok;
 2464:                     C:Other:ST ->
 2465:                         ?CT_PAL("ssl_config:handle_options(~0p,~0p,~0p).",[__Opts,Role,Host]),
 2466:                         error({unexpected, C, Other,ST})
 2467:                 end,
 2468:                 try ssl_config:update_options(__Opts, Role, __DefOpts) of
 2469:                     Other2 ->
 2470:                         ?CT_PAL("{ok,Cfg} = ssl_config:handle_options([],~p,~p),"
 2471:                                "ssl_config:update_options(~p,~p, element(2,Cfg)).",
 2472:                                [Role,Host,__Opts,Role]),
 2473:                         error({unexpected, Other2})
 2474:                 catch
 2475:                     throw:{error,{options,{insufficient_crypto_support,{'tlsv1.3',_}}}} -> ignored;
 2476:                     throw:{error, {options, EXP}} -> ok;
 2477:                     throw:{error, EXP} -> ok;
 2478:                     C2:Other2:ST2 ->
 2479:                         ?CT_PAL("{ok,Cfg} = ssl_config:handle_options([],~p,~p),"
 2480:                                "ssl_config:update_options(~p,~p, element(2,Cfg)).",
 2481:                                [Role,Host,__Opts,Role]),
 2482:                         error({unexpected, C2, Other2,ST2})
 2483:                 end
 2484:         end()).
 2485: 
 2486: -define(ERR_UPD(EXP, Opts, Role),
 2487:         fun() ->
 2488:                 Host = "dummy.host.org",
 2489:                 {__DefOpts, __Opts} = customize_defaults(Opts, Role, Host),
 2490:                 try ssl_config:handle_options(__Opts, Role, Host) of
 2491:                     {ok, #config{}} ->
 2492:                         ok;
 2493:                     Other ->
 2494:                         ?CT_PAL("ssl_config:handle_options(~0p,~0p,~0p).",[__Opts,Role,Host]),
 2495:                         error({unexpected, Other})
 2496:                 catch
 2497:                     throw:{error,{options,{insufficient_crypto_support,{'tlsv1.3',_}}}} -> ignored;
 2498:                     C:Other:ST ->
 2499:                         ?CT_PAL("ssl_config:handle_options(~0p,~0p,~0p).",[__Opts,Role,Host]),
 2500:                         error({unexpected, C, Other,ST})
 2501:                 end,
 2502:                 try ssl_config:update_options(__Opts, Role, __DefOpts) of
 2503:                     Other2 ->
 2504:                         ?CT_PAL("{ok,Cfg} = ssl_config:handle_options([],~p,~p),"
 2505:                                 "ssl_config:update_options(~p,~p, element(2,Cfg)).",
 2506:                                 [Role,Host,__Opts,Role]),
 2507:                         error({unexpected, Other2})
 2508:                 catch
 2509:                     throw:{error,{options,{insufficient_crypto_support,{'tlsv1.3',_}}}} -> ignored;
 2510:                     throw:{error, {options, EXP}} -> ok;
 2511:                     throw:{error, EXP} -> ok;
 2512:                     C2:Other2:ST2 ->
 2513:                         ?CT_PAL("{ok,Cfg} = ssl_config:handle_options([],~p,~p),"
 2514:                                 "ssl_config:update_options(~p,~p, element(2,Cfg)).",
 2515:                                 [Role,Host,__Opts,Role]),
 2516:                         error({unexpected, C2, Other2,ST2})
 2517:                 end
 2518:         end()).
 2519: 
 2520: check_expected(A, A) ->
 2521:     ok;
 2522: check_expected(A, B) when is_list(A), is_list(B) ->
 2523:     Diff1 = A -- B,
 2524:     Diff2 = B -- A,
 2525:     ct:log("NOT EQUAL~n ~p~n ~p~n", [A,B]),
 2526:     if Diff1 =/= [], Diff2 =/= [] ->
 2527:             ct:fail({not_equal, {line, ?LINE}, Diff1, Diff2});
 2528:        Diff2 =/= [] ->
 2529:             ct:fail({not_equal, {line, ?LINE}, Diff2});
 2530:        true ->
 2531:             ct:fail({not_equal, {line, ?LINE}, Diff1})
 2532:     end;
 2533: check_expected(A, B) when is_map(A), is_map(B) ->
 2534:     Diff1 = [{KeyA, ValA}
 2535:              || KeyA := ValA <- A, ValA =/= maps:get(KeyA, B, missing_key_val)],
 2536:     Diff2 = [{KeyB, ValB}
 2537:              || KeyB := ValB <- B, ValB =/= maps:get(KeyB, A, missing_key_val)],
 2538:     ct:log("NOT EQUAL~n ~p~n ~p~n", [A,B]),
 2539:     if Diff1 =/= [], Diff2 =/= [] ->
 2540:             ct:fail({not_equal, {line, ?LINE}, Diff1, Diff2});
 2541:        Diff2 =/= [] ->
 2542:             ct:fail({not_equal, {line, ?LINE}, Diff2});
 2543:        true ->
 2544:             ct:fail({not_equal, {line, ?LINE}, Diff1})
 2545:     end;
 2546: check_expected({ok, Term1}, {ok, Term2}) ->
 2547:     check_expected(Term1, Term2);
 2548: check_expected(A, B) ->
 2549:     ct:log("NOT EQUAL~n ~p~n~p~n", [A,B]),
 2550:     ct:fail(not_equal).
 2551: 
 2552: 
 2553: options_whitebox(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 2554:     Cert = proplists:get_value(cert, ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_rsa_der_opts, Config)),
 2555:     true = is_binary(Cert),
 2556:     ?OK(#{verify := verify_peer},  %% Check Option order last wins
 2557:         [{verify, verify_none}, {verify,verify_peer}, {cacerts, [Cert]}], client),
 2558:     options_protocol(Config),
 2559:     options_version(Config),
 2560:     options_alpn(Config),
 2561:     options_anti_replay(Config),
 2562:     options_beast_mitigation(Config),
 2563:     options_cacerts(Config),
 2564:     options_cert(Config),
 2565:     options_certificate_authorities(Config),
 2566:     options_ciphers(Config),
 2567:     options_client_renegotiation(Config),
 2568:     options_cookie(Config),
 2569:     options_crl(Config),
 2570:     options_hostname_check(Config),
 2571:     options_dh(Config),
 2572:     options_early_data(Config),
 2573:     options_eccs(Config),
 2574:     options_verify(Config),
 2575:     options_fallback(Config),
 2576:     options_handshake(Config),
 2577:     options_process(Config),
 2578:     options_honor(Config),
 2579:     options_debug(Config),
 2580:     options_renegotiate(Config),
 2581:     options_middlebox(Config),
 2582:     options_frag_len(Config),
 2583:     options_stapling(Config),
 2584:     options_padding(Config),
 2585:     options_identity(Config),
 2586:     options_reuse_session(Config),
 2587:     options_sni(Config),
 2588:     options_sign_alg(Config),
 2589:     options_supported_groups(Config),
 2590:     options_use_srtp(Config),
 2591:     ok.
 2592: 
 2593: options_protocol(_Config) ->
 2594:     ?OK(#{protocol := tls},  [], client),
 2595:     ?OK(#{protocol := tls},  [{protocol, tls}], client),
 2596:     ?OK(#{protocol := dtls}, [{protocol, dtls}], client),
 2597: 
 2598:     %% Errors
 2599:     ?ERR({protocol, foo}, [{protocol, 'foo'}], client),
 2600: 
 2601:     begin %% erl_dist
 2602:         ?OK(#{}, [], client, [erl_dist]),
 2603:         ?OK(#{}, [{erl_dist, false}], client, [erl_dist]),
 2604:         ?OK(#{erl_dist := true}, [{erl_dist, true}], client),
 2605:         ?OK(#{}, [], client, [ktls]),
 2606:         ?OK(#{}, [{ktls, false}], client, [ktls]),
 2607:         ?OK(#{ktls := true}, [{ktls, true}], client)
 2608:     end,
 2609:     ok.
 2610: 
 2611: options_version(_Config) ->
 2612:     ?OK(#{versions := [_|_]}, [], client),  %% Hmm some machines still default only ?TLS_1_2
 2613:     ?OK(#{versions := [?DTLS_1_2]}, [{protocol, dtls}], client),
 2614: 
 2615:     ?OK(#{versions := [?TLS_1_3,?TLS_1_2,?TLS_1_1,?TLS_1_0]},
 2616:         [{versions, ['tlsv1','tlsv1.1','tlsv1.2','tlsv1.3']}],
 2617:         client),
 2618:     ?OK(#{versions := [?TLS_1_3]}, [{versions, ['tlsv1.3']}], client),
 2619: 
 2620:     ?OK(#{versions := [?DTLS_1_2,?DTLS_1_0]},
 2621:         [{protocol, dtls}, {versions, ['dtlsv1', 'dtlsv1.2']}],  client),
 2622:     ?OK(#{versions := [?DTLS_1_2]}, [{protocol, dtls}, {versions, ['dtlsv1.2']}], client),
 2623: 
 2624: 
 2625:     %% Errors
 2626:     ?ERR({versions, []}, [{versions, []}], client),
 2627:     ?ERR({versions, []}, [{protocol, dtls}, {versions, []}], client),
 2628: 
 2629:     ?ERR({'tlsv1.4',{versions, ['tlsv1.4']}},
 2630:          [{versions, ['tlsv1.4']}], client),
 2631:     ?ERR({'dtlsv1', {versions, _}},
 2632:          [{versions, ['dtlsv1', 'dtlsv1.2']}], client),
 2633: 
 2634:     ?ERR({'tlsv1', {versions, _}},
 2635:          [{protocol, dtls}, {versions, ['tlsv1','tlsv1.1','tlsv1.2','tlsv1.3']}],
 2636:          client),
 2637:     ?ERR({'dtlsv1.3',{versions, ['dtlsv1.3']}},
 2638:          [{protocol, dtls}, {versions, ['dtlsv1.3']}],
 2639:          client),
 2640:     ?ERR({options,missing_version,{'tlsv1.2',_}},
 2641:          [{versions, ['tlsv1.1','tlsv1.3']}],
 2642:          client),
 2643:     ok.
 2644: 
 2645: options_alpn(_Config) -> %% alpn & next_protocols
 2646:     Http = <<"HTTP/2">>,
 2647:     ?OK(#{alpn_advertised_protocols := undefined}, [], client,
 2648:         [alpn_preferred_protocols, next_protocol_selector, next_protocols_advertised]),
 2649:     ?OK(#{alpn_preferred_protocols := undefined},  [], server,
 2650:         [alpn_advertised_protocols, next_protocol_selector, next_protocols_advertised]),
 2651: 
 2652:     ?OK(#{alpn_preferred_protocols := [Http]}, [{alpn_preferred_protocols, [Http]}],
 2653:         server, [alpn_advertised_protocols, next_protocol_selector, next_protocols_advertised]),
 2654:     ?OK(#{alpn_advertised_protocols := [Http]}, [{alpn_advertised_protocols, [Http]}],
 2655:         client, [alpn_preferred_protocols, next_protocol_selector, next_protocols_advertised]),
 2656: 
 2657:     %% Note names have been swapped in client/server variants
 2658: 
 2659:     ?OK(#{alpn_preferred_protocols := undefined, next_protocols_advertised := [Http]},
 2660:         [{next_protocols_advertised, [Http]}], server, [alpn_advertised_protocols, next_protocol_selector]),
 2661:     ?OK(#{alpn_advertised_protocols := undefined, next_protocol_selector := _},
 2662:         [{client_preferred_next_protocols, {server,[Http], Http}}],
 2663:         client, [alpn_preferred_protocols, next_protocols_advertised]),
 2664: 
 2665:     %% Errors
 2666:     ?ERR({alpn_preferred_protocols, {invalid_protocol, <<>>}}, [{alpn_preferred_protocols, [Http, <<>>]}], server),
 2667:     ?ERR({alpn_advertised_protocols, Http}, [{alpn_advertised_protocols, Http}], client),
 2668:     ?ERR({alpn_preferred_protocols, undefined}, [{alpn_preferred_protocols, undefined}], server),
 2669:     ?ERR({alpn_advertised_protocols, undefined}, [{alpn_advertised_protocols, undefined}], client),
 2670:     ?ERR({option, server_only, alpn_preferred_protocols}, [{alpn_preferred_protocols, [Http]}], client),
 2671:     ?ERR({option, client_only, alpn_advertised_protocols}, [{alpn_advertised_protocols, [Http]}], server),
 2672:     ?ERR({option, server_only, next_protocols_advertised}, [{next_protocols_advertised, [Http]}], client),
 2673:     ?ERR({option, client_only, client_preferred_next_protocols}, [{client_preferred_next_protocols, [Http]}], server),
 2674:     ok.
 2675: 
 2676: options_anti_replay(_Config) ->
 2677:     ?OK(#{anti_replay := undefined}, [], server),
 2678:     ?OK(#{anti_replay := {_,_,_}},
 2679:         [{anti_replay, '10k'}, {session_tickets, stateless}],
 2680:         server),
 2681:     ?OK(#{anti_replay := {_,_,_}},
 2682:         [{anti_replay, {42,4711,21}}, {session_tickets, stateless}],
 2683:         server),
 2684:     ?OK(#{anti_replay := {_,_,_}},
 2685:         [{anti_replay, '10k'}, {session_tickets, stateless_with_cert}],
 2686:         server),
 2687:     ?OK(#{anti_replay := {_,_,_}},
 2688:         [{anti_replay, {42,4711,21}}, {session_tickets, stateless_with_cert}],
 2689:         server),
 2690: 
 2691: 
 2692:     %% Errors
 2693:     ?ERR({option, server_only, anti_replay},
 2694:          [{anti_replay, '10k'}, {session_tickets, manual}],
 2695:          client),
 2696:     ?ERR({options, incompatible, [{anti_replay, _}, {session_tickets, disabled}]},
 2697:          [{anti_replay, '10k'}],
 2698:          server),
 2699:     ?ERR({options,incompatible, [session_tickets,{versions,['tlsv1']}]},
 2700:          [{anti_replay, '10k'}, {session_tickets, stateless}, {versions, ['tlsv1']}],
 2701:          server),
 2702:     ?ERR({anti_replay, '1k'},
 2703:          [{anti_replay, '1k'}, {session_tickets, stateless}],
 2704:          server),
 2705:     ?ERR({anti_replay, _},
 2706:          [{anti_replay, {1,1,1,1}}, {session_tickets, stateless}],
 2707:          server),
 2708:     ?ERR({options,incompatible, [session_tickets,{versions,['tlsv1']}]},
 2709:          [{anti_replay, '10k'}, {session_tickets, stateless_with_cert}, {versions, ['tlsv1']}],
 2710:          server),
 2711:     ?ERR({anti_replay, '1k'},
 2712:          [{anti_replay, '1k'}, {session_tickets, stateless_with_cert}],
 2713:          server),
 2714:     ?ERR({anti_replay, _},
 2715:          [{anti_replay, {1,1,1,1}}, {session_tickets, stateless_with_cert}],
 2716:          server),
 2717:     ok.
 2718: 
 2719: options_beast_mitigation(_Config) -> %% Beast mitigation TLS-1.0 option only
 2720:     ?OK(#{beast_mitigation := one_n_minus_one}, [{versions, [tlsv1,'tlsv1.1']}], client),
 2721: 
 2722:     ?OK(#{}, [{versions, ['tlsv1.1']}], client, [beast_mitigation]),
 2723:     ?OK(#{}, [{beast_mitigation, disabled}, {versions, [tlsv1]}], client),
 2724:     ?OK(#{beast_mitigation := zero_n}, [{beast_mitigation, zero_n}, {versions, [tlsv1]}], client),
 2725: 
 2726:     %% Errors
 2727:     ?ERR({beast_mitigation, enabled},
 2728:          [{beast_mitigation, enabled}, {versions, [tlsv1]}], client),
 2729:     ?ERR({options, incompatible, [beast_mitigation, {versions, _}]},
 2730:          [{beast_mitigation, disabled}], client),
 2731:     ok.
 2732: 
 2733: options_cacerts(Config) ->  %% cacert[s]file
 2734:     Cert = proplists:get_value(cert, ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_rsa_der_opts, Config)),
 2735:     File = case os:type() of
 2736:                {win32, _} -> <<"c:/tmp/foo">>;
 2737:                _ -> <<"/tmp/foo">>
 2738:            end,
 2739:     ?OK(#{cacerts := undefined}, [], client, [cacertfile]),
 2740:     ?OK(#{cacerts := undefined, cacertfile := File},
 2741:         [{cacertfile, File}], client),
 2742:     ?OK(#{cacerts := [Cert]}, [{cacerts, [Cert]}, {verify, verify_peer}],
 2743:         client, [cacertfile]),
 2744:     ?OK(#{cacerts := [#cert{}]}, [{cacerts, [#cert{der=Cert, otp=dummy}]}],
 2745:         client, [cacertfile]),
 2746:     ?OK(#{cacerts := [Cert]}, [{cacerts, [Cert]}, {cacertfile, "/tmp/foo"}],
 2747:         client, [cacertfile]),
 2748: 
 2749:     %% Errors
 2750:     ?ERR({options, incompatible, _}, [{verify, verify_peer}], server),
 2751:     ?ERR({cacerts, Cert}, [{cacerts, Cert}], client),
 2752:     ?ERR({cacertfile, cert}, [{cacertfile, cert}], client),
 2753: 
 2754:     ?OK(#{}, [], client, [depth]),
 2755:     ?OK(#{depth := 5}, [{depth, 5}], client),
 2756:     %% Error
 2757:     ?ERR({depth, 256}, [{depth, 256}], client),
 2758:     ?ERR({depth, not_an_int}, [{depth, not_an_int}], client),
 2759:     ok.
 2760: 
 2761: options_cert(Config) -> %% cert[file] cert_keys keys password
 2762:     Cert = proplists:get_value(cert, ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_rsa_der_opts, Config)),
 2763:     Old = [cert, certfile, key, keyfile, password],
 2764:     ?OK(#{certs_keys := []}, [], client, Old),
 2765:     ?OK(#{certs_keys := [#{cert := [Cert]}]}, [{cert,Cert}], client, Old),
 2766:     ?OK(#{certs_keys := [#{cert := [Cert]}]}, [{cert,[Cert]}], client, Old),
 2767:     ?OK(#{certs_keys := [#{certfile := <<"/tmp/foo">>, keyfile := <<"/tmp/foo">>}]},
 2768:         [{certfile, <<"/tmp/foo">>}], client, Old),
 2769: 
 2770:     ?OK(#{certs_keys := []}, [{certs_keys, [#{}]}], client),
 2771: 
 2772:     ?OK(#{certs_keys := [#{key := {rsa, <<>>}}]},
 2773:         [{key, {rsa, <<>>}}], client, Old),
 2774:     ?OK(#{certs_keys := [#{key := #{}}]},
 2775:         [{key, #{engine => foo, algorithm => foo, key_id => foo}}], client, Old),
 2776:     ?OK(#{certs_keys := [#{key := #{}}]},
 2777:         [{key, #{algorithm => eddsa, sign_fun => fun(_,_,_,_) -> << "dummy signature">> end}},
 2778:          {versions, ['tlsv1.3']}], client, Old),
 2779:     ?OK(#{certs_keys := [#{key := #{}}]},
 2780:         [{key, #{algorithm => ecdsa, sign_fun => fun(_,_,_,_) -> << "dummy signature">> end}}],
 2781:         client, Old),
 2782:     ?OK(#{certs_keys := [#{key := #{}}]},
 2783:         [{key, #{algorithm => rsa,
 2784:                   sign_fun => fun(_,_,_,_) -> << "dummy signature">> end,
 2785:                  encrypt_fun => fun(_,_,_) -> << "dummy encrypt">> end}},
 2786:          {versions, ['tlsv1.3', 'tlsv1.2', 'tlsv1.1']}], client, Old),
 2787:     ?OK(#{certs_keys := [#{password := _}]}, [{password, "foobar"}], client, Old),
 2788:     ?OK(#{certs_keys := [#{password := _}]}, [{password, <<"foobar">>}], client, Old),
 2789:     Pwd = fun() -> "foobar" end,
 2790:     ?OK(#{certs_keys := [#{password := Pwd}]}, [{password, Pwd}], client, Old),
 2791: 
 2792:     ?OK(#{certs_keys := [#{certfile := <<"/tmp/foo">>, keyfile := <<"/tmp/baz">>}]},
 2793:         [{certfile, <<"/tmp/foo">>}, {keyfile, "/tmp/baz"}], client, Old),
 2794: 
 2795:     ?OK(#{certs_keys := []},
 2796:         [{cert, Cert}, {certfile, "/tmp/foo"}, {certs_keys, [#{}]}],
 2797:         client, Old),
 2798: 
 2799:     %% Errors
 2800:     ?ERR({options,incompatible,[key,{versions,['tlsv1.2']}]},
 2801:          [{key, #{algorithm => eddsa, sign_fun => fun(_,_,_,_) -> << "dummy signature">> end}},
 2802:           {versions, ['tlsv1.2']}], client),
 2803:     ?ERR({options,incompatible,[key,{versions,['tlsv1.3','tlsv1.2']}]},
 2804:          [{key, #{algorithm => rsa,
 2805:                   sign_fun => fun(_,_,_,_) -> << "dummy signature">> end,
 2806:                   encrypt_fun => fun(_,_,_) -> << "dummy encrypt">> end
 2807:                  }}], client),
 2808:     ?ERR({cert, #{}}, [{cert, #{}}], client),
 2809:     ?ERR({certfile, cert}, [{certfile, cert}], client),
 2810:     ?ERR({certs_keys, #{}}, [{certs_keys, #{}}], client),
 2811:     ?ERR_UPD({certs_keys, cert_and_key_required}, [{certs_keys, []}], server),
 2812:     ?ERR({keyfile, #{}}, [{keyfile, #{}}], client),
 2813:     ?ERR({key, <<>>}, [{key, <<>>}], client),
 2814:     ?ERR({password, _}, [{password, fun(Arg) -> Arg end}], client),
 2815:     ok.
 2816: 
 2817: options_certificate_authorities(_Config) ->
 2818:     ?OK(#{}, [], client, [certificate_authorities]),
 2819:     ?OK(#{}, [], server, [certificate_authorities]),
 2820:     ?OK(#{certificate_authorities := true}, [{certificate_authorities, true}], client),
 2821:     ?OK(#{}, [{certificate_authorities, false}], client, [certificate_authorities]),
 2822:     ?OK(#{certificate_authorities := false}, [{certificate_authorities, false}], server),
 2823:     ?OK(#{certificate_authorities := false}, [{certificate_authorities, false}, {versions, ['tlsv1.2']}], server),
 2824:     ?OK(#{}, [{certificate_authorities, true}], server, [certificate_authorities]),
 2825: 
 2826:     %% Errors
 2827:     ?ERR({certificate_authorities, []},
 2828:          [{certificate_authorities,  []}], client),
 2829:     ?ERR({options, incompatible, [certificate_authorities, {versions, _}]},
 2830:          [{certificate_authorities, true}, {versions, ['tlsv1.2']}],
 2831:          client),
 2832:     ok.
 2833: 
 2834: options_ciphers(_Config) ->
 2835:     CipherSuite = ssl_test_lib:ecdh_dh_anonymous_suites(?TLS_1_2),
 2836:     ?OK(#{ciphers := [_|_]}, [], client),
 2837:     ?OK(#{ciphers := [_|_]}, [{ciphers, CipherSuite}], client),
 2838:     ?OK(#{ciphers := [_|_]}, [{ciphers, "RC4-SHA:RC4-MD5"}], client),
 2839:     ?OK(#{ciphers := [_|_]}, [{ciphers, ["RC4-SHA", "RC4-MD5"]}], client),
 2840: 
 2841:     ?OK(#{ciphers := [_|_]}, [{ciphers, ["TLS_DH_anon_WITH_AES_256_CBC_SHA256"]}], server),
 2842:     %% Errors
 2843:     ?ERR({ciphers, _}, [{ciphers, "foobar:RC4-MD5"}], client),
 2844:     ?ERR({ciphers, _}, [{ciphers, ["RC4-SHA:RC4-MD5", "RC4-SHA:RC4-MD5"]}], client),
 2845:     ?ERR_UPD({certs_keys, cert_and_key_required}, [{ciphers, "RC4-SHA:RC4-MD5"}], server),
 2846:     ok.

 2855:     ?ERR({options, incompatible, [client_renegotiation, {versions, _}]},
 2856:          [{client_renegotiation, true}, {versions, ['tlsv1.3']}],
 2857:          server),
 2858:     ok.

 2872: options_crl(_Config) ->
 2873:     ?OK(#{crl_cache := {ssl_crl_cache, _}, crl_check := false}, [], server),
 2874:     ?OK(#{crl_cache := {ssl_crl_cache, _}, crl_check := true},  [{crl_check, true}], server),
 2875:     ?OK(#{crl_cache := {ssl_crl_hash_dir, {_,_}}, crl_check := true},
 2876:         [{crl_check, true}, {crl_cache, {ssl_crl_hash_dir, {internal, [{dir, "/tmp"}]}}}],
 2877:         server),
 2878:     ?OK(#{crl_cache := {ssl_crl_cache, {_,_}}, crl_check := true},
 2879:         [{crl_check, true}, {crl_cache, {ssl_crl_cache, {internal, [{http, 5000}]}}}],
 2880:         server),
 2881:     %% Errors
 2882:     ?ERR({crl_check, foo}, [{crl_check, foo}], server),
 2883:     ?ERR({crl_cache, {a,b,c}}, [{crl_cache, {a,b,c}}], server),
 2884:     ok.

 2886: options_hostname_check(_Config) ->
 2887:     ?OK(#{customize_hostname_check := []}, [], client),
 2888:     ?OK(#{customize_hostname_check := [{match_fun, _}]},
 2889:         [{customize_hostname_check, [{match_fun, fun() -> ok end}]}],
 2890:         client),
 2891:     %% Error
 2892:     ?ERR({customize_hostname_check, _}, [{customize_hostname_check, {match_fun, pb_fun}}], client),
 2893:     ok.

 2895: options_dh(_Config) -> %% dh dhfile
 2896:     ?OK(#{}, [], server, [dh, dhfile]),
 2897:     ?OK(#{dh := <<>>}, [{dh, <<>>}], server, [dhfile]),
 2898:     ?OK(#{dhfile := <<"/tmp/foo">>}, [{dhfile, <<"/tmp/foo">>}], server, [dh]),
 2899:     ?OK(#{dh := <<>>}, [{dh, <<>>}, {dhfile, <<"/tmp/foo">>}], server, [dhfile]),
 2900: 
 2901:     %% Should be an error
 2902:     ?OK(#{dhfile := <<"/tmp/foo">>},  %% Not available in 1.3
 2903:         [{dhfile, <<"/tmp/foo">>}, {versions, ['tlsv1.3']}], server, [dh]),
 2904: 
 2905:     %% Error
 2906:     ?ERR({dh, not_a_bin}, [{dh, not_a_bin}], server),
 2907:     ?ERR({dhfile, not_a_filename}, [{dhfile, not_a_filename}], server),
 2908:     ?ERR({option, server_only, dhfile}, [{dhfile, "file"}], client),
 2909:     ?ERR({option, server_only, dh}, [{dh, <<"DER">>}], client),
 2910:     ok.

 2912: options_early_data(_Config) -> %% early_data, session_tickets and use_ticket
 2913:     ?OK(#{early_data := undefined, session_tickets := disabled},
 2914:         [], client),
 2915:     ?OK(#{early_data := disabled, session_tickets := disabled, stateless_tickets_seed := undefined},
 2916:         [], server),
 2917: 
 2918:     ?OK(#{early_data := <<>>, session_tickets := auto},
 2919:         [{early_data, <<>>}, {session_tickets, auto}], client),
 2920:     ?OK(#{early_data := <<>>, session_tickets := manual, use_ticket := [<<1>>]},
 2921:         [{early_data, <<>>}, {session_tickets, manual}, {use_ticket, [<<1>>]}],
 2922:         client),
 2923: 
 2924:     ?OK(#{early_data := enabled, stateless_tickets_seed := <<"foo">>},
 2925:         [{early_data, enabled}, {session_tickets, stateless}, {stateless_tickets_seed, <<"foo">>}], server),
 2926:     ?OK(#{early_data := enabled, stateless_tickets_seed := <<"foo">>},
 2927:         [{early_data, enabled}, {session_tickets, stateless_with_cert}, {stateless_tickets_seed, <<"foo">>}], server),
 2928: 
 2929:     ?OK(#{early_data := disabled}, [{early_data, disabled}], server),
 2930: 
 2931:     %% Errors
 2932:     ?ERR({option, client_only, use_ticket}, [{use_ticket, []}], server),
 2933:     ?ERR({options, incompatible, _}, [{use_ticket, [<<>>]}], client),
 2934: 
 2935:     ?ERR({options, {session_tickets, foo}}, [{session_tickets, foo}], server),
 2936:     ?ERR({options, {session_tickets, manual}}, [{session_tickets, manual}], server),
 2937:     ?ERR({options, {session_tickets, stateful}}, [{session_tickets, stateful}], client),
 2938:     ?ERR({options, incompatible, [session_tickets, {versions, _}]},
 2939:          [{session_tickets, stateful}, {versions, ['tlsv1.2']}], server),
 2940:     ?ERR({options, incompatible, [session_tickets, {versions, _}]},
 2941:          [{session_tickets, stateful_with_cert}, {versions, ['tlsv1.2']}], server),
 2942: 
 2943:     ?ERR({use_ticket, foo},
 2944:          [{use_ticket, foo}, {session_tickets, manual}], client),
 2945: 
 2946:     ?ERR({early_data,undefined}, [{early_data, undefined}], client),
 2947:     ?ERR({options, incompatible, [early_data, {session_tickets, _}]},
 2948:          [{early_data, <<>>}], client),
 2949:     ?ERR({options, {early_data, enabled}},
 2950:          [{early_data, enabled}, {session_tickets, auto}], client),
 2951:     ?ERR({options, incompatible, [early_data, _, {use_ticket, _}]},
 2952:          [{early_data, <<>>}, {session_tickets, manual}], client),
 2953: 
 2954:     ?ERR({options, incompatible, [early_data, {session_tickets, _}]},
 2955:          [{early_data, enabled}], server),
 2956:     ?ERR({options, {early_data, <<>>}},
 2957:          [{early_data, <<>>}, {session_tickets, stateless}], server),
 2958:     ?ERR({options, {early_data, <<>>}},
 2959:          [{early_data, <<>>}, {session_tickets, stateless_with_cert}], server),
 2960: 
 2961:     ?ERR({options, incompatible, [stateless_tickets_seed, {session_tickets, stateful}]},
 2962:          [{stateless_tickets_seed, <<"foo">>}, {session_tickets, stateful}],
 2963:          server),
 2964:     ?ERR({options, incompatible, [stateless_tickets_seed, {session_tickets, stateful_with_cert}]},
 2965:          [{stateless_tickets_seed, <<"foo">>}, {session_tickets, stateful_with_cert}],
 2966:          server),
 2967:     ?ERR({stateless_tickets_seed, foo},
 2968:          [{stateless_tickets_seed, foo}, {session_tickets, stateless}],
 2969:          server),
 2970:     ?ERR({stateless_tickets_seed, foo},
 2971:          [{stateless_tickets_seed, foo}, {session_tickets, stateless_with_cert}],
 2972:          server),
 2973:     ?ERR({option, server_only, stateless_tickets_seed},
 2974:          [{stateless_tickets_seed, <<"foo">>}], client),
 2975:     ok.

 2977: options_eccs(_Config) ->
 2978:     Curves = tl(ssl:eccs()),
 2979:     ?OK(#{eccs := {elliptic_curves, [_|_]}}, [], client),
 2980:     ?OK(#{eccs := {elliptic_curves, [_|_]}}, [{eccs, Curves}], client),
 2981: 
 2982:     %% Errors
 2983:     ?ERR({eccs, not_a_list}, [{eccs, not_a_list}], client),
 2984:     ?ERR({eccs, none_valid}, [{eccs, []}], client),
 2985:     ?ERR({options,{eccs,[foo]}}, [{eccs, [foo]}], client),
 2986:     ok.

 2988: options_verify(Config) ->  %% fail_if_no_peer_cert, verify, verify_fun, partial_chain
 2989:     Cert = proplists:get_value(cert, ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_rsa_der_opts, Config)),
 2990:     {ok, #config{ssl = DefOpts = #{verify_fun := {DefVerify,_}}}} = ssl_config:handle_options([{verify, verify_none}], client, "dummy.host.org"),
 2991: 
 2992:     ?OK(#{fail_if_no_peer_cert := false, verify := verify_none, verify_fun := {DefVerify, []}, partial_chain := _},
 2993:         [], server),
 2994:     ?OK(#{fail_if_no_peer_cert := true, verify := verify_peer, verify_fun := undefined, partial_chain := _},
 2995:         [{fail_if_no_peer_cert, true}, {verify, verify_peer}, {cacerts, [Cert]}],
 2996:         server),
 2997:      ?OK(#{fail_if_no_peer_cert := true, verify := verify_peer, verify_fun := undefined, partial_chain := _},
 2998:          [{verify, verify_peer}, {cacerts, [Cert]}], server),
 2999: 
 3000:     %% Test ssl option handling. Option values are verified by public_key tests
 3001:     CertPolicyOpts = [{policy_set, [?anyPolicy]}, {explicit_policy, false}],
 3002: 
 3003:     ?OK(#{cert_policy_opts := CertPolicyOpts}, [{verify, verify_peer}, {cacerts, [Cert]}, {cert_policy_opts, CertPolicyOpts}],
 3004:         client),
 3005: 
 3006:     NewF3 = fun(_,_,_) -> ok end,
 3007:     NewF4 = fun(_,_,_,_) -> ok end,
 3008:     ?OK(#{}, [], client, [fail_if_no_peer_cert]),
 3009:     ?OK(#{verify := verify_none, verify_fun := {NewF3, foo}, partial_chain := _},
 3010:         [{verify_fun, {NewF3, foo}}], client),
 3011:     ?OK(#{fail_if_no_peer_cert := true, verify := verify_peer, verify_fun := {NewF3, foo}, partial_chain := _},
 3012:         [{verify_fun, {NewF3, foo}}, {verify, verify_peer}, {cacerts, [Cert]}],
 3013:         server),
 3014:     ?OK(#{fail_if_no_peer_cert := true, verify := verify_peer, verify_fun := {NewF4, foo}, partial_chain := _},
 3015:         [{verify_fun, {NewF4, foo}}, {verify, verify_peer}, {cacerts, [Cert]}],
 3016:         server),
 3017: 
 3018: 
 3019:     %% check verify_fun in update_options case
 3020:     #{verify_fun := undefined} = ssl_config:update_options([{verify, verify_peer}, {cacerts, [Cert]}], client, DefOpts),
 3021:     #{verify_fun := {NewF3, bar}} = ssl_config:update_options([{verify, verify_peer}, {cacerts, [Cert]},
 3022:                                                         {verify_fun, {NewF3, bar}}],
 3023:                                                        client, DefOpts),
 3024: 
 3025:     ?OK(#{allow_any_ca_purpose := true},
 3026:         [{allow_any_ca_purpose, true}, {verify, verify_peer}, {cacerts, [Cert]}],
 3027:         server),
 3028:     ?OK(#{allow_any_ca_purpose := false},
 3029:         [{verify, verify_peer}, {cacerts, [Cert]}],
 3030:         client),
 3031: 
 3032:     %% Errors
 3033:     ?ERR({partial_chain, undefined}, [{partial_chain, undefined}], client),
 3034:     ?ERR({options, incompatible, [{verify, verify_none}, {fail_if_no_peer_cert, true}]},
 3035:          [{fail_if_no_peer_cert, true}], server),
 3036:     ?ERR({options, incompatible, [{verify, _}, {cacerts, undefined}]}, [{verify, verify_peer}], client),
 3037:     ?ERR({option, server_only, fail_if_no_peer_cert},
 3038:          [{fail_if_no_peer_cert, true}, {verify, verify_peer}, {cacerts, [Cert]}],
 3039:          client),
 3040:     ?ERR({verify, verify}, [{verify, verify}], client),
 3041:     ?ERR({options, incompatible, [{verify, _}, {cacerts, undefined}]}, [{verify, verify_peer}], server),
 3042:     ?ERR({partial_chain, not_a_fun}, [{partial_chain, not_a_fun}], client),
 3043:     ?ERR({verify_fun, not_a_fun}, [{verify_fun, not_a_fun}], client),
 3044:     ?ERR({cert_policy_opts, {foo, bar}}, [{verify, verify_peer}, {cacerts, [Cert]}, {cert_policy_opts, [{foo,bar}]}],
 3045:         client),
 3046:     ?ERR({cert_policy_opts, {explicit_policy, bar}}, [{verify, verify_peer}, {cacerts, [Cert]}, {cert_policy_opts, [{explicit_policy,bar}]}],
 3047:          client),
 3048:     ?ERR({cert_policy_opts, {inhibit_policy_mapping, bar}}, [{verify, verify_peer}, {cacerts, [Cert]}, {cert_policy_opts, [{explicit_policy, true},
 3049:                                                                                                                            {inhibit_policy_mapping,bar}]}],
 3050:          client),
 3051:     ?ERR({cert_policy_opts, {inhibit_any_policy, bar}}, [{verify, verify_peer}, {cacerts, [Cert]}, {cert_policy_opts, [{inhibit_any_policy,bar}]}],
 3052:          client),
 3053:     ?ERR({middlebox_comp_mode, foo}, [{middlebox_comp_mode, foo}], server),
 3054:     ?ERR({allow_any_ca_purpose, foo},[{allow_any_ca_purpose, foo}, {verify, verify_peer}, {cacerts, [Cert]}], server),
 3055:     ok.
 3056:

 3191: options_identity(_Config) ->  %% psk_identity  srp_identity and user_lookup_fun
 3192:     ?OK(#{psk_identity := undefined, srp_identity := undefined, user_lookup_fun := undefined},
 3193:         [], client),
 3194:     ?OK(#{psk_identity := <<"foobar">>, srp_identity := undefined, user_lookup_fun := undefined},
 3195:         [{psk_identity, "foobar"}], server),
 3196:     ?OK(#{psk_identity := undefined, srp_identity := {<<"user">>, <<"pwd">>}, user_lookup_fun := undefined},
 3197:         [{srp_identity, {"user", "pwd"}}], client),
 3198:     ?OK(#{psk_identity := undefined, srp_identity := undefined, user_lookup_fun := {_, args}},
 3199:         [{user_lookup_fun, {fun(_,_,_) -> ok end, args}}], client),
 3200: 
 3201:     %% Should fail client option only
 3202:     ?OK(#{psk_identity := undefined, srp_identity := {<<"user">>, <<"pwd">>}, user_lookup_fun := undefined},
 3203:         [{srp_identity, {"user", "pwd"}}], server),
 3204: 
 3205:     %% Errors
 3206:     ?ERR({srp_identity, {_,_}},  %% FIXME doesn't like binary strings
 3207:          [{srp_identity, {<<"user">>, <<"pwd">>}}], client),
 3208:     ?ERR({psk_identity, _},  %% FIXME doesn't like binary strings
 3209:          [{psk_identity, <<"user">>}], client),
 3210:     ?ERR({srp_identity, _}, [{srp_identity, "user"}], client),
 3211:     ?ERR({user_lookup_fun, _},
 3212:          [{user_lookup_fun, {fun(_,_) -> ok end, args}}],
 3213:          client),
 3214: 
 3215:     ?ERR({options, incompatible, [psk_identity, _]},
 3216:          [{psk_identity, "foobar"},{versions, ['tlsv1.3']}],
 3217:          server),
 3218:     ?ERR({options, incompatible, [srp_identity, _]},
 3219:          [{srp_identity, {"user", "pwd"}},{versions, ['tlsv1.3']}],
 3220:          client),
 3221:     ?ERR({options, incompatible, [user_lookup_fun, _]},
 3222:          [{user_lookup_fun, {fun(_,_,_) -> ok end, args}}, {versions, ['tlsv1.3']}],
 3223:          client),
 3224:     ok.
 3225: 
 3226: options_reuse_session(_Config) ->
 3227:     ?OK(#{reuse_session := undefined, reuse_sessions := true}, [], client),
 3228:     ?OK(#{reuse_session := _, reuse_sessions := true}, [], server),
 3229: 
 3230:     ?OK(#{reuse_session := <<>>, reuse_sessions := save},
 3231:         [{reuse_session, <<>>}, {reuse_sessions, save}], client),
 3232:     ?OK(#{reuse_session := {<<>>, <<>>}, reuse_sessions := false},
 3233:         [{reuse_session, {<<>>, <<>>}}, {reuse_sessions, false}], client),
 3234: 
 3235:     RS_F = fun(_,_,_,_) -> ok end,
 3236:     ?OK(#{reuse_session := RS_F, reuse_sessions := false},
 3237:         [{reuse_session, RS_F}, {reuse_sessions, false}],
 3238:         server),
 3239: 
 3240:     %% Errors
 3241:     ?ERR({options, incompatible, [reuse_session, _]},
 3242:          [{reuse_session, RS_F}, {versions, ['tlsv1.3']}],
 3243:          server),
 3244:     ?ERR({options, incompatible, [reuse_sessions, _]},
 3245:          [{reuse_sessions, true}, {versions, ['tlsv1.3']}],
 3246:          server),
 3247:     ?ERR({reuse_session, RS_F},
 3248:          [{reuse_session, RS_F},{reuse_sessions, false}],
 3249:          client),
 3250:     ?ERR({reuse_sessions, foo},  [{reuse_sessions, foo}], server),
 3251:     ?ERR({reuse_session, foo},  [{reuse_session, foo}], server),
 3252:     ?ERR({reuse_sessions, save}, [{reuse_sessions, save}], server),
 3253:     ?ERR({reuse_session, <<>>}, [{reuse_session, <<>>}], server),
 3254: 
 3255:     ok.
 3256: 
 3257: options_sni(_Config) -> %% server_name_indication
 3258:     ?OK(#{server_name_indication := "dummy.host.org"}, [], client),
 3259:     ?OK(#{}, [], server, [server_name_indication]),
 3260:     ?OK(#{server_name_indication := disable}, [{server_name_indication, disable}], client),
 3261:     ?OK(#{server_name_indication := "dummy.org"}, [{server_name_indication, "dummy.org"}], client),
 3262: 
 3263:     ?OK(#{sni_fun := _}, [], server, [sni_hosts]),
 3264: 
 3265:     ?OK(#{sni_fun := _}, [{sni_hosts, [{"a", []}]}], server, [sni_hosts]),
 3266:     SNI_F = fun(_) -> sni end,
 3267:     ?OK(#{sni_fun := SNI_F}, [{sni_fun, SNI_F}], server, [sni_hosts]),
 3268: 
 3269:     %% Errors
 3270:     ?ERR({option, client_only, server_name_indication},
 3271:          [{server_name_indication, "dummy.org"}], server),
 3272:     ?ERR({option, server_only, sni_hosts},  [{sni_hosts, [{"a", []}]}], client),
 3273:     ?ERR({option, server_only, sni_fun},  [{sni_fun, SNI_F}], client),
 3274: 
 3275:     ?ERR({server_name_indication, foo},  [{server_name_indication, foo}], client),
 3276:     ?ERR({sni_hosts, foo}, [{sni_hosts, foo}], server),
 3277:     ?ERR({sni_fun, foo}, [{sni_fun, foo}], server),
 3278: 
 3279:     ?ERR({options, incompatible, [sni_fun, sni_hosts]},
 3280:          [{sni_fun, SNI_F}, {sni_hosts, [{"a", []}]}], server),
 3281:     ok.
 3282: 
 3283: options_sign_alg(_Config) ->  %% signature_algs[_cert]
 3284:     ?OK(#{signature_algs := [_|_], signature_algs_cert := [_|_]},
 3285:         [], client),
 3286:     ?OK(#{signature_algs := [rsa_pss_rsae_sha512,{sha512,rsa}], signature_algs_cert := undefined},
 3287:         [{signature_algs, [rsa_pss_rsae_sha512,{sha512,rsa}]}], client),
 3288:     ?OK(#{signature_algs := [_|_], signature_algs_cert := [eddsa_ed25519, rsa_pss_rsae_sha512]},
 3289:         [{signature_algs_cert, [eddsa_ed25519, rsa_pss_rsae_sha512]}],
 3290:         client),
 3291: 
 3292:     %% Errors
 3293:     ?ERR({signature_algs, not_a_list}, [{signature_algs, not_a_list}], client),
 3294:     ?ERR({signature_algs_cert, not_a_list}, [{signature_algs_cert, not_a_list}], client),
 3295:     ?ERR({signature_algs, [foobar]}, [{signature_algs, [foobar]}], client),
 3296:     ?ERR({signature_algs_cert, [foobar]}, [{signature_algs_cert, [foobar]}], client),
 3297:     ?ERR({options, incompatible, [signature_algs_cert, {versions, _}]},
 3298:          [{signature_algs_cert, [eddsa_ed25519, rsa_pss_rsae_sha512]}, {versions, ['tlsv1.1']}],
 3299:          client),
 3300:     ?ERR({options, incompatible, [signature_algs_cert, {versions, _}]},
 3301:          [{signature_algs_cert, [eddsa_ed25519, rsa_pss_rsae_sha512]}, {versions, ['tlsv1.1']}],
 3302:          server),
 3303:     ?ERR({options, {no_supported_algorithms, {signature_algs,[]}}},
 3304:          [{signature_algs, []}], client),
 3305:     ?ERR({options, {no_supported_signature_schemes, {signature_algs_cert,[]}}},
 3306:          [{signature_algs_cert, []}],
 3307:          client),
 3308:     ok.
 3309: 
 3310: options_supported_groups(_Config) ->
 3311:     Default = ssl:groups(default),
 3312:     ?OK(#{supported_groups := {supported_groups, Default}},
 3313:         [], client),
 3314:     ?OK(#{supported_groups := {supported_groups, [secp521r1, ffdhe2048]}},
 3315:         [{supported_groups, [secp521r1, ffdhe2048]}], client),
 3316: 
 3317:     %% ERRORs
 3318:     ?ERR({{'tlvs1.2'},{versions,[{'tlvs1.2'}]}},
 3319:          [{supported_groups, []}, {versions, [{'tlvs1.2'}]}], client),
 3320:     ?ERR({supported_groups, not_a_list}, [{supported_groups, not_a_list}], client),
 3321:     ?ERR({supported_groups, none_valid},  [{supported_groups, []}], client),
 3322:     ?ERR({supported_groups, none_valid},  [{supported_groups, [foo]}], client),
 3323:     ok.
 3324: 
 3325: options_use_srtp(_Config) ->
 3326:     ?OK(#{use_srtp := #{protection_profiles := [<<0,2>>, <<0,5>>], mki := <<>>}},
 3327:         [{protocol, dtls},
 3328:          {use_srtp, #{protection_profiles => [<<0,2>>, <<0,5>>]}}], client),
 3329:     ?OK(#{use_srtp := #{protection_profiles := [<<0,2>>], mki := <<>>}},
 3330:         [{protocol, dtls},
 3331:          {use_srtp, #{protection_profiles => [<<0,2>>]}}], server),
 3332:     ?OK(#{use_srtp := #{protection_profiles := [<<0,2>>, <<0,5>>], mki := <<"123">>}},
 3333:         [{protocol, dtls},
 3334:          {use_srtp, #{protection_profiles => [<<0,2>>, <<0,5>>], mki => <<"123">>}}], client),
 3335:     ?OK(#{use_srtp := #{protection_profiles := [<<0,2>>], mki := <<"123">>}},
 3336:         [{protocol, dtls},
 3337:          {use_srtp, #{protection_profiles => [<<0,2>>], mki => <<"123">>}}], server),
 3338: 
 3339:     %% invalid parameters
 3340:     ?ERR({options, {use_srtp, {no_protection_profiles, _}}},
 3341:          [{protocol, dtls},
 3342:           {use_srtp, #{}}], client),
 3343:     ?ERR({options, {use_srtp, {no_protection_profiles, _}}},
 3344:          [{protocol, dtls},
 3345:           {use_srtp, #{protection_profiles => []}}], client),
 3346:     ?ERR({options, {use_srtp, {invalid_protection_profiles, _}}},
 3347:          [{protocol, dtls},
 3348:           {use_srtp, #{protection_profiles => [<<"bad">>]}}], client),
 3349:     ?ERR({options, {use_srtp, {unknown_parameters,[whatever]}}},
 3350:          [{protocol, dtls},
 3351:           {use_srtp, #{protection_profiles => [<<0,2>>], whatever => xxx}}], client),
 3352: 
 3353:     %% use_srtp is DTLS-only extension, by default setting its options should raise an error
 3354:     ?ERR({options, incompatible, _},
 3355:          [{use_srtp, #{protection_profiles => [<<0,2>>, <<0,5>>]}}], client),
 3356:     ?ERR({options, incompatible, _},
 3357:          [{use_srtp, #{protection_profiles => [<<0,2>>]}}], server),
 3358:     ok.
 3359: 
 3360: %%-------------------------------------------------------------------
 3361: 
 3362: default_reject_anonymous()->
 3363:     [{doc,"Test that by default anonymous cipher suites are rejected "}].
 3364: default_reject_anonymous(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 3365:     {ClientNode, ServerNode, Hostname} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
 3366:     ClientOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_rsa_opts, Config),
 3367:     ServerOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_rsa_opts, Config),
 3368:     Version = ssl_test_lib:protocol_version(Config),
 3369:     TLSVersion = ssl_test_lib:tls_version(Version),
 3370:     
 3371:    [CipherSuite | _] = ssl_test_lib:ecdh_dh_anonymous_suites(TLSVersion),
 3372:     
 3373:     Server = ssl_test_lib:start_server_error([{node, ServerNode}, {port, 0},
 3374: 					      {from, self()},
 3375: 					      {options, ServerOpts}]),
 3376:     Port = ssl_test_lib:inet_port(Server),
 3377:     Client = ssl_test_lib:start_client_error([{node, ClientNode}, {port, Port},
 3378:                                               {host, Hostname},
 3379:                                               {from, self()},
 3380:                                               {options,
 3381:                                                [{ciphers,[CipherSuite]} |
 3382:                                                 ClientOpts]}]),
 3383: 
 3384:     ssl_test_lib:check_server_alert(Server, Client, insufficient_security).
 3385: 
 3386: %%-------------------------------------------------------------------
 3387: cb_info() ->
 3388:     [{doc,"Test that we can set cb_info."}].
 3389: 
 3390: cb_info(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 3391:     ClientOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_rsa_verify_opts, Config),
 3392:     ServerOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_rsa_opts, Config),
 3393:     Protocol = proplists:get_value(protocol, Config, tls),
 3394:     CbInfo =
 3395:         case Protocol of
 3396:             tls ->
 3397:                 {cb_info, {gen_tcp, tcp, tcp_closed, tcp_error}};
 3398:             dtls ->
 3399:                 {cb_info, {gen_udp, udp, udp_closed, udp_error}}
 3400:         end,
 3401:     {ClientNode, ServerNode, Hostname} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
 3402:     Server = ssl_test_lib:start_server([{node, ServerNode}, {port, 0},
 3403:                                         {from, self()},
 3404:                                         {mfa, {ssl_test_lib, send_recv_result_active, []}},
 3405:                                         {options,  [CbInfo | ServerOpts]}]),
 3406:     Port = ssl_test_lib:inet_port(Server),
 3407: 
 3408:     Client = ssl_test_lib:start_client([{node, ClientNode}, {port, Port},
 3409:                                         {host, Hostname},
 3410:                                         {from, self()},
 3411:                                         {mfa, {ssl_test_lib, send_recv_result_active, []}},
 3412:                                         {options, [CbInfo | ClientOpts]}]),
 3413: 
 3414:     ssl_test_lib:check_result(Server, ok, Client, ok).
 3415: 
 3416: %%-------------------------------------------------------------------
 3417: log_alert() ->
 3418:     [{doc,"Test that we can set log_alert and that it translates to correct log_level" 
 3419:       " that has replaced this option"}].
 3420: 
 3421: log_alert(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 3422:     ClientOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_rsa_verify_opts, Config),
 3423:     ServerOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_rsa_opts, Config),
 3424: 
 3425:     {ClientNode, ServerNode, Hostname} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
 3426:     Server = ssl_test_lib:start_server([{node, ServerNode}, {port, 0},
 3427:                                         {from, self()},
 3428:                                         {mfa, {ssl_test_lib, send_recv_result_active, []}},
 3429:                                         {options,  [{log_alert, true} | ServerOpts]}]),
 3430:     Port = ssl_test_lib:inet_port(Server),
 3431:     {Client, CSock} = ssl_test_lib:start_client([return_socket,
 3432:                                                  {node, ClientNode}, {port, Port},
 3433:                                                  {host, Hostname},
 3434:                                                  {from, self()},
 3435:                                                  {mfa, {ssl_test_lib, send_recv_result_active, []}},
 3436:                                                  {options, [{log_alert, false} | ClientOpts]}]),
 3437:     
 3438:     {ok, [{log_level, none}]} = ssl:connection_information(CSock, [log_level]),
 3439:     
 3440:     ssl_test_lib:check_result(Server, ok, Client, ok).
 3441: 
 3442: 
 3443: %%-------------------------------------------------------------------
 3444: %% Note that these test only test that the options are valid to set. As application data
 3445: %% is a stream you can not test that the send acctually splits it up as when it arrives
 3446: %% again at the user layer it may be concatenated. But COVER can show that the split up
 3447: %% code has been run.
 3448:    
 3449: rizzo_disabled() ->
 3450:      [{doc, "Test original beast mitigation disable option for SSL 3.0 and TLS 1.0"}].
 3451: 
 3452: rizzo_disabled(Config) ->
 3453:     ClientOpts = [{beast_mitigation, disabled} | ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_rsa_opts, Config)],
 3454:     ServerOpts =  [{beast_mitigation, disabled} | ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_rsa_opts, Config)],
 3455:     
 3456:     ssl_test_lib:basic_test(ClientOpts, ServerOpts, Config).
 3457: %%-------------------------------------------------------------------
 3458: rizzo_zero_n() ->
 3459:      [{doc, "Test zero_n beast mitigation option (same affect as original disable option) for SSL 3.0 and TLS 1.0"}].
 3460: 
 3461: rizzo_zero_n(Config) ->
 3462:     ClientOpts = [{beast_mitigation, zero_n} | ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_rsa_opts, Config)],
 3463:     ServerOpts =  [{beast_mitigation, zero_n} | ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_rsa_opts, Config)],
 3464:     
 3465:     ssl_test_lib:basic_test(ClientOpts, ServerOpts, Config).
 3466: %%-------------------------------------------------------------------
 3467: rizzo_one_n_minus_one () ->
 3468:      [{doc, "Test beast_mitigation option one_n_minus_one (same affect as default) for SSL 3.0 and TLS 1.0"}].
 3469: 
 3470: rizzo_one_n_minus_one (Config) ->
 3471:     ClientOpts = [{beast_mitigation, one_n_minus_one } | ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_rsa_opts, Config)],
 3472:     ServerOpts =  [{beast_mitigation, one_n_minus_one} | ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_rsa_opts, Config)],
 3473:     
 3474:     ssl_test_lib:basic_test(ClientOpts, ServerOpts, Config).
 3475:

 3478: supported_groups() ->
 3479:     [{doc,"Test the supported_groups option in TLS 1.3."}].
 3480: 
 3481: supported_groups(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 3482:     ClientOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_rsa_opts, Config),
 3483:     ServerOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_rsa_opts, Config),
 3484: 
 3485:     {ClientNode, ServerNode, Hostname} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
 3486: 
 3487:     Server = ssl_test_lib:start_server([{node, ServerNode}, {port, 0},
 3488: 					{from, self()},
 3489:                                         {mfa, {ssl_test_lib, send_recv_result_active, []}},
 3490:                                         {options, [{supported_groups, [x448, x25519]} | ServerOpts]}]),
 3491:     Port = ssl_test_lib:inet_port(Server),
 3492:     Client = ssl_test_lib:start_client([{node, ClientNode}, {port, Port},
 3493: 					{host, Hostname},
 3494:                                         {from, self()},
 3495:                                         {mfa, {ssl_test_lib, send_recv_result_active, []}},
 3496:                                         {options, [{supported_groups,[x448]} | ClientOpts]}]),
 3497: 
 3498:     ssl_test_lib:check_result(Server, ok, Client, ok),
 3499: 
 3500:     ssl_test_lib:close(Server),
 3501:     ssl_test_lib:close(Client).
 3502:

 3504: honor_client_cipher_order_tls13() ->
 3505:     [{doc,"Test API honor server cipher order in TLS 1.3."}].
 3506: honor_client_cipher_order_tls13(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 3507:     ClientCiphers = [#{key_exchange => any,
 3508:                        cipher => aes_256_gcm,
 3509:                        mac => aead,
 3510:                        prf => sha384},
 3511:                      #{key_exchange => any,
 3512:                        cipher => aes_128_gcm,
 3513:                        mac => aead,
 3514:                        prf => sha256}],
 3515:     ServerCiphers = [#{key_exchange => any,
 3516:                        cipher => aes_128_gcm,
 3517:                        mac => aead,
 3518:                        prf => sha256},
 3519:                      #{key_exchange => any,
 3520:                        cipher => aes_256_gcm,
 3521:                        mac => aead,
 3522:                        prf => sha384}],
 3523:     honor_cipher_order(Config, false, ServerCiphers, ClientCiphers, #{key_exchange => any,
 3524:                                                                       cipher => aes_256_gcm,
 3525:                                                                       mac => aead,
 3526:                                                                       prf => sha384}).
 3527:

 3529: client_options_negative_version_gap() ->
 3530:     [{doc,"Test client options with faulty version gap."}].
 3531: client_options_negative_version_gap(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 3532:     start_client_negative(Config, [{versions, ['tlsv1', 'tlsv1.3']}],
 3533:                           {options, missing_version, 
 3534:                            {'tlsv1.2', {versions,[tlsv1, 'tlsv1.3']}}}).
 3535:

 3537: client_options_negative_dependency_version() ->
 3538:     [{doc,"Test client options with faulty version dependency."}].
 3539: client_options_negative_dependency_version(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 3540:     start_client_negative(Config, [{versions, ['tlsv1.1', 'tlsv1.2']},
 3541:                                    {session_tickets, manual}],
 3542:                           {options,incompatible,
 3543:                            [session_tickets,{versions,['tlsv1.2', 'tlsv1.1']}]}).
 3544:

 3547:     [{doc,"Test client options with faulty 'session_tickets' option."}].
 3548: client_options_negative_dependency_stateless(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 3549:     start_client_negative(Config, [{versions, ['tlsv1.2', 'tlsv1.3']},
 3550:                                    {anti_replay, '10k'},
 3551:                                    {session_tickets, manual}],
 3552:                           {option, server_only, anti_replay}).

 3564: client_options_negative_early_data() ->
 3565:     [{doc,"Test client option early_data."}].
 3566: client_options_negative_early_data(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 3567:     start_client_negative(Config, [{versions, ['tlsv1.2']},
 3568:                                    {session_tickets, manual},
 3569:                                    {early_data, <<"test">>}],
 3570:                           {options,incompatible,
 3571:                            [session_tickets,{versions,['tlsv1.2']}]}),
 3572:     start_client_negative(Config, [{versions, ['tlsv1.2', 'tlsv1.3']},
 3573:                                    {early_data, <<"test">>}],
 3574:                           {options,incompatible,
 3575:                            [early_data,{session_tickets,disabled}]}),
 3576: 
 3577:     start_client_negative(Config, [{versions, ['tlsv1.2', 'tlsv1.3']},
 3578:                                    {session_tickets, stateful},
 3579:                                    {early_data, <<"test">>}],
 3580:                           {options, {session_tickets, stateful}}),
 3581: 
 3582:     start_client_negative(Config, [{versions, ['tlsv1.2', 'tlsv1.3']},
 3583:                                    {session_tickets, manual},
 3584:                                    {early_data, <<"test">>}],
 3585:                           {options,incompatible,
 3586:                            [early_data, {session_tickets, manual}, {use_ticket, undefined}]}),
 3587:     start_client_negative(Config, [{versions, ['tlsv1.2', 'tlsv1.3']},
 3588:                                    {session_tickets, manual},
 3589:                                    {use_ticket, [<<"ticket">>]},
 3590:                                    {early_data, "test"}],
 3591:                           {options, {early_data, "test"}}),
 3592:     %% All options are ok but there is no server
 3593:     start_client_negative(Config, [{versions, ['tlsv1.2', 'tlsv1.3']},
 3594:                                    {session_tickets, manual},
 3595:                                    {use_ticket, [<<"ticket">>]},
 3596:                                    {early_data, <<"test">>}],
 3597:                           econnrefused),
 3598: 
 3599:     %% All options are ok but there is no server
 3600:     start_client_negative(Config, [{versions, ['tlsv1.2', 'tlsv1.3']},
 3601:                                    {session_tickets, auto},
 3602:                                    {early_data, <<"test">>}],
 3603:                           econnrefused).
 3604:

 3647: server_options_negative_stateless_tickets_seed() ->
 3648:     [{doc, "Test server option stateless_tickets_seed"}].
 3649: server_options_negative_stateless_tickets_seed(Config) ->
 3650:     Seed = crypto:strong_rand_bytes(32),
 3651: 
 3652:     start_server_negative(Config, [{versions, ['tlsv1.2', 'tlsv1.3']},
 3653:                                    {stateless_tickets_seed, Seed}],
 3654:                           {options, incompatible,
 3655:                            [stateless_tickets_seed, {session_tickets, disabled}]}),
 3656: 
 3657:     start_server_negative(Config, [{versions, ['tlsv1.2', 'tlsv1.3']},
 3658:                                    {session_tickets, disabled},
 3659:                                    {stateless_tickets_seed, Seed}],
 3660:                           {options, incompatible,
 3661:                            [stateless_tickets_seed, {session_tickets, disabled}]}),
 3662: 
 3663:     start_server_negative(Config, [{versions, ['tlsv1.2', 'tlsv1.3']},
 3664:                                    {session_tickets, stateful},
 3665:                                    {stateless_tickets_seed, Seed}],
 3666:                           {options, incompatible,
 3667:                            [stateless_tickets_seed, {session_tickets, stateful}]}),
 3668: 
 3669:     InvalidSeed1 = 12345,
 3670:     start_server_negative(Config, [{versions, ['tlsv1.2', 'tlsv1.3']},
 3671:                                    {session_tickets, stateless},
 3672:                                    {stateless_tickets_seed, InvalidSeed1}],
 3673:                           {options, {stateless_tickets_seed, InvalidSeed1}}).
