 3675: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 3676: honor_server_cipher_order_tls13() ->
 3677:     [{doc,"Test API honor server cipher order in TLS 1.3."}].
 3678: honor_server_cipher_order_tls13(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 3679:     ClientCiphers = [#{key_exchange => any,
 3680:                        cipher => aes_256_gcm,
 3681:                        mac => aead,
 3682:                        prf => sha384},
 3683:                      #{key_exchange => any,
 3684:                        cipher => aes_128_gcm,
 3685:                        mac => aead,
 3686:                        prf => sha256}],
 3687:     ServerCiphers = [#{key_exchange => any,
 3688:                        cipher => aes_128_gcm,
 3689:                        mac => aead,
 3690:                        prf => sha256},
 3691:                      #{key_exchange => any,
 3692:                        cipher => aes_256_gcm,
 3693:                        mac => aead,
 3694:                        prf => sha384}],
 3695:     honor_cipher_order(Config, true, ServerCiphers,
 3696:                        ClientCiphers, #{key_exchange => any,
 3697:                                         cipher => aes_128_gcm,
 3698:                                         mac => aead,
 3699:                                         prf => sha256}).
 3700: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 3701: getstat() ->
 3702:     [{doc, "Test that you use ssl:getstat on a TLS socket"}].
 3703: 
 3704: getstat(Config) when is_list(Config) ->    
 3705:     ServerOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_rsa_opts, Config),
 3706:     ClientOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_rsa_opts, Config),
 3707:     {ClientNode, ServerNode, Hostname} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
 3708:     
 3709:     Port0 = ssl_test_lib:inet_port(ServerNode),
 3710:     {ok, ListenSocket} = ssl:listen(Port0, [ServerOpts]),
 3711:     {ok, _} = ssl:getstat(ListenSocket),
 3712:     ssl:close(ListenSocket),
 3713: 
 3714:     Server = ssl_test_lib:start_server([{node, ClientNode}, {port, 0},
 3715: 					{from, self()},
 3716:                                         {mfa, {?MODULE, ssl_getstat, []}},
 3717:                                         {options, ServerOpts}]),
 3718:     Port = ssl_test_lib:inet_port(Server),
 3719:     Client = ssl_test_lib:start_client([{node, ServerNode}, {port, Port},
 3720: 					{host, Hostname},
 3721:                                         {from, self()},
 3722:                                         {mfa, {?MODULE, ssl_getstat, []}},
 3723:                                         {options, ClientOpts}]),
 3724:     ssl_test_lib:check_result(Server, ok, Client, ok).
 3725: 
 3726: invalid_options_tls13() ->
 3727:     [{doc, "Test invalid options with TLS 1.3"}].
 3728: invalid_options_tls13(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 3729:     TestOpts =
 3730:         [{{beast_mitigation, one_n_minus_one},
 3731:           {options, incompatible,
 3732:            [beast_mitigation,{versions,['tlsv1.3']}]},
 3733:           common},
 3734: 
 3735:          {{next_protocols_advertised, [<<"http/1.1">>]},
 3736:           {options, incompatible,
 3737:            [next_protocols_advertised, {versions,['tlsv1.3']}]},
 3738:           server},
 3739: 
 3740:          {{client_preferred_next_protocols,
 3741:            {client, [<<"http/1.1">>]}},
 3742:           {options, incompatible,
 3743:            [client_preferred_next_protocols, {versions,['tlsv1.3']}]},
 3744:           client},
 3745: 
 3746:          {{client_renegotiation, false},
 3747:           {options, incompatible,
 3748:            [client_renegotiation, {versions,['tlsv1.3']}]},
 3749:           server
 3750:          },
 3751: 
 3752:          {{cookie, false},
 3753:           {option , server_only, cookie},
 3754:           client
 3755:          },
 3756: 
 3757:          {{padding_check, false},
 3758:           {options, incompatible, [padding_check,{versions,['tlsv1.3']}]},
 3759:           common},
 3760: 
 3761:          {{psk_identity, "Test-User"},
 3762:           {options, incompatible, [psk_identity,{versions,['tlsv1.3']}]},
 3763:           common},
 3764: 
 3765:          {{user_lookup_fun,
 3766:            {fun ssl_test_lib:user_lookup/3, <<1,2,3>>}},
 3767:           {options, incompatible, [user_lookup_fun,{versions,['tlsv1.3']}]},
 3768:           common},
 3769: 
 3770:          {{reuse_session, fun(_,_,_,_) -> false end},
 3771:           {options, incompatible, [reuse_session, {versions,['tlsv1.3']}]},
 3772:           server},
 3773: 
 3774:          {{reuse_session, <<1,2,3,4>>},
 3775:           {options, incompatible, [reuse_session, {versions,['tlsv1.3']}]},
 3776:           client},
 3777: 
 3778:          {{reuse_sessions, true},
 3779:           {options, incompatible, [reuse_sessions, {versions,['tlsv1.3']}]},
 3780:           common},
 3781: 
 3782:          {{secure_renegotiate, false},
 3783:           {options, incompatible, [secure_renegotiate, {versions,['tlsv1.3']}]},
 3784:           common},
 3785: 
 3786:          {{srp_identity, {"user", "passwd"}},
 3787:           {options, incompatible, [srp_identity, {versions,['tlsv1.3']}]},
 3788:           client}
 3789:         ],
 3790: 
 3791:     Fun = fun(Option, ErrorMsg, Type) ->
 3792:                   case Type of
 3793:                       server ->
 3794:                           start_server_negative(Config,
 3795:                                                 [Option,{versions, ['tlsv1.3']}],
 3796:                                                 ErrorMsg);
 3797:                       client ->
 3798:                           start_client_negative(Config,
 3799:                                                 [Option,{versions, ['tlsv1.3']}],
 3800:                                                 ErrorMsg);
 3801:                       common ->
 3802:                           start_server_negative(Config,
 3803:                                                 [Option,{versions, ['tlsv1.3']}],
 3804:                                                 ErrorMsg),
 3805:                           start_client_negative(Config,
 3806:                                                 [Option,{versions, ['tlsv1.3']}],
 3807:                                                 ErrorMsg)
 3808:                   end
 3809:           end,
 3810:     [Fun(Option, ErrorMsg, Type) || {Option, ErrorMsg, Type} <- TestOpts].
 3811: 
 3812: 
 3813: ssl_not_started() ->
 3814:     [{doc, "Test that an error is returned if ssl is not started"}].
 3815: ssl_not_started(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 3816:     application:stop(ssl),
 3817:     R1 = try
 3818:              {error, ssl_not_started} = ssl:connect("localhost", 22, [{verify, verify_none},
 3819:                                                                       {protocol, tls}]),
 3820:              ok
 3821:          catch _:Reason ->
 3822:                  Reason
 3823:          end,
 3824:     R2 = try
 3825:              {error, ssl_not_started} = ssl:connect("localhost", 22, [{verify, verify_none},
 3826:                                                                       {protocol, dtls}]),
 3827:              ok
 3828:          catch _:Reason2 ->
 3829:                  Reason2
 3830:          end,
 3831:     ssl:start(),
 3832:     ok = R1 = R2.
 3833: 
 3834: cookie() ->
 3835:     [{doc, "Test cookie extension in TLS 1.3"}].
 3836: cookie(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 3837:     cookie_extension(Config, true),
 3838:     cookie_extension(Config, false).
 3839: 
 3840: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 3841: check_random_nonce() ->
 3842:     [{doc,"Test random nonce - expecting 32B random for TLS1.3 and 4B UTC "
 3843:       "epoch with 28B random for older version"}].
 3844: check_random_nonce(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 3845:     ClientOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_rsa_opts, Config),
 3846:     ServerOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_rsa_opts, Config),
 3847:     {ClientNode, ServerNode, Hostname} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
 3848:     N = 10,
 3849:     F = fun (Id) -> establish_connection(Id,ServerNode, ServerOpts,
 3850:                                          ClientNode, ClientOpts,
 3851:                                          Hostname)
 3852:         end,
 3853:     ConnectionPairs = [F(Id) || Id <- lists:seq(1, N)],
 3854:     Randoms = lists:flatten([ssl_test_lib:get_result([Server, Client]) ||
 3855:                                 {Server, Client} <- ConnectionPairs]),
 3856:     Deltas = [abs(FourBytes - SecsSince) ||
 3857:                  {_FromPid,
 3858:                   {_Id, {_, <<FourBytes:32, _/binary>>}, SecsSince}} <- Randoms],
 3859:     MeanDelta = lists:sum(Deltas) div N,
 3860:     case ?config(version, Config) of
 3861:         Vsn when Vsn =:= 'tlsv1.3'; Vsn =:= undefined ->
 3862:             %% 4B "random" expected since TLS1.3
 3863:             RndThreshold   = 10000,
 3864:             true = MeanDelta > RndThreshold;
 3865:         _Vsn ->
 3866:             ct:log("Using Version: ~p", [_Vsn]),
 3867:             %% 4 epoch based bytes expected pre TLS1.3
 3868:             EpochThreshold = 10,
 3869:             true = MeanDelta < EpochThreshold
 3870:     end,
 3871:     [begin
 3872:          ssl_test_lib:close(Server),
 3873:          ssl_test_lib:close(Client)
 3874:      end || {Server, Client} <- ConnectionPairs].
 3875: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 3876: cipher_listing() ->
 3877:     [{doc, "Check that exclusive cipher for possible supported version adds up to all cipher " 
 3878:       "for the max version. Note that TLS-1.3 will contain two distinct sets of ciphers "
 3879:       "one for TLS-1.3 and one pre TLS-1.3"}].
 3880: cipher_listing(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 3881:     Version = ssl_test_lib:protocol_version(Config),
 3882:     length_exclusive(Version) == length_all(Version).
 3883: 
 3884: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 3885: format_error() ->
 3886:     "".
 3887: format_error(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 3888:     Errors = [{error, enotconn},
 3889:               {error, closed},
 3890:               {options, {keyfile, "TestFileName", {error,enoent}}},
 3891:               {options, {certfile, "TestFileName", {error,enoent}}},
 3892:               {options, {cacertfile, "TestFileName",{error,enoent}}},
 3893:               {options, {option_not_a_key_value_tuple, [foo]}},
 3894:               {options, {insufficient_crypto_support,{'tlsv1.3','tlsv1.1'}}},
 3895:               {options, incompatible, [{verify,verify_peer},{cacerts,undefined}]},
 3896:               {options, {protocol, foo}},
 3897:               {option, server_only, alpn_preferred_protocols},
 3898:               {options, {alpn_advertised_protocols, undefined}},
 3899:               {options, missing_version, {'tlsv1.2',{versions, ['tlsv1.1','tlsv1.3']}}},
 3900:               {options, {no_supported_algorithms, {signature_algs,[]}}},
 3901:               {options, {no_supported_signature_schemes, {signature_algs_cert,[]}}}
 3902:              ],
 3903:     Check = fun(Err) ->
 3904:                     Str = ssl:format_error(Err),
 3905:                     io:format("~p => ~s ~n", [Err, Str]),
 3906:                     %% Verify flat string (why do ssl flatten strings?)
 3907:                     Str = [C || C <- Str, is_integer(C)]
 3908:             end,
 3909:     [Check(Err) || Err <- Errors],
 3910:     ok.
 3911:

 3913: 
 3914: export_key_materials() ->
 3915:     [{doc, "Test export_key_materials/4,5"}].
 3916: 
 3917: export_key_materials(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 3918:     {ClientNode, ServerNode, Hostname} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
 3919:     Version = ssl_test_lib:protocol_version(Config, atom),
 3920:     BaseOpts = [{active, true}, {versions, [Version]}, {protocol, tls_or_dtls(Version)}],
 3921:     ServerOpts = BaseOpts ++ ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_rsa_opts, Config),
 3922:     ClientOpts = BaseOpts ++ ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_rsa_opts, Config),
 3923: 
 3924:     Label = <<"EXPERIMENTAL-otp">>,
 3925: 
 3926:     Server = ssl_test_lib:start_server([{node, ServerNode}, {port, 0}, {from, self()},
 3927:                                         {options, ServerOpts}]),
 3928:     Port = ssl_test_lib:inet_port(Server),
 3929:     {_, ClientS} = ssl_test_lib:start_client([return_socket, {node, ClientNode}, {port, Port},
 3930:                                              {host, Hostname}, {from, self()},
 3931:                                              {options, ClientOpts}]),
 3932:     Server ! get_socket,
 3933:     ServerS = receive
 3934:                   {Server, {socket, S}} -> S
 3935:               end,
 3936: 
 3937:     case Version of
 3938:         'tlsv1.3' ->
 3939:             {ok, [ExportKeyMaterial]} = ssl:export_key_materials(ServerS, [Label], [<<>>], [32], false),
 3940:             {ok, [ExportKeyMaterial]} = ssl:export_key_materials(ClientS, [Label], [<<>>], [32], false),
 3941:             {ok, [ExportKeyMaterial]} = ssl:export_key_materials(ServerS, [Label], [no_context], [32]),
 3942:             {ok, [ExportKeyMaterial]} = ssl:export_key_materials(ClientS, [Label], [no_context], [32]);
 3943:         _ ->
 3944:             {ok, ExportKeyMaterial1} = ssl:export_key_materials(ServerS, [Label], [<<>>], [20]),
 3945:             {ok, ExportKeyMaterial1} = ssl:export_key_materials(ClientS, [Label], [<<>>], [20]),
 3946:             {ok, ExportKeyMaterial2} = ssl:export_key_materials(ServerS, [Label], [no_context], [20]),
 3947:             {ok, ExportKeyMaterial2} = ssl:export_key_materials(ClientS, [Label], [no_context], [20]),
 3948:             true = ExportKeyMaterial1 =/= ExportKeyMaterial2
 3949:     end.
 3950: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 3951: exporter_master_secret_consumed() ->
 3952:     [{doc, "Test export_key_materials/4,5 TLS-1.3 functionality"}].
 3953: 
 3954: exporter_master_secret_consumed(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 3955:     {ClientNode, ServerNode, Hostname} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
 3956:     Version = ssl_test_lib:protocol_version(Config, atom),
 3957:     BaseOpts = [{active, true}, {versions, [Version]}, {protocol, tls_or_dtls(Version)}],
 3958:     ServerOpts = BaseOpts ++ ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_rsa_opts, Config),
 3959:     ClientOpts = BaseOpts ++ ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_rsa_opts, Config),
 3960: 
 3961:     Label1 = <<"EXPERIMENTAL-otp1">>,
 3962:     Label2 = <<"EXPERIMENTAL-otp2">>,
 3963:     Label3 = <<"EXPERIMENTAL-otp3">>,
 3964:     Label4 = <<"EXPERIMENTAL-otp4">>,
 3965: 
 3966:     Server = ssl_test_lib:start_server([{node, ServerNode}, {port, 0}, {from, self()},
 3967:                                         {options, ServerOpts}]),
 3968:     Port = ssl_test_lib:inet_port(Server),
 3969:     {_, ClientS} = ssl_test_lib:start_client([return_socket, {node, ClientNode}, {port, Port},
 3970:                                              {host, Hostname}, {from, self()},
 3971:                                              {options, ClientOpts}]),
 3972:     Server ! get_socket,
 3973:     ServerS = receive
 3974:                   {Server, {socket, S}} -> S
 3975:               end,
 3976: 
 3977:     {ok, ExportKeyMaterials} = ssl:export_key_materials(ServerS, [Label1, Label2], [<<>>, <<>>], [32, 32]),
 3978:     {error, exporter_master_secret_already_consumed} = ssl:export_key_materials(ServerS, [Label3], [<<>>], [32]),
 3979:     {ok, ExportKeyMaterials} = ssl:export_key_materials(ClientS, [Label1, Label2], [<<>>, <<>>], [32, 32], false),
 3980:     {error, bad_input} = ssl:export_key_materials(ClientS, [Label3, Label4], [<<>>], [32]).
 3981:

 3983: 
 3984: legacy_prf() ->
 3985:     [{doc, "Test prf/5"}].
 3986: 
 3987: legacy_prf(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 3988:     {ClientNode, ServerNode, Hostname} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
 3989:     Version = ssl_test_lib:protocol_version(Config, atom),
 3990:     BaseOpts = [{active, true}, {versions, [Version]}, {protocol, tls_or_dtls(Version)}],
 3991:     ServerOpts = BaseOpts ++ ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_rsa_opts, Config),
 3992:     ClientOpts = BaseOpts ++ ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_rsa_opts, Config),
 3993: 
 3994:    {ClientNode, ServerNode, Hostname} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
 3995:     Version = ssl_test_lib:protocol_version(Config, atom),
 3996:     BaseOpts = [{active, true}, {versions, [Version]}, {protocol, tls_or_dtls(Version)}],
 3997:     ServerOpts = BaseOpts ++ ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_rsa_opts, Config),
 3998:     ClientOpts = BaseOpts ++ ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_rsa_opts, Config),
 3999: 
 4000:     Label = <<"EXPERIMENTAL-otp">>,
 4001: 
 4002:     Server = ssl_test_lib:start_server(
 4003:                     [return_socket,
 4004:                      {node, ServerNode}, {port, 0}, {from, self()},
 4005:                      {options, ServerOpts}]),
 4006:     Port = ssl_test_lib:inet_port(Server),
 4007:     {_, ClientS} = ssl_test_lib:start_client([return_socket, {node, ClientNode}, {port, Port},
 4008:                                              {host, Hostname}, {from, self()},
 4009:                                              {options, ClientOpts}]),
 4010: 
 4011:     Server ! get_socket,
 4012:     ServerS = receive
 4013:                   {Server, {socket, S}} -> S
 4014:               end,
 4015: 
 4016:     case Version of
 4017:         'tlsv1.3' ->
 4018:             {ok, ExportKeyMaterials} = ssl:prf(ServerS, master_secret, Label, [client_random, server_random, <<>>], 32),
 4019:             {ok, ExportKeyMaterials} = ssl:prf(ClientS, master_secret, Label, [client_random, server_random, <<>>], 32);
 4020:         _ ->
 4021:             {ok, ExportKeyMaterials1} = ssl:prf(ServerS, master_secret, Label, [client_random, server_random], 32),
 4022:             {ok, ExportKeyMaterials1} = ssl:prf(ServerS, master_secret, Label, [client_random, server_random], 32),
 4023:             {ok, ExportKeyMaterials2} = ssl:prf(ServerS, master_secret, Label, [client_random, server_random, <<>>], 32),
 4024:             {ok, ExportKeyMaterials2} = ssl:prf(ClientS, master_secret, Label, [client_random, server_random, <<>>], 32),
 4025:             true = ExportKeyMaterials1 =/= ExportKeyMaterials2
 4026:     end.
 4027: 
 4028: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 4029: 
 4030: establish_connection(Id, ServerNode, ServerOpts, ClientNode, ClientOpts, Hostname) ->
 4031:     Server =
 4032:         ssl_test_lib:start_server([{node, ServerNode}, {port, 0},
 4033:                                    {from, self()},
 4034:                                    {mfa, {?MODULE, get_connection_information,
 4035:                                           [Id, server_random]}},
 4036:                                    {options, [{verify, verify_peer} | ServerOpts]}]),
 4037: 
 4038:     ListenPort = ssl_test_lib:inet_port(Server),
 4039:     Client =
 4040:         ssl_test_lib:start_client([{node, ClientNode}, {port, ListenPort},
 4041:                                    {host, Hostname},
 4042:                                    {from, self()},
 4043:                                    {mfa, {?MODULE, get_connection_information,
 4044:                                           [Id, client_random]}},
 4045:                                    {options,  [{verify, verify_peer} |ClientOpts]}]),
 4046: 
 4047:     ?CT_LOG("Client ~p  Server ~p ~n", [Client, Server]),
 4048:     {Server, Client}.
 4049: 
 4050: %%% Checker functions
 4051: get_connection_information(Socket, ConnectionId, InfoType) ->
 4052:     {ok, [ConnectionInfo]} = ssl:connection_information(Socket, [InfoType]),
 4053:     {ConnectionId, ConnectionInfo, secs_since_1970()}.
 4054: secs_since_1970() ->
 4055:     calendar:datetime_to_gregorian_seconds(
 4056:         calendar:universal_time()) - 62167219200.
 4057: 
 4058: connection_information_result(Socket) ->
 4059:     {ok, Info = [_ | _]} = ssl:connection_information(Socket),
 4060:     case  length(Info) > 3 of
 4061: 	true -> 
 4062: 	    %% At least one ssl_option() is set
 4063: 	    ?CT_LOG("Info ~p", [Info]),
 4064: 	    ok;
 4065: 	false ->
 4066: 	    ct:fail(no_ssl_options_returned)
 4067:     end.
 4068: 
 4069: secret_connection_info_result(Socket) ->
 4070:     {ok, [{protocol, Protocol}]} = ssl:connection_information(Socket, [protocol]),
 4071:     {ok, ConnInfo} = ssl:connection_information(Socket, [client_random, server_random, master_secret]),
 4072:     check_connection_info(Protocol, ConnInfo).
 4073: 
 4074: keylog_connection_info_result(Socket, KeepSecrets) ->
 4075:     {ok, [{protocol, Protocol}]} = ssl:connection_information(Socket, [protocol]),
 4076:     {ok, ConnInfo} = ssl:connection_information(Socket, [keylog]),
 4077:     check_keylog_info(Protocol, ConnInfo, KeepSecrets).
 4078: 
 4079: check_keylog_info('tlsv1.3', [{keylog, ["CLIENT_HANDSHAKE_TRAFFIC_SECRET"++_,_|_]=Keylog}], true) ->
 4080:     {ok, Keylog};
 4081: check_keylog_info('tlsv1.3', []=Keylog, false) ->
 4082:     {ok, Keylog};
 4083: check_keylog_info(_, [{keylog, ["CLIENT_RANDOM"++_]=Keylog}], _) ->
 4084:     {ok, Keylog};
 4085: check_keylog_info(_, Unexpected, Keep) ->
 4086:     {unexpected, Keep, Unexpected}.
 4087: 
 4088: check_srp_in_connection_information(_Socket, _Username, client) ->
 4089:     ok;
 4090: check_srp_in_connection_information(Socket, Username, server) ->
 4091:     {ok, Info} = ssl:connection_information(Socket),
 4092:     ?CT_LOG("Info ~p~n", [Info]),
 4093:     case proplists:get_value(srp_username, Info, not_found) of
 4094:         Username ->
 4095: 	        ok;
 4096:         not_found ->
 4097:             ct:fail(srp_username_not_found)
 4098:     end.
 4099: 
 4100: %% In TLS 1.3 the master_secret field is used to store multiple secrets from the key schedule and it is a tuple.
 4101: %% client_random and server_random are not used in the TLS 1.3 key schedule.
 4102: check_connection_info('tlsv1.3', [{client_random, ClientRand},{server_random, ServerRand},
 4103:                                   {master_secret, {master_secret, MasterSecret}}]) ->
 4104:     is_binary(ClientRand) andalso is_binary(ServerRand) andalso is_binary(MasterSecret);
 4105: check_connection_info(_, [{client_random, ClientRand}, {server_random, ServerRand}, {master_secret, MasterSecret}]) ->
 4106:     is_binary(ClientRand) andalso is_binary(ServerRand) andalso is_binary(MasterSecret);
 4107: check_connection_info(_, _) ->
 4108:     false.
 4109: 
 4110: try_recv_active(Socket) ->
 4111:     ssl:send(Socket, "Hello world"),
 4112:     {error, einval} = ssl:recv(Socket, 11),
 4113:     ok.
 4114: try_recv_active_once(Socket) ->
 4115:     {error, einval} = ssl:recv(Socket, 11),
 4116:     ok.
 4117: 
 4118: controlling_process_result(Socket, Pid, Msg) ->
 4119:     ok = ssl:controlling_process(Socket, Pid),
 4120:     %% Make sure other side has evaluated controlling_process
 4121:     %% before message is sent
 4122:     ct:sleep(?SLEEP),
 4123:     ssl:send(Socket, Msg),
 4124:     no_result_msg.
 4125: 
 4126: controller_dies_result(_Socket, _Pid, _Msg) ->
 4127:     receive Result -> Result end.
 4128: send_recv_result_timeout_client(Socket) ->
 4129:     try ssl:recv(Socket, 11, not_infinity) catch error : function_clause -> ok end,
 4130:     try ssl:recv(Socket, 11, -1) catch error : function_clause -> ok end,
 4131:     try ssl:recv(Socket, not_integer, 500) catch error : function_clause -> ok end,
 4132:     try ssl:recv(Socket, -1, 500) catch error : function_clause -> ok end,
 4133:     {error, timeout} = ssl:recv(Socket, 11, 500),
 4134:     {error, timeout} = ssl:recv(Socket, 11, 0),
 4135:     ssl:send(Socket, "Hello world"),
 4136:     receive
 4137: 	Msg ->
 4138: 	    io:format("Msg ~p~n",[Msg])
 4139:     after 500 ->
 4140: 	    ok
 4141:     end,
 4142:     {ok, "Hello world"} = ssl:recv(Socket, 11, 500),
 4143:     ok.
 4144: send_recv_result_timeout_server(Socket) ->
 4145:     ssl:send(Socket, "Hello"),
 4146:     {ok, "Hello world"} = ssl:recv(Socket, 11),
 4147:     ssl:send(Socket, " world"),
 4148:     ok.
 4149: 
 4150: do_recv_close(Socket) ->
 4151:     {error, closed} = ssl:recv(Socket, 11),
 4152:     receive
 4153: 	{_,{error,closed}} ->
 4154: 	    error_extra_close_sent_to_user_process
 4155:     after 500 ->
 4156: 	    ok
 4157:     end.
 4158: 
 4159: tls_close(Socket) ->
 4160:     ok = ssl_test_lib:send_recv_result(Socket),
 4161:     %% So both sides will have time to send
 4162:     %% and recv before close is called, as this
 4163:     %% function will be called by both client
 4164:     %% and server in the test.
 4165:     ct:sleep(100),
 4166:     case ssl:close(Socket, 10000) of
 4167:         ok ->
 4168:             ok;
 4169:         {error, closed} ->
 4170:             ok;
 4171:         Other ->
 4172:             ct:fail(Other)
 4173:     end.
 4174: 
 4175: run_error_server_close([Pid | Opts]) ->
 4176:     {ok, Listen} = ssl:listen(0, Opts),
 4177:     {ok,{_, Port}} = ssl:sockname(Listen),
 4178:     Pid ! {self(), Port},
 4179:     {ok, Socket} = ssl:transport_accept(Listen),
 4180:     Pid ! ssl:close(Socket).
 4181: 
 4182: run_error_server([ Pid | Opts]) ->
 4183:     {ok, Listen} = ssl:listen(0, Opts),
 4184:     {ok,{_, Port}} = ssl:sockname(Listen),
 4185:     Pid ! {self(), Port},
 4186:     {ok, Socket} = ssl:transport_accept(Listen),
 4187:     Pid ! ssl:controlling_process(Socket, self()).
 4188: 
 4189: run_client_error([Port, Opts]) ->
 4190:     ssl:connect("localhost", Port, Opts).
 4191: 
 4192: no_recv_no_active(Socket) ->
 4193:     receive
 4194:         {ssl_closed, Socket} ->
 4195:             ct:fail(received_active_msg)
 4196:     after 500 ->
 4197:             ok
 4198:     end.
 4199: 
 4200: connection_info_result(Socket) ->
 4201:     {ok, Info} = ssl:connection_information(Socket, [protocol, selected_cipher_suite]),
 4202:     {ok, {proplists:get_value(protocol, Info), proplists:get_value(selected_cipher_suite, Info)}}.
 4203: 
 4204: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 4205: %% Internal functions ------------------------------------------------
 4206: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 4207: 
 4208: tls_or_dtls('dtlsv1') ->
 4209:     dtls;
 4210: tls_or_dtls('dtlsv1.2') ->
 4211:     dtls;
 4212: tls_or_dtls(_) ->
 4213:     tls.
 4214: 
 4215: active_n_common(S, N) ->
 4216:     ok = ssl:setopts(S, [{active,-N}]),
 4217:     receive
 4218:         {ssl_passive, S} -> ok
 4219:     after
 4220:         1000 ->
 4221:             error({error,ssl_passive_failure, flush()})
 4222:     end,
 4223:     [{active,false}] = ok(ssl:getopts(S, [active])),
 4224:     ok = ssl:setopts(S, [{active,0}]),
 4225:     receive
 4226:         {ssl_passive, S} -> ok
 4227:     after
 4228:         1000 ->
 4229:             error({error,ssl_passive_failure, flush()})
 4230:     end,
 4231:     ok = ssl:setopts(S, [{active,32767}]),
 4232:     {error,{options,_}} = ssl:setopts(S, [{active,1}]),
 4233:     {error,{options,_}} = ssl:setopts(S, [{active,-32769}]),
 4234:     ok = ssl:setopts(S, [{active,-32768}]),
 4235:     receive
 4236:         {ssl_passive, S} -> ok
 4237:     after
 4238:         1000 ->
 4239:             error({error,ssl_passive_failure, flush()})
 4240:     end,
 4241:     [{active,false}] = ok(ssl:getopts(S, [active])),
 4242:     ok = ssl:setopts(S, [{active,N}]),
 4243:     ok = ssl:setopts(S, [{active,true}]),
 4244:     [{active,true}] = ok(ssl:getopts(S, [active])),
 4245:     receive
 4246:         _Msg -> error({error,active_n, _Msg})
 4247:     after
 4248:         100 ->
 4249:             ok
 4250:     end,
 4251:     ok = ssl:setopts(S, [{active,N}]),
 4252:     ok = ssl:setopts(S, [{active,once}]),
 4253:     [{active,once}] = ok(ssl:getopts(S, [active])),
 4254:     receive
 4255:         _Msg2 -> error({error,active_n, _Msg2})
 4256:     after
 4257:         100 ->
 4258:             ok
 4259:     end,
 4260:     {error,{options,_}} = ssl:setopts(S, [{active,32768}]),
 4261:     ok = ssl:setopts(S, [{active,false}]),
 4262:     [{active,false}] = ok(ssl:getopts(S, [active])),
 4263:     ok.
 4264: 
 4265: flush() ->
 4266:     receive Msg ->
 4267:             [Msg|flush()]
 4268:     after 0 ->
 4269:             []
 4270:     end.
 4271: 
 4272: 
 4273: ok({ok,V}) -> V.
 4274: 
 4275: repeat(N, Fun) ->
 4276:     Repeat = fun F(Arg) when is_integer(Arg), Arg > 0 -> Fun(N - Arg), F(Arg - 1);
 4277:                         F(_) -> ok end,
 4278:     Repeat(N).
 4279: 
 4280: 
 4281: get_close(Pid, Where) ->
 4282:     receive
 4283: 	{'EXIT', Pid, _Reason} ->
 4284: 	    receive
 4285: 		{_, {ssl_closed, Socket}} ->
 4286: 		    ?CT_LOG("Socket closed ~p~n",[Socket]);
 4287: 		Unexpected ->
 4288: 		    ?CT_LOG("Unexpected ~p~n",[Unexpected]),
 4289: 		    ct:fail({line, ?LINE-1})
 4290: 	    after 5000 ->
 4291: 		    ct:fail({timeout, {line, ?LINE, Where}})
 4292: 	    end;
 4293: 	Unexpected ->
 4294: 	    ?CT_LOG("Unexpected ~p~n",[Unexpected]),
 4295: 	    ct:fail({line, ?LINE-1})
 4296:     after 5000 ->
 4297: 	    ct:fail({timeout, {line, ?LINE, Where}})
 4298:     end.
 4299: 
 4300: ssl_active_recv(N) ->
 4301:     ssl_active_recv(N, []).
 4302: 
 4303: ssl_active_recv(0, Acc) ->
 4304:     Acc;
 4305: ssl_active_recv(N, Acc) ->
 4306:     receive 
 4307: 	{ssl, _, Bytes} ->
 4308:             ssl_active_recv(N-length(Bytes),  Acc ++ Bytes)
 4309:     end.
 4310:

 4313: honor_cipher_order(Config, Honor, ServerCiphers, ClientCiphers, Expected) ->
 4314:     ClientOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_rsa_opts, Config),
 4315:     ServerOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_rsa_opts, Config),
 4316: 
 4317:     {ClientNode, ServerNode, Hostname} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
 4318: 
 4319:     Server = ssl_test_lib:start_server([{node, ServerNode}, {port, 0},
 4320: 					{from, self()},
 4321: 					{mfa, {?MODULE, connection_info_result, []}},
 4322: 					{options, [{ciphers, ServerCiphers}, {honor_cipher_order, Honor}
 4323: 						   | ServerOpts]}]),
 4324:     Port = ssl_test_lib:inet_port(Server),
 4325:     Client = ssl_test_lib:start_client([{node, ClientNode}, {port, Port},
 4326: 					{host, Hostname},
 4327: 					{from, self()},
 4328: 					{mfa, {?MODULE, connection_info_result, []}},
 4329: 					{options, [{ciphers, ClientCiphers}
 4330: 						   | ClientOpts]}]),
 4331: 
 4332:     Version = ssl_test_lib:protocol_version(Config),
 4333: 
 4334:     ServerMsg = ClientMsg = {ok, {Version, Expected}},
 4335: 
 4336:     ssl_test_lib:check_result(Server, ServerMsg, Client, ClientMsg),
 4337: 
 4338:     ssl_test_lib:close(Server),
 4339:     ssl_test_lib:close(Client).
 4340: 
 4341: cookie_extension(Config, Cookie) ->
 4342:     ClientOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_rsa_opts, Config),
 4343:     ServerOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_rsa_opts, Config),
 4344:     Data = "123456789012345",  %% 15 bytes
 4345: 
 4346:     {ClientNode, ServerNode, Hostname} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
 4347: 
 4348:     %% Trigger a HelloRetryRequest
 4349:     Server = ssl_test_lib:start_server([{node, ServerNode}, {port, 0},
 4350: 					{from, self()},
 4351: 					{options, [{supported_groups, [x448,
 4352:                                                                        secp256r1,
 4353:                                                                        secp384r1]},
 4354:                                                    {cookie, Cookie}|ServerOpts]}]),
 4355:     Port = ssl_test_lib:inet_port(Server),
 4356:     Client = ssl_test_lib:start_client([{node, ClientNode}, {port, Port},
 4357: 					{host, Hostname},
 4358: 					{from, self()},
 4359: 					{options, ClientOpts}]),
 4360: 
 4361:     ok = ssl_test_lib:send(Client, Data),
 4362:     Data = ssl_test_lib:check_active_receive(Server, Data),
 4363: 
 4364:     ssl_test_lib:close(Server),
 4365:     ssl_test_lib:close(Client).
 4366: 
 4367: start_client_negative(Config, Options, Error) ->
 4368:     ClientOpts = proplists:delete(versions, ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_rsa_opts, Config)),
 4369:     {ClientNode, ServerNode, Hostname} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
 4370:     Port = ssl_test_lib:inet_port(ServerNode),
 4371:     Client = ssl_test_lib:start_client([{node, ClientNode}, {port, Port},
 4372: 					{host, Hostname},
 4373: 					{from, self()},
 4374:                                         {return_error, econnrefused},
 4375: 					{mfa, {?MODULE, connection_info_result, []}},
 4376: 					{options, Options ++ ClientOpts}]),
 4377:     ?CT_LOG("Actual: ~p~nExpected: ~p", [Client, {connect_failed, Error}]),
 4378:     {connect_failed, Error} = Client.
 4379: 
 4380: start_server_negative(Config, Options, Error) ->
 4381:     ServerOpts = proplists:delete(versions, ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_rsa_opts, Config)),
 4382:     {_, ServerNode, _} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
 4383:     Server = ssl_test_lib:start_server([{node, ServerNode}, {port, 0},
 4384: 					{from, self()},
 4385: 					{mfa, {?MODULE, connection_info_result, []}},
 4386: 					{options,  Options ++ ServerOpts}]),
 4387: 
 4388:     ?CT_LOG("Actual: ~p~nExpected: ~p", [Server,Error]),
 4389:     Error = Server.
 4390: 
 4391: der_input_opts(Opts) ->
 4392:     Certfile = proplists:get_value(certfile, Opts),
 4393:     CaCertsfile = proplists:get_value(cacertfile, Opts),
 4394:     Keyfile = proplists:get_value(keyfile, Opts),
 4395:     Dhfile = proplists:get_value(dhfile, Opts),
 4396:     [{_, Cert, _}] = ssl_test_lib:pem_to_der(Certfile),
 4397:     [{Asn1Type, Key, _}]  = ssl_test_lib:pem_to_der(Keyfile),
 4398:     [{_, DHParams, _}]  = ssl_test_lib:pem_to_der(Dhfile),
 4399:     CaCerts =
 4400: 	lists:map(fun(Entry) ->
 4401: 			  {_, CaCert, _} = Entry,
 4402: 			  CaCert
 4403: 		  end, ssl_test_lib:pem_to_der(CaCertsfile)),
 4404:     {Cert, {Asn1Type, Key}, CaCerts, DHParams}.
 4405: 
 4406: ssl_getstat(Socket) ->
 4407:     ssl:send(Socket, "From Erlang to Erlang"),
 4408:     {ok, Stats} = ssl:getstat(Socket),
 4409:     List = lists:dropwhile(fun({_, 0}) ->
 4410:                                    true;
 4411:                               ({_, _}) ->
 4412:                                    false
 4413:                            end, Stats),
 4414:     case List of
 4415:         [] ->
 4416:             nok;
 4417:         _  ->
 4418:             ok
 4419:     end.
 4420: 
 4421: test_versions_for_option_based_on_sni('tlsv1.3') ->
 4422:     {'tlsv1.2', ['tlsv1.3', 'tlsv1.2']};
 4423: test_versions_for_option_based_on_sni('tlsv1.2') ->
 4424:     {'tlsv1.1', ['tlsv1.2', 'tlsv1.1']}.
 4425: 
 4426: protocol_version_check(Socket, Version) ->
 4427:     case ssl:connection_information(Socket, [protocol]) of
 4428:         {ok, [{protocol, Version}]} ->
 4429:             ok;
 4430:         Other ->
 4431:             ct:fail({expected, Version, got, Other})
 4432:     end.
 4433: 
 4434: log(#{msg:={report,_Report}},#{config:=Pid}) ->
 4435:     Pid ! warning_generated;
 4436: log(_,_) ->
 4437:     ok.
 4438: 
 4439: length_exclusive(Version) when Version == 'tlsv1.3';
 4440:                                Version == 'tlsv1.2';
 4441:                                Version == 'tlsv1.1';
 4442:                                Version == 'tlsv1' ->
 4443:     length(exclusive_default_up_to_version(Version)) +
 4444:         length(exclusive_non_default_up_to_version(Version));
 4445: length_exclusive(Version) when Version == 'dtlsv1.2';
 4446:                                Version == 'dtlsv1' ->
 4447:     length(dtls_exclusive_default_up_to_version(Version)) +
 4448:         length(dtls_exclusive_non_default_up_to_version(Version)).
 4449: 
 4450: length_all(Version) ->
 4451:     length(ssl:cipher_suites(all, Version)).
 4452: 
 4453: exclusive_default_up_to_version(Version) ->
 4454:     lists:flatmap(fun (Vsn) ->
 4455: 
 4456:                           ssl:cipher_suites(exclusive, Vsn)
 4457:                   end,
 4458:                   up_to_version_helper(Version)).
 4459: 
 4460: up_to_version_helper('tlsv1.3') -> ['tlsv1.3', 'tlsv1.2', 'tlsv1.1', 'tlsv1'];
 4461: up_to_version_helper('tlsv1.2') -> ['tlsv1.2', 'tlsv1.1', 'tlsv1'];
 4462: up_to_version_helper('tlsv1.1') -> ['tlsv1.1', 'tlsv1'];
 4463: up_to_version_helper('tlsv1') -> ['tlsv1'].
 4464: 
 4465: 
 4466: dtls_exclusive_default_up_to_version(Version) ->
 4467:     lists:flatmap(fun (Vsn) ->
 4468:                           ssl:cipher_suites(exclusive, Vsn)
 4469:                   end,
 4470:                   dtls_up_to_version_helper(Version)).
 4471: 
 4472: dtls_up_to_version_helper('dtlsv1.2') -> ['dtlsv1.2', 'dtlsv1'];
 4473: dtls_up_to_version_helper('dtlsv1') -> ['dtlsv1'].
 4474: 
 4475: 
 4476: exclusive_non_default_up_to_version(Version) ->
 4477:     lists:flatmap(fun exclusive_non_default_version/1,
 4478:                   up_to_version_helper(Version)).
 4479: 
 4480: 
 4481: dtls_exclusive_non_default_up_to_version(Version) ->
 4482:     lists:flatmap(fun dtls_exclusive_non_default_version/1,
 4483:                   dtls_up_to_version_helper(Version)).
 4484: 
 4485: exclusive_non_default_version(Version) ->
 4486:     Ls = [ fun tls_v1:psk_exclusive/1
 4487:          , fun tls_v1:srp_exclusive/1
 4488:          , fun tls_v1:rsa_exclusive/1
 4489:          , fun tls_v1:des_exclusive/1
 4490:          , fun tls_v1:rc4_exclusive/1],
 4491:     lists:flatmap(fun(Fn) -> Fn(Version) end, Ls).
 4492: 
 4493: dtls_exclusive_non_default_version(DTLSVersion) ->        
 4494:     Version = ssl:tls_version(dtls_record:protocol_version_name(DTLSVersion)),
 4495:     Fns = [ fun tls_v1:psk_exclusive/1
 4496:           , fun tls_v1:srp_exclusive/1
 4497:           , fun tls_v1:rsa_exclusive/1
 4498:           , fun tls_v1:des_exclusive/1],
 4499:     lists:flatmap(fun (Fn) -> Fn(Version) end, Fns).
 4500: 
 4501: selected_peer(ExpectedClient,
 4502:               ExpectedServer, ClientOpts, ServerOpts, Config) ->
 4503:     {ClientNode, ServerNode, Hostname} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
 4504: 
 4505:     Server = ssl_test_lib:start_server([{node, ServerNode}, {port, 0},
 4506: 					{from, self()},
 4507:                                         {mfa, {?MODULE, check_peercert, [ExpectedServer]}},
 4508:                                         {options, ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(ServerOpts, Config)}]),
 4509:     Port = ssl_test_lib:inet_port(Server),
 4510: 
 4511:     Client  = ssl_test_lib:start_client([{node, ClientNode}, {port, Port},
 4512:                                          {host, Hostname},
 4513:                                          {from, self()},
 4514:                                          {mfa, {?MODULE, check_peercert, [ExpectedClient]}},
 4515:                                          {options,  ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(ClientOpts, Config)}
 4516: 					]),
 4517: 
 4518:     ssl_test_lib:check_result(Server, ok, Client, ok),
 4519:     %% Make sure to start next test fresh
 4520:     ssl:clear_pem_cache(),
 4521:     ok.
 4522: 
 4523: test_config('tlsv1.3', _) ->
 4524:     #{server_config := SEDDSAOpts,
 4525:       client_config := CEDDSAOpts} = eddsa_cert_chains(),
 4526:     #{server_config := SECDSAOpts,
 4527:       client_config := CECDSAOpts } = ecdsa_cert_chains(),
 4528: 
 4529:     {SEDDSACert, SEDDSAKey, SEDDSACACerts} = get_single_options(cert, key, cacerts, SEDDSAOpts),
 4530:     {CEDDSACert, CEDDSAKey, CEDDSACACerts} = get_single_options(cert, key, cacerts, CEDDSAOpts),
 4531: 
 4532:     {SECDSACert, SECDSAKey, SECDSACACerts} = get_single_options(cert, key, cacerts, SECDSAOpts),
 4533:     {CECDSACert, CECDSAKey, CECDSACACerts} = get_single_options(cert, key, cacerts, CECDSAOpts),
 4534: 
 4535:     ServerCertKeys = [#{cert => SECDSACert, key => SECDSAKey},
 4536:                       #{cert => SEDDSACert, key => SEDDSAKey}],
 4537: 
 4538:     ClientCertKeys = [#{cert => CECDSACert, key => CECDSAKey},
 4539:                       #{cert => CEDDSACert, key => CEDDSAKey}],
 4540: 
 4541:     [{#{server_config => [{certs_keys,ServerCertKeys},
 4542:                           {verify, verify_peer},  {versions, ['tlsv1.3', 'tlsv1.2']},
 4543:                           {cacerts, SEDDSACACerts ++ SECDSACACerts}],
 4544:         client_config => [{certs_keys, ClientCertKeys},
 4545:                           {verify, verify_peer}, {versions, ['tlsv1.3', 'tlsv1.2']},
 4546:                           {cacerts, CEDDSACACerts ++ CECDSACACerts}]
 4547:        },
 4548:       {client_peer, SEDDSACert}, {server_peer, CEDDSACert}},
 4549:      {#{server_config => [{certs_keys, ServerCertKeys},
 4550:                           {verify, verify_peer}, {versions, ['tlsv1.2']},
 4551:                           {cacerts, SEDDSACACerts ++ SECDSACACerts}],
 4552:         client_config => [{certs_keys, ClientCertKeys},
 4553:                           {verify, verify_peer},  {versions, ['tlsv1.2']},
 4554:                           {cacerts, CEDDSACACerts ++ CECDSACACerts}]},
 4555:       {client_peer, SECDSACert}, {server_peer, CECDSACert}}
 4556:     ];
 4557: test_config('tlsv1.2', _) ->
 4558:     #{server_config := SRSAOpts,
 4559:       client_config := CRSAOpts} = eddsa_cert_chains(),
 4560:     #{server_config := SDSAOpts,
 4561:       client_config := CDSAOpts} = dsa_cert_chains(),
 4562: 
 4563:     {SRSACert, SRSAKey, SRSACACerts} = get_single_options(cert, key, cacerts, SRSAOpts),
 4564:     {CRSACert, CRSAKey, CRSACACerts} = get_single_options(cert, key, cacerts,  CRSAOpts),
 4565: 
 4566:     {SDSACert, SDSAKey, SDSACACerts} = get_single_options(cert, key, cacerts, SDSAOpts),
 4567:     {CDSACert, CDSAKey, CDSACACerts} = get_single_options(cert, key, cacerts,  CDSAOpts),
 4568: 
 4569:     AllSigAlgs1_2 = ssl_test_lib:all_1_2_sig_algs(),
 4570: 
 4571:     [{#{server_config => [{certs_keys,
 4572:                            [#{cert => SDSACert, key => SDSAKey},
 4573:                             #{cert => SRSACert, key => SRSAKey}]},
 4574:                           {verify, verify_peer},
 4575:                           {versions, ['tlsv1.3', 'tlsv1.2']},
 4576:                           {cacerts, SRSACACerts ++ SDSACACerts}],
 4577:         client_config => [{certs_keys,
 4578:                            [#{cert => CDSACert, key => CDSAKey},
 4579:                             #{cert => CRSACert, key => CRSAKey}]},
 4580:                           {verify, verify_peer},
 4581:                           {versions, ['tlsv1.3', 'tlsv1.2']},
 4582:                           {cacerts, CRSACACerts ++ CDSACACerts}]
 4583:        },
 4584:       {client_peer, SRSACert}, {server_peer, CRSACert}},
 4585:      {#{server_config => [{certs_keys, [#{cert => SDSACert, key => SDSAKey},
 4586:                                         #{cert => SRSACert, key => SRSAKey}]},
 4587:                           {verify, verify_peer},
 4588:                           AllSigAlgs1_2,
 4589:                           {versions, ['tlsv1.2']},
 4590:                           {cacerts, SRSACACerts ++ SDSACACerts}],
 4591:         client_config => [{certs_keys, [#{cert => CDSACert, key => CDSAKey},
 4592:                                         #{cert => CRSACert, key => CRSAKey}]},
 4593:                           {verify, verify_peer},
 4594:                           {versions, ['tlsv1.2']},
 4595:                           AllSigAlgs1_2,
 4596:                           {cacerts, CRSACACerts ++ CDSACACerts}]
 4597:        },
 4598:       {client_peer, SDSACert}, {server_peer, CDSACert}}];
 4599: test_config('dtlsv1.2', Config) ->
 4600:     #{server_config := SRSAPSSOpts,
 4601:       client_config := CRSAPSSOpts} = ssl_test_lib:make_rsa_pss_pem(rsa_pss_pss, [], Config, "dtls_pss_pss_conf"),
 4602:     #{server_config := SRSAPSSRSAEOpts,
 4603:       client_config := CRSAPSSRSAEOpts} = ssl_test_lib:make_rsa_pss_pem(rsa_pss_rsae, [], Config, "dtls_pss_rsae_conf"),
 4604: 
 4605:     {SRSAPSSCert, SRSAPSSKey, SRSAPSSCACerts} = get_single_options(certfile, keyfile, cacertfile, SRSAPSSOpts),
 4606:     {CRSAPSSCert, CRSAPSSKey, CRSAPSSCACerts} = get_single_options(certfile, keyfile, cacertfile,  CRSAPSSOpts),
 4607: 
 4608:     {SRSAPSSRSAECert, SRSAPSSRSAEKey, SRSAPSSRSAECACerts} = get_single_options(certfile, keyfile, cacertfile, SRSAPSSRSAEOpts),
 4609:     {CRSAPSSRSAECert, CRSAPSSRSAEKey, CRSAPSSRSAECACerts} = get_single_options(certfile, keyfile, cacertfile, CRSAPSSRSAEOpts),
 4610: 
 4611:     [{#{server_config => [{certs_keys, [#{certfile => SRSAPSSRSAECert, keyfile => SRSAPSSRSAEKey},
 4612:                                         #{certfile => SRSAPSSCert, keyfile => SRSAPSSKey}]},
 4613:                           {verify, verify_peer},
 4614:                           {cacertfile, SRSAPSSCACerts}],
 4615:         client_config => [{certs_keys, [#{certfile => CRSAPSSRSAECert, keyfile => CRSAPSSRSAEKey},
 4616:                                         #{certfile => CRSAPSSCert, keyfile => CRSAPSSKey}]},
 4617:                           {verify, verify_peer},
 4618:                           {signature_algs, [rsa_pss_pss_sha256]},
 4619:                           {cacertfile, CRSAPSSCACerts}]
 4620:        },
 4621:       {client_peer, pem_to_der_cert(SRSAPSSCert)}, {server_peer, pem_to_der_cert(CRSAPSSCert)}},
 4622:      {#{server_config => [{certs_keys, [#{certfile => SRSAPSSRSAECert, keyfile => SRSAPSSRSAEKey},
 4623:                                         #{certfile => SRSAPSSCert, keyfile => SRSAPSSKey}]},
 4624:                           {verify, verify_peer},
 4625:                           {cacertfile, SRSAPSSRSAECACerts}],
 4626:         client_config => [{certs_keys, [#{certfile => CRSAPSSRSAECert, keyfile => CRSAPSSRSAEKey}]},
 4627:                           {verify, verify_peer}, {signature_algs, [rsa_pss_rsae_sha256]},
 4628:                           {cacertfile, CRSAPSSRSAECACerts}]
 4629:        },
 4630:       {client_peer, pem_to_der_cert(SRSAPSSRSAECert)}, {server_peer, pem_to_der_cert(CRSAPSSRSAECert)}}
 4631:     ];
 4632: test_config(_, Config) ->
 4633:     RSAConf1 = ssl_test_lib:make_rsa_cert(Config),
 4634:     SRSA1Opts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_rsa_opts, RSAConf1),
 4635:     CRSA1Opts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_rsa_opts, RSAConf1),
 4636: 
 4637:     RSAConf2 = ssl_test_lib:make_rsa_1024_cert(Config),
 4638:     SRSA2Opts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_rsa_1024_opts, RSAConf2),
 4639:     CRSA2Opts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_rsa_1024_opts, RSAConf2),
 4640: 
 4641:     {SRSA1Cert, SRSA1Key, _SRSA1CACerts} = get_single_options(certfile, keyfile, cacertfile, SRSA1Opts),
 4642:     {CRSA1Cert, CRSA1Key, _CRSA1CACerts} = get_single_options(certfile, keyfile, cacertfile, CRSA1Opts),
 4643: 
 4644:     {SRSA2Cert, SRSA2Key, SRSA2CACerts} = get_single_options(certfile, keyfile, cacertfile, SRSA2Opts),
 4645:     {CRSA2Cert, CRSA2Key, CRSA2CACerts} = get_single_options(certfile, keyfile, cacertfile, CRSA2Opts),
 4646: 
 4647:     [{#{server_config => [{certs_keys, [#{certfile => SRSA2Cert, keyfile => SRSA2Key},
 4648:                                         #{certfile => SRSA1Cert, keyfile => SRSA1Key}]},
 4649:                           {verify, verify_peer},
 4650:                           {cacertfile, SRSA2CACerts}],
 4651:         client_config => [{certs_keys, [#{certfile => CRSA2Cert, keyfile  => CRSA2Key},
 4652:                                         #{certfile => CRSA1Cert, keyfile => CRSA1Key}]},
 4653:                           {verify, verify_peer},
 4654:                           {cacertfile, CRSA2CACerts}]
 4655:        }, {client_peer,  pem_to_der_cert(SRSA2Cert)}, {server_peer, pem_to_der_cert(CRSA2Cert)}}].
 4656: 
 4657: check_peercert(Socket, Cert) ->
 4658:     case ssl:peercert(Socket) of
 4659:         {ok, Cert} ->
 4660:             ok;
 4661:         {ok, Other} ->
 4662:             {error, {{expected, public_key:pkix_decode_cert(Cert, otp)}, {got, public_key:pkix_decode_cert(Other, otp)}}}
 4663:     end.
 4664: 
 4665: 
 4666: eddsa_cert_chains() ->
 4667:     public_key:pkix_test_data(#{server_chain => #{root => ssl_test_lib:eddsa_conf(),
 4668:                                                   intermediates => [ssl_test_lib:eddsa_conf()],
 4669:                                                   peer =>  ssl_test_lib:eddsa_conf()},
 4670:                                 client_chain => #{root => ssl_test_lib:eddsa_conf(),
 4671:                                                   intermediates => [ssl_test_lib:eddsa_conf()],
 4672:                                                   peer =>  ssl_test_lib:eddsa_conf()}}).
 4673: 
 4674: ecdsa_cert_chains() ->
 4675:     public_key:pkix_test_data(#{server_chain => #{root => ssl_test_lib:ecdsa_conf(),
 4676:                                                   intermediates => [ssl_test_lib:ecdsa_conf()],
 4677:                                                   peer =>  ssl_test_lib:ecdsa_conf()},
 4678:                                 client_chain => #{root => ssl_test_lib:ecdsa_conf(),
 4679:                                                   intermediates => [ssl_test_lib:ecdsa_conf()],
 4680:                                                   peer =>  ssl_test_lib:ecdsa_conf()}}).
 4681: dsa_cert_chains() ->
 4682:     public_key:pkix_test_data(#{server_chain => #{root => [{key, ssl_test_lib:hardcode_dsa_key(1)}],
 4683:                                                   intermediates => [[{key, ssl_test_lib:hardcode_dsa_key(2)}]],
 4684:                                                   peer =>  [{key, ssl_test_lib:hardcode_dsa_key(3)}]
 4685:                                                  },
 4686:                                 client_chain => #{root => [{key, ssl_test_lib:hardcode_dsa_key(3)}],
 4687:                                                   intermediates => [[{key, ssl_test_lib:hardcode_dsa_key(2)}]],
 4688:                                                   peer => [{key, ssl_test_lib:hardcode_dsa_key(1)}]}}).
 4689: 
 4690: get_single_options(CertOptName, KeyOptName, CaOptName, Opts) ->
 4691:     CertOpt = proplists:get_value(CertOptName, Opts),
 4692:     KeyOpt = proplists:get_value(KeyOptName, Opts),
 4693:     CaOpt = proplists:get_value(CaOptName, Opts),
 4694:     {CertOpt, KeyOpt, CaOpt}.
 4695: 
 4696: pem_to_der_cert(Pem) ->
 4697:     [{'Certificate', Der, _}] = ssl_test_lib:pem_to_der(Pem),
 4698:     Der.
 4699: 
 4700: test_sha1_cert_conf('tlsv1.3'= Version, RSA, ECDSA, Config) ->
 4701:     run_sha1_cert_conf(Version, ECDSA, Config, ecdsa_sha1),
 4702:     run_sha1_cert_conf(Version, RSA, Config, rsa_pkcs1_sha1);
 4703: test_sha1_cert_conf(Version, RSA, ECDSA, Config) when Version == 'tlsv1.2';
 4704:                                                       Version == 'dtlsv1.2' ->
 4705:     run_sha1_cert_conf(Version, RSA, Config, {sha, rsa}),
 4706:     run_sha1_cert_conf(Version, ECDSA, Config, {sha, ecdsa});
 4707: test_sha1_cert_conf(Version,RSA,_,Config) ->
 4708:     run_sha1_cert_conf(Version, RSA, Config, undefined).
 4709: 
 4710: run_sha1_cert_conf('tlsv1.3', #{client_config := ClientOpts, server_config := ServerOpts}, Config, LegacyAlg) ->
 4711:     SigAlgs = [%% ECDSA
 4712:                ecdsa_secp521r1_sha512,
 4713:                ecdsa_secp384r1_sha384,
 4714:                ecdsa_secp256r1_sha256,
 4715:                %% RSASSA-PSS
 4716:                rsa_pss_pss_sha512,
 4717:                rsa_pss_pss_sha384,
 4718:                rsa_pss_pss_sha256,
 4719:                rsa_pss_rsae_sha512,
 4720:                rsa_pss_rsae_sha384,
 4721:                rsa_pss_rsae_sha256,
 4722:                %% EDDSA
 4723:                eddsa_ed25519,
 4724:                eddsa_ed448
 4725:               ],
 4726:     IncludeLegacyAlg =  SigAlgs ++ [LegacyAlg],
 4727:     Extra = case proplists:get_value(transport, Config) of
 4728:                 socket -> [{cb_info, tls_socket_tcp:cb_info()}];
 4729:                 _ -> []
 4730:             end,
 4731:     ssl_test_lib:basic_alert([{verify, verify_peer}, {signature_algs,  SigAlgs} | ClientOpts ++ Extra],
 4732:                              [{signature_algs,  IncludeLegacyAlg} | ServerOpts ++ Extra], Config, handshake_failure),
 4733:     ssl_test_lib:basic_test([{verify, verify_peer}, {signature_algs,  IncludeLegacyAlg} | ClientOpts ++ Extra],
 4734:                             [{signature_algs,  IncludeLegacyAlg} | ServerOpts ++ Extra], Config);
 4735: 
 4736: run_sha1_cert_conf(Version, #{client_config := ClientOpts, server_config := ServerOpts}, Config, LegacyAlg) when Version == 'tlsv1.2';
 4737:                                                                                                                  Version == 'dtlsv1.2' ->
 4738:     SigAlgs =  [%% SHA2
 4739:                 {sha512, ecdsa},
 4740:                 {sha512, rsa},
 4741:                 {sha384, ecdsa},
 4742:                 {sha384, rsa},
 4743:                 {sha256, ecdsa},
 4744:                 {sha256, rsa},
 4745:                 {sha224, ecdsa},
 4746:                 {sha224, rsa}],
 4747:     IncludeLegacyAlg = SigAlgs ++ [LegacyAlg],
 4748:     ssl_test_lib:basic_test( [{verify, verify_peer}, {signature_algs,  IncludeLegacyAlg} | ClientOpts],
 4749:                              [{signature_algs,  IncludeLegacyAlg} | ServerOpts], Config);
 4750: run_sha1_cert_conf(_, #{client_config := ClientOpts, server_config := ServerOpts}, Config, LegacyAlg) ->
 4751:     NVersion = ssl_test_lib:n_version(proplists:get_value(version, Config)),
 4752:     SigOpts = ssl_test_lib:sig_algs(LegacyAlg, NVersion),
 4753:     ssl_test_lib:basic_test([{verify, verify_peer} | ClientOpts] ++ SigOpts, ServerOpts, Config).
 4754: 
 4755: 
 4756: rsa_cipher_suites_not_default('tlsv1.3'= Version) ->
 4757:     [_ | Suites] = ssl:cipher_suites(default, Version),
 4758:     Suites;
 4759: rsa_cipher_suites_not_default(Version) ->
 4760:     ssl_test_lib:test_ciphers(ecdhe_rsa, aes_128_gcm, Version).
 4761: 
 4762: suite_check(Socket, 'tlsv1.3'= Version) ->
 4763:     [_, Suite| _] = ssl:cipher_suites(default, Version),
 4764:     case ssl:connection_information(Socket, [selected_cipher_suite]) of
 4765:         {ok, [{selected_cipher_suite, Suite}]} ->
 4766:             ok;
 4767:         Other ->
 4768:             ct:fail({expected, Suite, got, Other})
 4769:     end;
 4770: suite_check(Socket, Version) ->
 4771:     [Suite |_] = rsa_cipher_suites_not_default(Version),
 4772:     case ssl:connection_information(Socket, [selected_cipher_suite]) of
 4773:         {ok, [{selected_cipher_suite, Suite}]} ->
 4774:             ok;
 4775:         Other ->
 4776:             ct:fail({expected, Suite, got, Other})
 4777:     end.
